JBL BAR 1000 Soundbar in Kenya

The JBL BAR 1000 price in Kenya is Ksh 185,000. Experience movies, music, and games with a sound that puts you right in the middle of the action, thanks to 880W of total output power and thunderous bass from the 10″ subwoofer. The JBL Bar 1000 has MultiBeam™ and four up-firing drivers—two in the bar and two in the detachable battery-powered surround speakers—to envelop you in a sphere of Dolby Atmos® and DTS:X 3D surround sound with a wide, spacious soundstage with no need to draw extra cables. You’ll never miss a word with our PureVoice technology, which makes sure the dialogue is clear even when other sounds are at their loudest. When you’re ready for some music, stream your favorite playlist from AirPlay, Alexa MRM, and Chromecast built-in™ and it’ll feel like the band is right there. Have a great night out without leaving your living room. Buy the JBL BAR 1000 Soundbar at PhonePlace.

description:
Samsung 35W PD Power Adapter Duo

The Samsung 35W PD Power Adapter Duo price in Kenya is Ksh 4,500. The new 35W Power Adapter Duo features a USB Type-C port and a full-sized USB Type-A port. The USB Type-C port supports fast charging at 35W, while the USB Type-A port only supports a maximum output of 15W. The charger supports a wide range of Samsung and non-Samsung devices, including tablets, laptops, wireless chargers, and smartwatches.

Samsung 35W PD Power Adapter Duo Features

  • Super Fast Charging: Super Fast, safe and stable, Don’t settle for less – enjoy Super Fast Charging for a wide range of tech essentials even iPhones.
  • The dual-port charger is powerful enough for simultaneous, high-output charging: Experience the powerful, unrivaled excellence of the dual port-equipped.
  • Flexibility: A detachable USB-C to USB-C cable is included in the box, so you can charge your phone from any other USB-C power source such as your computer or a portable battery. Use the cable to sync and transfer files at blazing speeds with your Galaxy or any other compatible smartphone or laptop.
  • Power outputs for a single versus multiple devices vary as follows: Up to 35W when charging a single device under PD 3.0 and SFC (Super Fast Charging) conditions with USB-C. Up to 15W when charging a single device under AFC condition with USB-A. Up to 20W when charging multiple devices under PD 3.0 with USB-C. Up to 15W when charging multiple devices under AFC condition with USB-A.
  • 35W charging is reserved for single-charging PCs only. For mobile phones, tablets, and other compatible devices charging rates may vary depending on device types as well as the number of devices being charged simultaneously.
  • Charging cable not included.

description:
Xiaomi 12S Ultra in Kenya

The Xiaomi 12S Ultra price in Kenya is Ksh 160,000. The Xiaomi 12S Ultra is a premium smartphone with superior features. It has a 6.73-inch LTPO2 AMOLED display screen with an impressive 1440×3200 pixels. It weighs 225g and measures 163.2 x 75 x 9.1 mm.  It is important to note that the device has 67W fast charging support and wireless fast charging (50W) for the 4,860mAh battery. For a phone of such sophistication, the Xiaomi 12S Ultra does not disappoint with a powerful Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1  Octa-Core processor, massive 8/12GB RAM, 256/512 internal memory, and 50.3 MP primary camera. Check on Phoneplace Kenya for price and updates.

Design and Build

Xiaomi 12S Ultra is a beautifully designed premium smartphone. The 6.73-inch panel offers a resolution of 3200 x 1440 pixels and thus achieves a crisp 522 ppi. The Dolby Vision TrueColor display offers a native 10-bit color depth and can naturally cover 100% of the DCI-P3 color space. The screen supports HDR 10 as well as HDR10+ and HLG. The maximum brightness is a brilliant 1500 nits, so even direct sunlight is no problem in terms of the legibility of digital content.

The LTPO 2.0 panel supports variable refresh rates from 1 to 120 Hz. The 5G-enabled device consists of an eco-leather back, and aluminum frame. At the front, a Corning Gorilla Glass protects the AMOLED display. The fingerprint sensor is conveniently placed under the display. It comes in Black and Dark Green color variants, giving users two solid options to pick from for the best experiences.

Performance

The Xiaomi 12S Ultra is one of the fastest devices on the market. This is made possible by the new Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 from Qualcomm. The once again improved CPU clocks with up to 3.2 GHz and is accompanied by a powerful Adreno GPU. A full 12 GB of LPDDR5 RAM supports the processor in everyday use and ensures that even the most demanding apps and games cannot exhaust the smartphone’s performance. Xiaomi also relies on quality for internal storage. The UFS 3.1 ROM is not only generous with 512 GB, but also very fast. A double SIM Card 5G connectivity is a big plus for the premium device, guaranteeing fast connectivity and accessing data on the phone.

Camera

Xiaomi leaves no doubt: The camera throne is the intended goal and the new gigantic Sony IMX989 sensor is the weapon to conquer it. As the first smartphone ever, the Xiaomi 12S Ultra can boast of a 1-inch 50-megapixel sensor, which in combination with the f/1.9 aperture ensures superior photo shots – even in low-light conditions. Ultra-wide-angle shots are also taken at absolutely high-resolution thanks to the 48-megapixel Sony IMX586 sensor with f/2.2 aperture and Leica Summicron support. The telephoto lens is equally high quality, equipped with a 48-megapixel Sony IMX586 sensor with f/4.1 aperture. Thanks to Hyper OIS, superior image stabilization is utilized, allowing for smooth shooting even at zoom. Due to the 120x zoom, this is also much needed.

Battery

Thanks to the large built-in battery, even particularly long days without stopping at the charging cable are no problem. The internal power source is very generous with 4860 mAh and promises outstanding battery runtimes, not least thanks to the adaptive refresh rate and energy-saving OLED technology. The battery can be recharged via USB C cable with up to 67W. The battery does not fill up significantly slower via Wireless Charge thanks to 50W support. Reverse charging with up to 10W is also possible. The specially developed Xiaomi Surge P1 chip ensures intelligent charging and battery management. Both the battery runtime and the lifespan of the internal power sources benefit significantly from the new chip.

Alternative Devices to Xiaomi 12 Ultra

  • Google Pixel 6 Pro
  • OnePlus 10 Pro 5G
  • Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
  • Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G
  • Oppo Find X5 5G

FAQs about the Xiaomi 12 Ultra

  1. What material is used on the Xiaomi 12 Ultra? A Gorilla Glass Victus protection front glass is on display. LTPO AMOLED Glass display. The back is ceramic. The body frame is made of aluminum.
  2. What is the refresh rate of the Xiaomi 12 Ultra? 120GHz.
  3. What is the expected size of the Xiaomi 12S Ultra? 6.73-inch LTPO AMOLED Display.
  4. Does the Xiaomi 12S Ultra display have protection? Yes. Corning Gorilla Glass Victus.
  5. What is the resolution of the Xiaomi 12S Ultra? 1440×3200 pixels (~521 PPI density)
  6. Is the Xiaomi 12S Ultra water and dustproof?  Yes. It is waterproof up to 1.5m water immersion for 30 minutes.
  7. Does the Xiaomi 12S Ultra support 5G? Yes. It supports Network Connectivity up to 5G.
  8. Does the Xiaomi 12S Ultra support fast charging? Yes. It supports fast charging with the 67W fast charger, fast wireless charging 50W, and 10W reverse wireless charging support.
  9. Does the Xiaomi 12S Ultra have Infrared? Yes. It has an infrared port. Infrared is used to transmit data between devices using Infrared rays.
  10. What colors are available for the Xiaomi 12S Ultra? Black and Dark Green.

Check out more Xiaomi phones in Kenya

The Xiaomi 12T has a 5,000mAh battery and comes with a HyperCharge charger that’ll get you back to 100% in as little as 19 minutes. Design and Build

Xiaomi 12T measures 163.1 x 75.9 x 8.6 mm and weighs 202g. it is made of a glass back, plastic frame and body frame, and Gorilla Glass front.

Display

The Xiaomi handset features a 6.67-inch button-hole notch display with a decent 1220 x 2712 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~446 PPI density) resolution. The AMOLED HDR10+ Display has A decent 900 nits peak brightness, ideal for media consumption and video games. A refresh rate of 120Hz ensures peak screen performance and responsiveness. Protecting the bright and responsive display is a Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Enjoy the best experiences on the device without worries of dust, scratches, and display breaking.

Camera

The selfie camera consists of a single 20 MP, f/2.2, (wide), 1/3.47″, 0.8µm Camera with HDR and Panorama. With 20MP, you will get decent, high-quality selfie shots and [email protected]/60fps, [email protected], and HDR-supported video capture.

The main camera is even better. It consists of a triple camera set-up, consisting of:

  • 108 MP, f/1.7, 24mm (wide), 1/1.67″, 0.64µm, PDAF, OIS
  • 8 MP, f/2.2, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/4″, 1.12µm
  • 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) lens.

Capture professional photos of places, people, and moments with a powerful main camera at the rear. Xiaomi loaded their camera with a Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR, and panorama for additional options. The videos, too, are fantastic, considering the handset’s HD, [email protected], [email protected]/60/120fps, and HDR-supported capabilities. Be it in low lighting or a scenic background you want to grasp in your shot. You will get it well done on your Xiaomi 12T.

Performance

Xiaomi 12T runs on Android 12, MIUI 13. With the 12T boasting an efficient MediaTek Dimensity 8100-Ultra chipset, you are assured of decent performance, a powerful Octa-core (4×2.85 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU, and decent Mali-G610 MC6 GPU. You will undoubtedly enjoy multi-tasking, playing all-setting games, and consuming multimedia on your device.

Memory

Considering its internal space options, you will be satisfied with your device. Xiaomi provided two models for its 12T 5G version, consisting of 128GB 8GB RAM and 256GB 8GB RAM WITH UFS Technology. With no card slot for additional memory, I am confident you will find 8GB sufficient RAM, besides the massive up to 256GB internal memory.

Connectivity

Xiaomi 12T is a 5G-enabled smartphone. It supports up to 5G Bands and utilizes HSPA, LTE-A, 5G network speeds. Enjoy fast uploading and downloading speeds on your 5 G-enabled devices as you live to stream an event or video or download your Netflix series to watch later.

The handset supports Bluetooth pairing, GPS, OTG (MicroUSB 2.0, USB On-The-Go), and WLAN (Wi-Fi, Hotspot). It has no FM Radio and no 3.5mm jack. Several sensors are installed on the device. They include Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, compass sensors, color spectrum, and Virtual proximity sensing.

Battery

A decent 5,000mAh non-removable battery is installed on the handset. An efficient chipset maximizes power on the device, with any power wastage from the display, applications, and background operations minimized as much as possible. Xiaomi 12T supports fast charging, with the 120W rapid charger able to charge 100% of the battery in 19 minutes.

Pros and Cons of the Xiaomi 12 Lite 5G

Pros

  • Decent internal memory (128GB 8GB RAM, 256GB 8GB RAM)
  • 120Hz refresh rate
  • Speedy 120W fast charger
  • MediaTek Dimensity 8100-Ultra Chipsetr

Cons

  • Market dependent NFC
  • Price makes it out of reach for some customers
  • No wireless charging support.
  • No Micro SD support
  • No optical zoom on lenses.
  • No water resistance rating.

Verdict

The Xiaomi 12T is worth buying, considering the competitive range and price of the Xiaomi 12 series. It has a competitive price tag compared to other smartphones in the Xiaomi 12 series, even as it retains high-end features. А fast 120W fast charging, massive 108MP main camera, and catchy aesthetics make a compelling case for the smartphone. 4K Video capture puts the icing on the cake.

The Mali-G68 MC4 GPU allows playing games without limitations on the Infinix Zero Ultra 5G.

Connectivity.

Infinix Zero Ultra is a 5G-enabled device. With 5G, you are assured of fast uploading and downloading multimedia speeds, such as videos. Supporting up to  5G bands, the device’s 5G connectivity boasts HSPA 42.2/11.5 Mbps, LTE-A Cat7 300/75 Mbps, and 5G network speed. Other than 5G, Infinix Zero Ultrasupports NFC, GPS, Bluetooth, and WLAN. Pros and cons of Infinix Zero Ultra

Cons

Verdict

Infinix has done an excellent job of introducing yet another powerhouse to the competitive high-end market dominated by Samsung, Apple, and Xiaomi. The design, display, and processing unit make it a must-have device if you love the brand and look at specifications. The camera is a total sellout, with 200MP + ability to shoot 4K videos. Turbo charging is another plus, showing the revolution of battery charging in the modern day. A decent 80% will do for the device. description:
Oppo Reno 8 4G in Kenya

The Oppo Reno 8 4G price in Kenya is around Ksh 40,500. The Reno 8 4G phone features 6.43 inches AMOLED display that refreshes at 90Hz and has a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels. The phone has a triple-camera setup that consists of 64MP + 2MP + 2MP  and a 32 MP camera for selfies. It runs on the Qualcomm SM6225 Snapdragon 680 4G (6 nm) processor with Adreno 610, up to 8GB of RAM, 256GB  storage, on ColorOS 12.1 based on Android 11. The phone is available in Dawnlight Gold, Starlight Black colors, and is powered by a 4500 mAh, non-removable. Buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Reno 8 4G Price, Key Features & Specifications

Model Reno 8 4G
Price Kes 40,000
Announced 17th August 2022
Available on Market 26th August 2022

Colors Dawnlight Gold, and Starlight Black

Design & Build

Oppo Reno 8 4G 20 is a nicely designed, mid-tier smartphone. It boasts a premium finish and beautiful aesthetics, which make it noticeable from other devices. It weighs 182g and measures 159.9 x 73.2 x 7.7 mm. A large side inclined button-hole water-drop notched display dominates its front, while a nicely curved, slightly protruding camera deck is loaded up the rear. Reno 8 is made of a plastic frame, front Panda Glass, and glass back. The device comes in two primary colors: Dawnlight Gold and Starlight Black.

Display

The 6.43-inch AMOLED display with 1080 x 2400 pixels (~409ppi density) dominates the front of the Reno 8 4G. It boasts of 90Hz refresh rate, which is ideal for keeping the multi-touch screen at peak performance. In terms of brightness, the Reno 8 has 430 nits (typ), 600 nits (HBM), and 800 nits (peak) brightness when the screen is turned on. Protecting the multi-touch screen is Panda Glass Enjoy multi-media consumption on the high-resolution display and a great user experience.

Camera

Reno 8 4G has a modest set of cameras, both at the front and the back.

Selfie Camera

Enjoy selfies and video chats on the front facing 32 MP, f/2.4, 24mm (wide), 1/2.74″, 0.8µm camera. It features Panorama, HDR and is capable of [email protected], videos capture. The camera comes equipped with Gyro-EIS, hence high-quality photos and videos.

Main Camera

At the rear, the Reno 8 packs a triple camera set-up consisting of:

  • 64 MP, f/1.7, 26mm (wide), 1/2.0″, 0.7µm, PDAF
  • 2 MP, f/3.3, (microscope)
  • 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth).

With such a camera, you will capture modest pictures and videos of moments at work or away from work with family and friends. The primary camera captures [email protected] videos, features LED flash, HDR, and panorama, and comes equipped with gyro-EIS.

Processing Speed

Enjoy the latest Android applications on Android 12 on the Reno 8 4G. The device also comes with ColorOS 12.1 UI making it easy and memorable to use your phone. Installed on the handset is a powerful Qualcomm SM6225 Snapdragon 680 4G (6 nm) chipset that ensures smooth operations in the background behind the screen. Powering the processing unit is a fast and reliable Octa-core (4×2.4 GHz Kryo 265 Gold & 4×1.9 GHz Kryo 265 Silver) CPU and Adreno 610 GPU. The two units combine to provide a robust platform for multitasking, browsing and consuming multi-media without lags and stuttering (when playing low to mid-level setting games).

Internal Memory Space

Oppo Reno 8 4G boasts 256GB and 8GB RAM internal space. The space is sufficient to enable the storage of media and applications without slowing down the handset. Oppo provided an option to add more storage, with a MicroSD slot available. With 256GB sizeable internal storage, record and store pictures, videos, music, and files at will.

Battery

Oppo Reno 8 4G is powered by a Li-Po 4,500 mAh, non-removable battery. The battery’s capacity will give you (the average user) 24 hours of continuous usage before the need to recharge. To complement and ensure the battery keeps on delivering power as you use the device, Oppo developed a Fast-Charging 33W adapter that comes with the device. Reno 8 4G also supports reverse charging.

Connectivity

Oppo Reno 8 is a 4G-enabled handset. It uses GSM / HSPA / LTE Network Technology. The device supports 4G bands, and runs on HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A speed. It supports Bluetooth connectivity, NFC, GPS, wifi, FM Radio, and OTG. A fingerprint (under the display) sensor, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass are installed on the smartphone.

Pros and Cons of the Reno 8 4G

Pros.

  • Slim design
  • Lightweight handset
  • Impressive chipset performance
  • Supports revers charging
  • Supports fast charging
  • Decent refresh rate of 90Hz
  • Decent battery capacity
  • Powerful front facing camera
  • Water resistant handset (IPX4 Rating)
  • MicroSD supported
  • Massive RAM and ROM
  • Camera has gyro-EIS

Cons

  • Average main camera
  • No stereo speakers
  • No wireless charging support
  • Overpriced for its specifications and performance

Verdict

Reno 8 4G is worth having for its design and performance, at that price.  However, an average camera, 4G Connectivity and less superior processing unit power give it away to other competing devices within the price range such as the Infinix Zero 20. A 65% socre would do for the Reno 8 4G.

FAQs

  • How much does Oppo Reno 8 4G cost? Kes 40,000.
  • Does Oppo Reno 8 4G support 5G? It is 4G-enabled.
  • Does Oppo Reno 8 4G have fast charging? It comes with 33W Fast Charger. It supports reverse charging
  • How many cameras does the Oppo Reno 8 4G have? A single front facing 32 MP, f/2.4, 24mm (wide), 1/2.74″, 0.8µm.
  •  The back consists of: 64 MP, f/1.7, 26mm (wide), 1/2.0″, 0.7µm, PDAF, 2 MP, f/3.3, (microscope), 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth)
  • What is the processing capacity on the Oppo Reno 8 4G? Qualcomm SM6225 Snapdragon 680 4G (6 nm) chipset, Octa-core (4×2.4 GHz Kryo 265 Gold & 4×1.9 GHz Kryo 265 Silver) CPU and Adreno 610 GPU.
  • What is the RAM and Internal Storage on the Oppo Reno 8 4G? 256GB 8GB RAM.
  • What are the sensors installed on the Oppo Reno 8 4G? Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
  • What is the resolution on the Oppo Reno 8 4G? 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~409 ppi density)
  • What are the dimensions on the Oppo Reno 8 4G? 9 x 73.2 x 7.7 mm.
  • What Android Version is the Oppo Reno 8 4G running on? Android 12, ColorOS 12.1.

Alternative Handsets

  • Samsung Galaxy A53 5G
  • Poco F4 5G
  • Tecno Camon 19 Pro Mondrian Edition
  • Realme 9

Design and Build

Xiaomi 12 Lite measures 159.3 x 73.7 x 7.3 mm and weighs 173g. it is made of a glass back, plastic frame and body frame, and Gorilla Glass front.

Display

The Xiaomi handset features a 6.55-inch button-hole notch display with a decent 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~402 ppi density) resolution. The AMOLED Display has A decent 950 nits peak brightness, ideal for media consumption and video games.

Camera

The selfie camera consists of a single 32 MP, f/2.5, (wide), 1/2.8″, 0.8µm, AF Camera with HDR and Panorama. With 32MP, you will get the decent and high-quality selfie shots, and [email protected]/60fps, [email protected] video capture

The main camera is even better. It consists of a triple camera set-up, consisting of:

  • 108 MP, f/1.9, 26mm (wide), 1/1.52″, 0.7µm, PDAF camera
  • 8 MP, f/2.2, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/4.0″, 1.12µm sensor
  • 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) lens.

The main camera setup is the real deal, considering the AI-enhanced cameras’ power and punch. Capture professional photos of places, people and moments with the powerful camera. Xiaomi loaded their camera with a Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR, and panorama for additional options. The videos, too, are fantastic, considering the handset’s HD, [email protected], [email protected]/60/120fps, and gyro-EIS-supported capabilities. Be it in low lighting or a scenic background you want to grasp in your shot. You will get I done on your Xiaomi 12 Lite 5G.

Performance

Xiaomi 12 Lite 5G runs on Android 12, MIUI 13. You are assured of decent performance, with the Lite boasting an efficient Qualcomm SM7325 Snapdragon 778G 5G (6 nm) chipset, powerful Octa-core (1×2.4 GHz Cortex-A78 & 3×2.2 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.9 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU, and decent P Adreno 642L GPU. You will undoubtedly enjoy multi-tasking, playing all-setting games and consuming multi-media on your device.

Memory

Considering its internal space options, you will not be disappointed with your device. Xiaomi provided 3 models for its 12 Lite 5G version, consisting of 128GB 6GB RAM, 128GB 8GB RAM, and 256GB 8GB RAM. With no card slot for additional memory, I am confident you will find 6GB-8GB sufficient RAM, besides the massive up to 256GB internal memory.

Connectivity

Xiaomi 12 Lite 5G is a 5G-enabled smartphone. It supports up to 5G Bands and utilizes  HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, and 5G network speed. Enjoy fast uploading and downloading speeds on your 5 G-enabled devices as you live to stream an event or video or download your Netflix series to watch later.

The handset supports Bluetooth pairing, GPS, OTG (MicroUSB 2.0, USB On-The-Go), and WLAN (Wi-Fi, Hotspot). T has no FM Radio and no 3.5mm jack. Several sensors are installed on the device. They include Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, compass sensors and Virtual proximity sensing.

Battery

A decent 4,300mAh non-removable battery is installed on the handset. With an efficient chipset, power is maximized on the device, with any power wastage from the display, applications and background operations minimized as much as possible. Xiaomi 12 Lite 5G supports fast charging, with the 67W rapid charger able to charge 50% of the battery in 13 minutes. In 30 minutes, your battery should have fully charged as you prepare for a safari or a busy day in the office.

Pros and Cons of the Xiaomi 12 Lite 5G

Pros

  • 120Hz refresh rate
  • Speedy 67W fast charger
  • Commendable Snapdragon 778G chipset
  • Under display fingerprint scanner
  • Powerful camera set up of 108MP
  • 4k snap capabilities
  • Gyro-EIS supported Camera.
  • Gorilla Glass display Protection

Cons

  • Market dependant NFC
  • Price makes it out of reach for some customers
  • No wireless charging support.
  • No Micro SD support
  • Bo optical zoom on lenses.
  • The selfie camera records up to 1080p resolution videos.
  • Average battery capacity.
  • No water resistance rating.

Verdict

The Xiaomi 12 Lite seems like the Lite version of the more expensive Xiaomi 12 Pro. It has a pretty competitive price tag when compared to other smartphones in the Xiaomi 12 series, even as it retains high end features. А fast 67W fast charging, flagship-grade OLED panel, massive 108MP main camera and catchy design make a compelling case for the smartphone. And camera performance is pretty good too.

Build & Design

The device features a large front display and a slightly protruding and nicely designed camera deck at the rear. A simplistic, minimalistic design distinguishes the device from the rest, embracing its status as a powerful, high-end handset. It is built of a Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus), glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus), and aluminum body frame. It measures 155.6 x 73.2 x 8.7 mm and weighs 197g.

Display

A 6.3-inch AMOLED display dominates the front of the device. The display has 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~416 ppi density) resolution., with 90 Hz Refresh Rate and 1000 nits (HBM), 1400 nits (peak). With such a superior display specification, you are guaranteed great experiences when consuming content, playing games, and working on the multi-touch screen.

Performance

Google Pixel 7 runs on Android 13 OS, the latest OS by Android, providing a chance to experience upgrades and new software on the Google device. A Google Tensor G2 (5 nm) chipset in the engine room helps create operational efficiencies across the multiple facets that make the smartphone. Along with the chipset is an Octa-core (2×2.85 GHz Cortex-X1 & 2×2.35 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.80 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU and Mali-G710 MC10 GPU. You can multitask, browse, stream videos, download multimedia content, and make the best phone without limitations.

Space

Google has enabled users to make their phones by installing massive RAM and ROM. With no Card slot, Pixel comes packed with either 128GB 8GB RAM or 256GB 8GB RAM. With such internal space, limited memory space and the slow-running system will not be in your bracket.

Camera

Front Camera

Google Pixel 7 packs a 10.8 MP, f/2.2, 21mm (ultrawide) selfie camera. The camera features Auto-HDR and panorama, which provide excellent options when taking selfies and videos. For videos, the front camera is capable of [email protected]/60fps and [email protected]/60fps video shots.

Main Camera

Packed at the rear of the Pixel 7 is a dual set of cameras consisting of:

  • 50 MP, f/1.9, 25mm (wide), 1/1.31″, 1.2µm, multi-directional PDAF, Laser AF, OIS
  • 12 MP, f/2.2, 114˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.9″, 1.25µm

The set of AI-enhanced cameras at the rear of the device has the capacity for taking decent, professional photos and up to 4K Videos. Dual-LED flash, Pixel Shift, Auto-HDR, and panorama are installed on the device, which are key features necessary to get the best from the main cameras. The main camera can capture [email protected]/60fps, [email protected]/60/120/240fps, gyro-EIS, OIS, and 10-bit HDR video.

Network and Connectivity

Google Pixel 7 is a 5 G-enabled device. It supports up to 5G networks. Enjoy fast uploading and downloading speeds on your device when downloading multimedia. The network speeds on the device are at HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A (CA), and 5G. Several networks are installed on the device. They include Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, and barometer sensors.

Other ways of connectivity include NFC, USB Type-C 3.2, GPS, WLAN (Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6e, tri-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot), Bluetooth (5.2, A2DP, LE, aptX HD). It features no FM Radio or 3.5mm jack for a hands-free connection. To connect to your audio and other smart devices, you must pair using Bluetooth and USB.

Battery

Pixel 7 comes loaded with 4,355mAh non-removable camera, which is quite decent. For charging, make use of the fast charging 20W that charges 50% of the battery in 30 min. the device also supports Fast wireless charging 20W and Reverse wireless charging. The USB Power delivery is 3.0

Huawei Watch Fit 2 in Kenya

The Huawei Watch Fit 2 price in Kenya is Ksh 19,000. Track your health throughout the day with the Huawei Watch Fit 2 Active Black. The Huawei Watch Fit 2 is a rectangular smartwatch with a bright AMOLED display. With the Watch Fit 2, you’re always reachable. You receive smartphone notifications and answer phone calls via your wrist. You can also track your health during the day and night. That’s because the Huawei Watch Fit 2 measures your number of steps, calorie intake, stress level, heart rate, and sleep as well. You can aim your workouts and track your sports performance with one of the many workouts on the watch. Are you going for a run? The watch has an independent music player and built-in GPS. This means you can leave your smartphone at home. This watch has a silicone strap, so it’s suitable to wear during workouts. Buy the Huawei Watch Fit 2 at PhonePlace.

Huawei Watch Fit 2 Features

  • Lets your fingers fly and eyes roam: With its 1.74-inch AMOLED display, framed to perfection by ultra-narrow bezels, the Watch Fit 2 gives you exactly what you need with just a raise of the wrist. From workouts to incoming calls, everything is laid out for you in a refreshingly natural way.
  • Wear your heart on your sleeve: The Watch Fit 2 comes with creative AOD designs for all its stunning watch faces, and the boundless Watch Face Store makes it easy to craft styles that speak to you. A nimble dial packs a treasure trove of everyday features so that your custom view comes in a convenient package.
  • Link to what you love: The smartwatch features an innovative, press-to-release “Link” design, which means that switching straps is as easy as swapping bracelets. Need a different color? Just press, switch, and you’re all set to go!
  • Tap to transfer: Set a picture from your phone as your watch face, by transferring it with just a tap, and showcase entire images on the tantalizing square screen. Then continue to tap away to fit even more life moments onscreen.
  • A battery that goes above and beyond: A full charge on your watch powers up to 10 days of typical use, or 7 days of heavy use, which means you can listen without limits and live life to the fullest, without losing any sleep! You can even get a whole day of use on just a 5-minute charge.
  • Stay mobile, stay connected: The Watch Fit 2 isn’t just a watch; it’s your bona fide communications hub, with support for Bluetooth calling, quick message replies, and imported contacts! Wherever you go, you can rest easy knowing that your calls come to your wrist, and answer or reject them.
  • Slide right, for silky smooth service:
    Sliding right takes you to the HUAWEI Assistant∙TODAY screen, which shows the weather or music playback. You can even use this gesture to wake up the Voice Assistant, for truly effortless service access.
  • An all-purpose health manager: The Watch Fit 2 provides high-level smart features to manage your health, including SpO2, heart rate, sleep, and stress tracking.

Design and Build.

Huawei Watch Fit 2 measures 46 x 33.5 x 10.8 mm. the Active Edition has a wrist size of 30–210 mm, the Classic Edition-140–210 mm, and 120-200 mm for the Elegant Edition. In terms of weight,

  • Elegant Edt-30g (strap).
  • Classic Ed-30g
  • Active Ed-26g

Fit 2 makers equipped the watch with a single flat button on the side and a touchscreen, which is the only way to navigate – you cannot scroll with any rotating button.

Display

Fit 2 has a 1.74-inch AMOLED color screen. It boasts a of resolution of 336 x 480 pixels, ~ 336 ppi. The Fit 2 has a rectangular, compact body and impressively thin bezels. It is compact, fitting between smart bands and smartwatches.

Software

Huawei customarily uses the Harmony OS 2.0 user interface on its wearables, and the Fit 2 is no exception. Harmony OS 2.0 is adapted for the rectangular screen, meaning the menu is only in a list form. There is no option to have all the apps and features on a single screen.

For proper functioning of the Huawei Watch Fit 2, download Huawei Health. It is available on Google Play. Huawei recommends you download it from the play store repository as it has a more up-to-date version.

Performance

With the Watch Fit 2, you’re always reachable. You receive smartphone notifications and answer phone calls via your wrist. You can also track your health during the day and night. That’s because the Huawei Watch Fit 2 measures your number of steps, calorie intake, stress level, heart rate, and sleep as well. You can aim your workouts and track your sports performance with one of the many workouts on the watch. Are you going for a run? The watch has an independent music player and built-in GPS. This means you can leave your smartphone at home. It has 5 ATM Water-resistant rating. You can swim with your device on up to 50 in water.

Connectivity

Connectivity is mainly through Bluetooth (supports 2.4 GHz, supports BT5.2, and BR+BLE). The device also supports NFC.

Battery

The smartwatch has a 292mAh battery. It can go up to 10 days on a single charge with the Always on Display off, and some of the monitoring features turned off.

FAQs

  • What is the display size of the Huawei Watch Fit 2? 74 inches.
  • What is the weight of the Huawei Watch Fit 2? 30g, without the straps.
  • What operating system is used on the Huawei Watch Fit 2? Harmony OS 2.0.
  • How many sporting modes are supported on the Huawei Watch Fit 2? 97 sporting modes.
  • What is the battery life of the Huawei Watch Fit 2? 292mAh, lasting up to 10 days with Always on Display and some monitoring features turned off.
  • Does Huawei Watch Fit 2 support wireless charging? it uses two pogo pins proprietary charger.
  • How much is the Huawei Watch Fit 2 in Kenya? Kes 19,000.
  • What sensors are installed on the Huawei Watch Fit 2? 9-axis IMU sensor, Accelerometer sensor, Gyroscope sensor, Geomagnetic sensor, and Optical heart rate sensor.
  • Is Huawei Watch Fit 2 water resistant? Yes it has 5 ATM Water-resistant rating.

The phone runs on a bloatware-free Android 12 OS with a 3-day 5,050 mAh battery life. Nokia G11 Plus Overview

The Nokia G11 Plus flaunts a 6.52-inch IPS LCD with a 90Hz refresh rate. It gets powered by an Octa-core, Unisoc T606 (12 nm), and a 5,000mAh battery unit. On the optics, the phone has an 8MP selfie camera at the front and a dual-rear 50MP+2MP camera setup. It also offers a rear-mounted fingerprint scanner. The device comes in Lake Blue and Charcoal Grey color variants.

Design, Body Build, and Display

Nokia G11 Plus is sleek and beautifully designed with rounded edges and relatively flat surfaces. The front of the handset has a prominent 6.52-inches IPS LCD, which features a water-drop notch, where the selfie camera is located. The device features a dual camera set-up at the back, where you can take great picture shots and videos.

The G11 Plus measures 164.8 x 75.9 x 8.6 mm and weighs 192g. The device’s body is made of plastic at the back, with a plastic body frame and a glass front. The 6.52-inches display of the Nokia phone is made of IPS LCD with a 90Hz refresh rate to keep the device’s screen in peak performance. The screen-to-body ratio on the device is 82.1%, with a resolution of 720 x 1600 pixels (~269 ppi density). It is not one of the brightest screens compared to other devices, but it will get the job done in terms of optimal user experience.

Processing Unit

The handset features an Octa-core (2×1.6 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.6 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU, with a Unisoc T606 (12 nm) chipset and Mali-G57 MP1 GPU running on the Android 12 Operating System. The processor is robust and reliable for enabling multi-tasking and playing basic games on the device. The 3GB RAM 32GB / 64GB 3GB / 64GB 4GB internal memory space is sufficient to run basic applications and some preferred downloaded applications. The MicroSD expandable option is worthwhile, considering the user needs unlimited space to download and consume media (text and video).

Battery Capacity

A 5,00mAh Li-Po non-removable battery is massive for the Nokia handset, considering other Nokia devices which have characteristically low power capacity. The battery capacity is excellent for optimal usage of the Nokia G11 Plus, without the frequent inconveniences caused by low battery. Fast charging of the battery charging is achieved through a wired 67W wired adapter, which is a valuable inclusion for users.

Connectivity

The Nokia smartphone is a 4G-enabled device that supports GSM/ HSPA/ LTE 4G Network, supporting up to 4G Bands with HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat4 150/50 Mbps speed. It supports Wi-Fi connectivity, with Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot specifications. You can use your phone with other devices through Bluetooth, with the Nokia device boasting 5.0, A2DP, and LE specifications. The USB Type-C 2.0, USB On-The-Go enables charging and transfer of data to other devices. For convenience, the phone is equipped with several sensors. It features a Fingerprint sensor (rear-mounted), Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, and GPS (A-GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO) for easy navigation and location tracking.

  • Does the Nokia G11 Plus display have protection? You have to buy it separately from your vendor.

  • IPX7 waterproof: fully-waterproof casing provides an impenetrable barrier against liquids.

Design and Build

Anker’s Soundcore Motion+ has a simple, minimalistic design. It is lightweight and portable, measuring 8.1 x 7.9 x 25.7cm and weighing 1.05kg.

Sound Quality and Output

The high-resolution audio components on the Motion+ ensure you enjoy fantastic music at any volume. The Qualcomm AptX Technology ramps up the speaker’s performance. Boasting two high-frequency tweeters, passive radiators, and neodymium subwoofers make the Soundcore Motion+ produce incredible, in-depth, intense bass sound. Motion+’s Ultra-wide frequency range stretches from 50 Hz to 40 kHz and is paired with an advanced DSP to ensure that a song’s details and idiosyncrasies are faithfully reproduced. You can take the volume of the speaker device to another level by pairing it with multiple other Motion+ speakers. Get the best sounds and volume all at a press of a button.

Soundcore App

The Anker speaker supports Soundcore App. The built-in app, downloadable on smartphones, enables you to tweak various components of your sound experience and fine-tune to your preference. Use the app to set a sleep timer and turn the speaker’s time off.

Waterproof Capabilities

Anker Soundcore Motion+ has IPX7 Ratings. It is both waterproof and dustproof. You can drop it in a tubful of water, get it rained on, or splash at the poolside party without worrying much about it. However, take caution not to submerge your Anker’s Soundcore Motion+ in more than 3 feet of water. It will survive and carry out, giving you high-quality music in the shower and at poolside parties for many years.

Connectivity

the device supports Bluetooth connectivity.  It is a high-performance Bluetooth speaker. It comes with Bluetooth 5.0 support, giving you faster connectivity and more resilient connectivity.

Battery and Charging

The battery of the Motion+ is as impressive as the sound output.  The battery lasts for 12 hours when used for playtime. This is more than you will ever get for most Bluetooth speakers on the audio market. You can only use USB connectivity to recharge the Soundcore Motion+. Use a Type-C and wired charger to juice up your speaker’s battery and never have a dull moment because of low or no power.

Anker Soundcore Motion+ Performance

Though one could underestimate the minimalistic design approach of the Motion+ Bluetooth speaker, its performance will undoubtedly surprise you. A 15° angle of the speaker plays a significant role in throwing music across the room. It is easily the loudest Bluetooth speaker, with the only competition coming from the respected Boombox speakers. With the speaker, you will hear the fine details of tour music and tunes, thanks to the powerful trebles and mid-ranges built on it.

The BassUp Technology on the speakers means you will enjoy lower and deeper sounds incredibly well. The Codec built into the Motion+ will make you feel like you are not using Bluetooth connectivity. It makes the sound output seem as original, authentic, and unadulterated as it should be. If you have any music quality issues, the Soundcore App ensures you can rectify these emerging fast without many complications.

  1. Is the Anker Soundcore Motion+ Waterproof? It has IPX7 Rating (it is dustproof, and waterproof up to 30m below water).

  5. What are the color options of the Motion+? Blue and Red.

  11. What is the frequency range of the tweeter on the Motion+? An ultra-wide frequency range extending from 50Hz to 40kHz ensures you hear all of a song’s details and nuances.

  13. What is the purpose of the Active Cross Over on the Motion+? Motion+ uses an advanced DSP and amplifiers with individual power sources to preserve the accuracy of highs, mids, and lows.

Measuring 4.13 x 2.62 x 0.5 inches, the battery will comfortably fit into your palm. It weighs 142g making it light and portable as you work or run through a busy schedule that requires you to remain on your phone. The Anker MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery has a built-in bi-directional USB-C port. The port provides flawless compatibility and optimal charging speeds for virtually all USB-C-powered devices. To ensure a smooth user experience, use the correct charging accessories.

MultiProtect Technology

For enhanced and guaranteed safety, Anker applied their MultiProtect technology on the MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery. It has advanced safety features like temperature control, overload protection, and more to let you charge with zero worries.

Compatibility

Anker MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery is compatible with iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Pro, and iPhone 12 Pro Max with a magnetic phone case. The Magnetic Battery is incompatible with non-magnetic phone cases, such as OtterBox Defender Cases.

Alternative Devices

  • Samsung 25W Fast Charger
  • Samsung 45W Fast Charger.
  • MagSafe Charger
  • Anker Power Drive 2 24W Car Charger

FAQs

  1. How do I check the battery power capacity on the Anker 622 (MagGo)? The charging indicators are located at the bottom of the portable charger. When the battery is fully charged, 4 lights on the left will turn off after 10 minutes, whereas the indicator on the far right will keep flashing.
  2. What smartphones are compatible with the Anker 622 (MagGo)? iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 Pro, iPhone 12 Pro Max with a magnetic phone case. The Magnetic Battery is not compatible with non-magnetic phone cases, such as OtterBox Defender Cases.
  3. What are the dimensions of the Anker MagGo 622? 13 x 2.62 x 0.5 inches.
  4. What colors are available for the Anker MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery? Black, Intercellular Gray, and Light Blue.
  5. What specific adapter in terms of Voltage can I use on the Anker MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery? 12V
  6. What is in the box of the Anker MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery package? Anker 622 Magnetic Battery (MagGo), 23.6-inch (60 cm) USB-C to USB-C cable, welcome guide, worry-free 24-month warranty,
  7. Can the Anker MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery be manually turned off?
  8. Can Anker MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery charge 2 or more smartphones simultaneously? It does not support charging two devices at once. The device that’s connected to a cable will be given priority over the device that’s being charged wirelessly.
  9. Does the Anker MagGo 622 Magnetic Battery heat up when in use? When the portable charger is charging or discharging, some heat may be generated due to energy loss during transmission.

Airpods Pro 2 An Overview

The AirPod Pro 2 are better designed and promises better battery life and stronger performance compared to its predecessors. The Apple H2 Chip, an improvement to the H1 Chip brings along many upgrades on the AirPod Pro 2.  Enjoy the New Adaptive Transparency Mode, Richer Bass Performance, an upgraded charging case that can be charged wirelessly using the Apple Watch Charger, and a longer-lasting battery (when the ANC is off and on).

Design

There have been changes to the AirPods Pro 2, compared to the AirPods Pro, with an average performance improvement. The AirPods Pro 2 are true wireless earbuds. They look identical to the AirPods Pro and its other predecessors, with slight alterations. The base of the AirPods 2 has 4 small dots (an acoustic vent and a speaker). The storage case is IPX4 water resistant. It has a small lanyard clip that you can attach to a holder and dangle the AirPods off a strap or bag.

Sound Quality

There is much improvement on the AirPod Pro 2 compared to its predecessors. Apple added new drivers, and amplifiers and upgraded the active noise cancellation feature. The audio quality is much improved on the AirPods Pro 2 compared to its predecessors, especially with a more vibrant, richer, and enhanced bass. The H2 Chip on the device does a great job of enabling noise cancellation, especially when the ANC is turned on. It makes the music more immersive than ever experienced before.

Adaptive Transparency Mode

The new feature on the AirPods Pro 2 enables seamless noise processing, with a big improvement to the Transparency Mode. The H2 chip has enabled Adaptive Transparency. The Transparency Mode enables voice processing naturally, tuning down external sounds to enable you to hear and respond accordingly, rather than be shut off completely.

You can also control the volume of your music from your AirPods using the volume control features on the stem of the device. A new capacitive surface lets you control the volume by sliding your finger up or down the ridge. Apple has integrated their iPhones with the AirPods Pro 2. Using the TrueDepth camera on your iPhone, you can establish a personal listening profile for the best listening experiences that support Spatial Audio.

Battery

Compared to its predecessors, there is a big improvement in the battery life of the AirPod Pro 2.  A more efficient H2 Chipset installed on the device enables the earbuds to last 6 hours off a single charge when using ANC, and 7 without (older AirPods used H1 Chipsets). You can charge the AirPods 2 times, and get 30 hours of use in ANC Mode compared to the 24 hours of use on previous models.

You will be able to charge the case using Apple Watch Charger, which is a new way to juice up power for your pair. Apple wants to hook your watch to your Pods so that you can easily control and listen to music from the reachable screen on your wrist.

 Frequently Asked Questions

  • When will the AirPods Pro 2 be released? 23rd
  • Can I wirelessly charge my AirPods Pro 2? Yes. You will be able to charge the case using Apple Watch Charger
  • Can the AirPods Pro 2 be paired with my Apple Watch? Yes.
  • How long does the Apple AirPods Pro 2 battery last? You can charge the AirPods 2 times, and get 30 hours use in ANC Mode compared to the 24 hours of use on previous models.
  • What does Transparency Mode achieve on the AirPods Pro 2? The Transparency Mode enables voice processing naturally, tuning down external sounds to enable you to hear and respond
  • What Chipset is installed on AirPods Pro 2? Apple H2 Chipset.
  • What makes the AirPods Pro 2 stand out in terms of performance? Great audio improvement, a huge upgrade to noise canceling, and a new capacitive surface on the stem of the AirPods Pro 2 which enables volume control.

An Overview

Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700 makes use of proprietary active noise cancelling technology. It uses microphones both inside and outside the earcups to monitor the sounds around you and instantly produces an opposite signal to cancel them out. With adjustable noise cancelling, you can control how much — or how little — of the outside world you hear. Plus, Conversation Mode lets you simultaneously adjust noise cancelling and pause your music for a quick chat.

Design

The Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700 is a wireless gaming headphone with rechargeable onboard battery power. It has superb sound, comfortable aesthetics, and many other fun features. Active Noise Cancelling automatically adjusts to your surroundings, eliminating distractions for better sound wherever you are. Six mics work together to cancel the noise around you so you can hear the caller better, while four combine to suppress the most disruptive remaining sound around you so the caller can hear you better.

Build

The right ear-cup features capacitive touch sensors, helping manage volume, calls, and music without looking at your phone. Low-profile buttons control the power, noise cancelling presets, and your phone’s default voice assistant, be it Siri, Google Assistant, or Alexa, allowing fast and effortless access to music, messages, and information. The ear cushions are made from plush protein leather for long listening sessions.

Performance

The headband is made of steel with a silicone-covered foam underside. With the integrated Bose Music app, you have an audio dashboard that can create separate user profiles and modify mic settings and up to 6 equalizer settings. It is designed to give you great sound with a spatial 360 sound effect. The Bose SimpleSync can pair with a Bose Smartbar to offer a personal TV listening experience with independent volume control. With a 30 feet range, it can also pair with two different Bluetooth devices, be it a phone, laptop, or extra speaker. The Bose Headphones 700 can deliver up to 20 hours of wireless playtime, in addition to 2hrs play on a 15mins quick charge. The box has an audio jack cable, a detachable mic, and a type C cable. The carrying case comes in a variety of colours.

Inside the case, there is a dedicated cable management compartment with a magnetic cover. This design improves ease of use and utility, while the thin wedge shape also facilitates storage in tight locations, including seat pockets, backpacks, and bags.
  3. Can I change equalizer settings on my Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700? You have 2 options.

-Do nothing and the bass, midrange, and treble of whatever you’re listening to will be adjusted automatically to make it sound great.

-Or choose Equalizer in the settings of the Bose Music app to change the audio levels yourself to however you like them best. Either way, you’ll enjoy immersive sound at any volume.

Design

It is a rugged smartwatch with military Grade Certification and the assurance of 15 MIL-STD-810G certifications. M1 Max is a high-performance desktop, thanks to Apple silicon’s incredible power and efficiency. The design inspiration for Mac Studio was to let the M1 Max – and your creativity – run entirely unrestrained. M1 Max fits perfectly under most displays, putting incredible power and connectivity at arm’s reach right on your desk.

Within the 7.7″ square Mac Studio enclosure lies a groundbreaking thermal system designed to let the M1 Max fly through heavy workloads at screaming-fast speeds – and stay whisper quiet. It is quiet and heat-moderated to prevent overheating, which is characteristic of most machines under a lot of stress.

Studio Set-up

  1. What can I do with Apple M1 Max to make me acquire it? Apple ‌M1 Max‌ is better suited to extremely demanding GPU workflows, such ashigh-level graphic design, 3D modeling, and video editing. Users ‌M1 Max‌’s additional video engines with benefit users working on video editing and video games.
  2. How many threads does Apple M1 Max have? In total, the M1 GPU contains up to 128 Execution units (1024 ALUs). They execute 24,576 threads simultaneously. They have a maximum floating point (FP32) performance of 2.6 TFLOPs.
  3. How fast is the M1 Max? It delivers up to 400GB/s of memory bandwidth — 2x that of M1 Pro and nearly 6x that of M1 — and support for up to 64GB of unified memory.
  4. How much RAM does the M1 Max need? At least 16 GB as the minimum for Intel-based Macs and 8 GB is acceptable for M1-based Macs.
  5. How much power does the M1 Max use?
  6. What type of memory does M1 Max use? Unified memory.
  7. Does the M1 Max heat up? The MacOS lets your CPU cores get up over 100C, but the cooling system is quite efficient in restoring back normal temperatures for the machine.
  8. How many memory channels does the Apple M1 Max have? 8
  9. What is the System –on-Chip (SOC) TO pro systems introduced by M1 Max? M1 Pro and M1 Max introduce a system-on-a-chip (SoC) architecture to pro systems for the first time. The chips feature fast unified memory, industry-leading performance per watt, and incredible power efficiency, along with increased memory bandwidth and capacity.
  10. What makes the M1 Max quick and cool as it processing heavy duty work? The M1 Max has a powerful processing unit and smart cooling system, carefully designed to ensure temperatures fall within requires levels.
  11. How can one rank M1 Max CPU Performance? M1 Max has an up-to-32-core GPU that delivers graphics performance comparable to that in a high-end compact PC pro laptop using up to 40 percent less power.

A Physical look at the Speaker

The Boombox 3 is a 3-way speaker that measures 482.4 x 256.9 x 199.7 mm and weighs 6.7 kg. A sturdy metal handle and orange silicone grips make it possible to easily carry the Boomb3 anywhere: to a friend’s house, out to the back in the garden or even to the beach. The speaker is made of Fabric and Silicone materials. The twin side caps and water/ dust dustproof fabric make it possible for the speaker to handle dust and water splashes without you worrying much.

Speaker and Sound Quality

The JBL Boombox 3 has a 3-way speaker. It brings massive sound and is suitable for any environment: indoors in a packed room of revellers, out in the garden, on the beach, or by the party by the poolside. The speaker device consists of a powerful racetrack-shaped subwoofer, two mid-range drivers, and two tweeters.

It provides a deeper bass compared to the Boombox and Boombox 2. The Boombox 3 has intense clarity and even more robust sound than before. With a daylong battery life before recharge, rest assured of the best 24 hours of listening to your best soundtracks on the JBL Original Pro Sound uninterrupted.

Make use of the PartyBoost feature, explicitly created for music lovers. It will surely enhance your music experience along with the others. Connect your speaker to other JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers for an even bigger and bolder sound.

Waterproof Capabilities

JBL Boombox 3 has IP67 rating. Simply put, the speaker has waterproof and dustproof capabilities and can brave the foulest of weather and conditions. brace for most weather conditions.

Portability

Attached to the wireless speaker is a sturdy metal handle with an eye-catching orange silicone grip. The grip is designed with comfort in mind; the speaker provides the feel of an epic party with the convenience of portability. You will comfortably carry it along to a friend’s party, the beach, or a party in the garden.

Battery

JBL Boombox 3 has a powerful, rechargeable, Lithium 10,000mAh Battery. The battery recharges from 0-100% in 6.5 hours. Be assured of 24 hours of battery life of playtime before the need for recharge for a fully charged battery. The battery voltage is 7.3V. The Boombox will keep your devices and others charged at all times. It has an in-built power bank with enough power for the speaker to recharge your smartphone or devices.

  4. How many devices can I connect the Boombox 3? Wirelessly connect up to 2 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns enjoying JBL Original Pro sound.
  5. Does the Boombox 3 support any Apps? It supports the JBL Portable App. Use the JBL Portable app on your smartphone or tablet to get more out of your Boombox 3. You can customize its settings, activate PartyBoost, unlock additional features, get real-time firmware updates, and more.
  6. What is the use of the JBL PartyBoost on the Boombox 3? Pair with two JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers for stereo sound or link multiple JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers to pump up the party
  7. Can I connect the Boombox 3 to my wired device? Yes. With the AUX input on the Boombox 3, you can hook up and playback audio from any wired device. You can so from your smartphone, your old trusted an old MP3 player or even a turntable.

Apple Watch Ultra An Overview

The Apple Watch Ultra recommended retail price in Kenya is Kes 120,000 in Kenya. The premium Apple smartwatch has a new design that differentiates it from Apple Watch 8 series. Watch Ultra has a revolutionary new design, longer battery life, and improved durability. The design of the Watch Ultra is an evolution of the current rectangular shape. The casing is made up of a durable, more durable formulation of titanium, which makes it extra rugged.

The device is targeted at athletes, climbers, and those who expose such a device to extreme conditions. It offers the first true design since the Series 4. It features a display 7% larger. It measures 2 inches diagonally, hence the 7% larger display than the 1.9-inch diagonal screen size of the 45mm Apple Watch Series 7 and Series 8. It will feature the same casing as the Series 7.

The display resolution on the device is 410 x 502 pixels. The extra display will be used to display extra fitness metrics on a single screen. With a bigger battery, the Apple Watch will last longer for multiple days before recharge. This is a huge plus for those who love to wear their devices without worrying about recharging.

Design, Body Build, and Display

Apple Watch Pro is built with a titanium body frame, a Sapphire Crystal front, and a ceramic/sapphire crystal back.  This gives it a premium look and feel. The display of the Apple Watch is protected by Sapphire crystal glass, making the screen tamper-proof. Measuring 1.92-inches, the Retina LTPO OLED display has a brightness of 2,000 nits and boasts 502 x 410 pixels (~338 PPI density) resolution.

Processing Power and Space

This is a performance-enhance, premium smartwatch. Apple invested in both the processor and production capabilities of the Apple Watch Ultra. Installed on the device are a powerful Dual-Core CPU, Apple S8 Chipset, and PowerVR. This processing unit gives the watch immense capabilities to meet modern-day user expectations. An immense 32GB is quite impressive on the Apple Watch Pro, making the watch quite an exquisite piece of the premium gadget on your wrist. Fast processing of data and a friendly user interface make it a must-have.

Battery

Considering the device has multiple applications and a myriad of functionalities, it has a huge demand for its battery. The battery is larger than the previous models of Apple watches.  The Li-Ion non-removable battery will stay for multiple days before recharging. Charging is done wireless, making it both convenient and fitting your lifestyle and routine.

Sensors.

For optimal productivity, the Apple Watch Pro is equipped with several sensors. They include:

  • Accelerometer, gyro, heart rate, barometer, always-on altimeter, compass, SpO2, VO2max, temperature (body), temperature (water)
  • Skin Temperature Sensing, up to 0.01
  • Depth Gauge when swimming
  • Natural language commands and dictation (talking mode)
  • Ultra-Wideband (UWD) support to help measure distance and locations precisely, while using low energy levels.

description:
Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II in Kenya

The Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II price in Kenya is Ksh 42,000. The Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II, the best-performing portable Bluetooth speaker from Bose, is engineered to spread deep, jaw-dropping sound in every direction. Place it in the center of the room to give everyone the same experience. Or set it near a wall and sound will radiate and reflect around the room, immersing you in that same feeling you felt at your favorite show. The tapered cylindrical shape with a flexible handle makes this wireless speaker easy to grab and go, while a durable aluminum body provides worry-free protection.

And it’s water and dust resistant so you can keep the party going, even if it starts to rain. The rechargeable, lithium-ion battery plays up to 17 hours — for full-day listening. Voice prompts talk you through Bluetooth pairing, and there’s a built-in speakerphone for calls. Use the Bose Connect app to pair two SoundLink speakers for Stereo or Party Mode. The app also helps you manage your devices, unlock features, and access future updates. Available in Triple Black or Luxe Silver. Buy the SoundLink Revolve+ II in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Bose SoundLink Revolve Plus II features and specs

Family SoundLink Revolve
Colour Triple Black
Connectivity Bluetooth version: 4.1
Wireless Range Up to 9m (30ft)
Wireless Capabilities Pair up to 8 devices
Voice Assistant Supported
Voice Assistant Type Access Siri or Google Assistant via your smartphone
 Smart Home Siri or Google Assistant-enabled smart devices
Battery Type lithium-ion
Battery Life Up to 13 Hours of Active Listening
Water Resistant IP55 Rating
Controls Button controls: Power on/off, Bluetooth, Input mode, volume, multi-function
Input/Output Micro-B USB Port, 3.5-mm Auxiliary Port
Weight (kg) 0.66
Additional Features Party Mode/Two Speaker Pairing, SimpleSync, Seamless Aluminium Grille, Silicone Top with Buttons, Silicone Bottom
What’s In The Box SoundLink Revolve II Speaker, USB Cable (micro-B to USB A)
Price in Kenya Ksh 42000

Build and makeover

Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speaker is made of a Seamless aluminum grille. The control buttons have silicon tops, while the bottom is also made of silicone material. It is convenient and durable to carry, with a designed, durable, woven handle. The BT speaker measures 7.25 x 4.13 x 4.13 inches and weighs 0.907 kgs; hence easily portable.

Performance

The SioundLink Revolve+ II is an actual 360° speaker engineered to spread deep, quality sound in every direction. When put in the center of a room, everyone around will get the same quality sound experience. If it is set near a wall, the sound will radiate and reflect around the room, immersing everyone in that same feeling you can feel as if you are at a concert. The flexible handle enables you to go wherever you want to bring the music.

Deep, Quality Sound

Although the BT speaker appears pint-sized, it packs state-of-the-art technology and deep, immersive sound that will catch you by surprise. Measuring 7.25 inches high, 4.13 inches in width   4.13 inches in Depth, Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II packs a highly efficient transducer, dual-passive radiators, and omnidirectional acoustic deflector. All these features and technological installations mean you’ll get lifelike sound and real-life goosebumps.

Water Resistance and Bumps

It is water-resistant. The BT speaker is designed to place in many places you would not place other portable speakers. Be it out in the garden, poolside party, by the kitchen sink, or out in the wild, your most minor worry is accidental or intentional water showering.

The soft silicone material around makes it drop-proof (within reason). If you knock it over, toss it in your bag or set it down a little more complicated than you intended, the soft silicon material will protect it. The speaker is made of a seamless aluminum grille, a silicon top with a button, and a silicon bottom. It is fall, dust and waterproof. All around the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speaker is a seamless aluminum grill protected at the top and bottom by a silicon cover. Bose created a new single-extrusion process to eliminate all seams leaving nothing but beauty.

Handling and carrying around

A flexible fabric handle makes the BT speaker move around. Bose meticulously chose every material for their speaker — right down to the soft, smooth buttons that ensure every interaction feels as natural as you know it should.

Battery

Such a beautifully designed and proven quality sound output device needs an impressive battery to cap it off. Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speaker delivers that with a 17-hour full day of listening, rechargeable lithium-ion battery. Without compromising on the deep sound, it gives as you stream your music and entertainment. The charging time for your flat battery is up to 4 hours when using the provided cable and USB power supply. Using an alternate USB power source or charging while playing music may increase charging time.

Microphones and Controls

The Bose speaker has an installed Microphone for voice pick-up built into the top control pad. To control the speaker and set it to your preferred volume, tone, and sound quality, use the various silicon-covered buttons installed at the top of the speaker. The button controls include:

  • Power on/off
  • Bluetooth
  • Input mode
  • Volume
  • Multi-function

Bose App, Google Assistant, and Siri Options

The speaker supports the use of Google Assistant and Apple’s Siri. Just press and hold the multi-function button to access the voice input for your phone’s Siri or Google Assistant right from the speaker to give instructions or place an order.

The Bose App gives you access and easy control of everything on the SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speaker. Get tips, unlock product features, and personalize your settings to enjoy the music more instead of tedious manual setups. With a single swipe, you can manage your speaker’s BT connections. Activate the Party Mode to turn up the sound and music output to play two wireless speakers simultaneously. You can explore the Stereo Mode option for dedicated left and right playback, giving you a complete and dynamic surround sound experience.

Alternative BT speakers

  • JBL Partybox Encore Essential
  • JBL Xtreme 3
  • Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7

FAQs

  • Can I connect and play more than two SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speakers simultaneously?
  • How long does the battery take to fully charge the SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speaker? How does it last after use? 4 hours to fully charge, using its original cable. 17 hours of continuous music playing before the need for a recharge.
  • What is the Bluetooth range of the SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speaker?
  • What material is the SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speaker exterior made from? Seamless aluminum grille, Silicone top with buttons, Silicone bottom, Convenient and durable woven carry handle
  • Does the SoundLink Revolve+ II Bluetooth speaker have a Microphone? A microphone for voice pick-up is built into the top control pad.
  • What colors are available for the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Speaker? Triple Black and Luxe Silver.
  • What App is the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Speaker compatible with? Bose App.
  • What types of audio sources can one use with the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Speaker? The audio connection options for the SoundLink Revolve and Revolve+ II are Bluetooth and 3.5 mm stereo audio cable. NFC can also help facilitate Bluetooth pairing.
  • Can 2 Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Speakers be connected on Bluetooth in Party Mode? The SoundLink Revolve II and Revolve+ II have a Party Mode feature. This feature requires any two Bose Bluetooth speakers from the following list: SoundLink Color II, SoundLink Micro, SoundLink Revolve, SoundLink Revolve+, SoundLink Revolve II, or SoundLink Revolve+ II.
  • How many devices can a user pair on his Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Speaker? SoundLink Revolve II speakers keep track of the last eight devices that were paired and connected to them, dropping the least recently used device when a new one is paired.
  • What does IP55 for Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Speaker mean? The IP55 rating classifies the degrees of protection provided against the intrusion of solid objects (including body parts like hands and fingers), dust, accidental contact, and water in electrical enclosures. For SoundLink Revolve II and Revolve+ II, we’ve stretched beyond the required testing parameters, to ensure that your speaker will long outlast an accidental showering of water. This means that you can use SoundLink Revolve II and Revolve+ II in more places and not worry if it gets wet (for example, splashes by the pool, washing your car, splashes in the kitchen, etc.). Just don’t submerge it.
  • Can I pair my smartphone or tablet to the Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Speaker and use it as a point for audio output? However, the quality of the experience — specifically, synchronization between audio and video — may be compromised due to various signal processing technologies implemented in the speakers. This is true, especially when using Bluetooth as your input. For better synchronization and lower latency, we recommend you use the Auxiliary or USB Audio inputs. For the best experience, please update your speaker’s software.

No matter the orientation, PositionIQ technology optimizes sound. The SoundLink Flex has a sophisticated, inviting aesthetic and an industrial design that blends durability, portability, and utility. With its silicone body, powder-coated steel grille, and reliable utility loop, SoundLink Flex goes where you go and plays as you play. Listen to music while hiking, camping, or paddleboarding — even while taking a shower or enjoying a sunset on the patio. Buy the SoundLink Flex in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Build

SoundLink Flex Bluetooth speaker​ is available in Black, Stone Blue, White Smoke, and Carmine Red colors. It measures 3.6 x 7.9 x 2.1 inches. The BT Speaker is made of a Soft-touch silicone exterior and powder-coated steel grille with a fabric utility loop.

Waterproof Material

The portable speaker by Bose is made for going wherever you need to go. It is a perfect musical sidekick for days out and nights in. Bose SoundLink Flex BT speaker is both dustproof and waterproof. A powder-coated steel grille and silicone exterior make the device adventure ready. Its tough exterior can withstand drops and scratches. The speaker’s powder coat won’t peel and is resistant to rust corrosion and  UV light.

PositionIQ

It is packed with state-of-the-art tech. Its innovative transducer ensures the clearest possible sound, meaning you hear distinct instruments, nuances in the vocals, and balanced treble and bass. The PositionIQ Technology enables the Bose SoundLink to automatically adjust to its orientation to optimize sound output.  Whether held or placed upright, on its back or hanging from its tear-resistant loop, the PositionIQ ensures you always hear your music in full, balanced tones.

Battery

The Flex BT speaker has a rechargeable lithium-ion battery with a 12 hours battery life the Charging time IS approximately 4 hours when using its original Type C cable.

FAQs

  • Is the Bose Soundlink Flex USB Port waterproof and dustproof? All of SoundLink Flex’s components, including the USB-C charging port, are built with rugged, waterproof materials. If water or dust enters the USB-C port, the speaker won’t be damaged, because its interior components are sealed tightly to ensure protection from water, dust, and debris.
  • Can a user pair a BOSE Soundlink Flex with another Bose Bluetooth Speaker without the Bose Connect App? You can pair a Bose SoundLink Flex with another Bose Bluetooth speaker without using the Bose Connect app. To manually pair a SoundLink Flex with another Bose Bluetooth speaker, make sure both speakers are powered on and one speaker is connected to your mobile device. On the speaker connected to your device, press and hold the Bluetooth and the Volume up (+) buttons simultaneously. Release the buttons when you hear “Press the Bluetooth and Volume down buttons simultaneously on a second Bose device.” On the other speaker, press and hold the Bluetooth and Volume down (–) buttons simultaneously. Release the buttons when the speaker emits a tone. After about 10 seconds, you hear “Party mode” from both speakers simultaneously. Party mode is enabled, and you are now able to play audio in unison using your mobile device.
  • Can I connect my smartphone to the Bose Soundflex without using the Bose App? You can manually pair your mobile device to a SoundLink Flex speaker without using the Bose Connect app. enable Bluetooth in your phone’s settings. Power on the SoundLink Flex and press and hold the Bluetooth button. You will hear, “Ready to connect,” and the speaker’s Bluetooth light will blink blue. In your phone’s settings, choose “Bose Flex SoundLink” from the list of devices. You will hear “Connected to <mobile device name>” and the speaker’s Bluetooth light will become solid white, indicating that your mobile device and speaker are connected.
  • How long does it take to charge the Bose Soundlink Flex? Battery life up to 12 hours. Charging time: approximately 4 hours when using the original cable.
  • What are the charging options available on the Bose Soundlink Flex speaker? It employs a standard USB-C charging interface and can receive power from nearly any USB power source. For best results, use the included USB-C to USB-A cable with a USB power source rated for at least 1.5 amps (not included).
  • How long does the Bose Soundlink Flex BT speaker battery last? 12 hours.
  • Does the Bose SoundLink Flex BT speaker support Wi-Fi? Wireless connection is by Bluetooth only.
  • How does the Stereo Mode on Bose Soundlink Flex BT speaker operate? Stereo Mode enables a stereo audio experience via two Bose Bluetooth speakers from the following list: SoundLink Flex, SoundLink Micro, SoundLink Color II, SoundLink Revolve (II), and SoundLink Revolve+ (II). The primary method of entering this mode is through the Bose Connect app.
  • How does the party mode work on the Bose Soundlink Flex BT Speaker operate? Party Mode lets you connect two Bose Bluetooth speakers to play audio in perfect sync. This feature requires any two Bose Bluetooth speakers from the following list: SoundLink Flex, SoundLink Micro, SoundLink Color II, SoundLink Revolve (series I & II), and SoundLink Revolve+ (series I & II). The primary method of entering this mode is through the Bose Connect app.
  • What is the range of the Bose Soundlink Flex BT Speaker’s performance?

Design, Body and Display

Besides its ergonomic design, the Nokia C31 has great aesthetics that appeal to the eye. A massive 6.75-inch and brightly lit screen will catch your eye. The Grey and Blue color variants hide much, considering the device’s capabilities when put to the test. The back and body frame of the Nokia X31 is made of plastic, while the front is predominantly made of glass.

The handset has a dominant 6.75-inch IPS LCD with a resolution of 720 x 1600 pixels, translating to ~260 ppi in terms of density. The IPS LCD screen on the handset has a refresh rate of 60Hz. A 2.5D toughened glass protects the glass. You can enjoy it optimally from the large screen, above-average refresh rate, and average pixel resolution, which is great when playing video games and consuming media on the handset.

Cameras

Capture important life moments that matter to you with the cameras on the device. The selfie camera consists of a 5MP camera. Nokia could better with this, considering how low the pixelation is, compared to other devices. At the back, capture important life moments and record videos with a triple camera setup consisting of 13 MP (wide), AF + 2 MP, (macro) + 2 MP, (depth). The main camera features a LED Flash and HDR and can capture [email protected] videos.

Performance and Battery

Enjoy a robust and fast performance on your Nokia C31, running on Android 12 and equipped with Unisoc SC9863A (28nm) chipset. A powerful processing unit is installed on the handset, consisting of an Octa-core (4×1.6 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×1.2 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU and IMG8322 GPU. You can browse the internet, quickly process data, multi-task, and play low to medium-setting games without experiencing lagging.

Nokia C31 comes in 3 variants, giving you great choices based on your need, budget, and preferences. The variants in terms of internal space are models with 32GB 3GB RAM / 64GB 4GB RAM / 128GB 4GB RAM. Additional memory is supported, with the MicroSD card supporting up to 256GB. A 5,050 Li-Po non-removable battery powers the handset. It can stay for three working days before recharge. It supports 10W, 5V/2A Charging.

Network and Connectivity

Nokia C31 is a 4G-enabled handset. With speeds of HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE, and supported by GSM / HSPA / LTE Network Technology, the handset is ideal in the current market for customers demanding fast connectivity, uploading, and downloading of data. Depending on your network provider’s strength, you can use the 2G, 3G, and 4G Bands.

Besides network connectivity, you can transfer data via Bluetooth through Bluetooth pairing, OTG transfer, and data access via the USB Type-C port and NFC. Wireless connectivity is enabled for Wi-Fi and network connectivity. Make use of all these options to enjoy your Nokia C31 device fully. GPS (A-GPS) is enabled on the device for better navigability, especially if you are a motorist and find yourself in unfamiliar regions and need to trace or GET traced. You will find the rear-mounted fingerprint scanner useful in enhancing the security access of your device alongside the Face ID and unlock feature on the front-facing camera.

Released to the market on May 27 2022, the  Samsung Galaxy M13 price in Kenya from Kes 20,500. It features a 6.6-inch water-drop display with a 1080 x 2408 pixels resolution. It weighs 192g and by size is 165.4 x 76.9 x 8.4 mm. The M13 runs on the latest Android platform, Android 12 on top off One UI Core 4.1. It is powered by a powerful Octa-Core, Exynos 850 (8nm) processor. You will love the 8MP selfie camera and an impressive 50MP+5MP+2MP camera set-up at the back of the device. A 64GB 4GB RAM / 128GB 6GB RAM space specifications wrap up an awesome, high-performance device available if you are budget constrained but still seek associated with the best Samsung can offer. Samsung Galaxy M14 4G is available at Phoneplace in Deep Green, Orange Copper, and Light Blue color variants.
