Design and Build

The Samsung Galaxy M13 takes up a minimalist design and build. Its soft round edges and thin frame characteristically define the smartphone, whose thickness is 8.8mm. The device comes in unique colors of Deep Green, Orange Copper, and Light Blue. While a large 6.6-inch water-drop display dominates the front, the back has a slightly protruding frame that houses the main camera set-up. Samsung Galaxy smartphones always achieve a luxury status, and the M14 is quite luxurious for the price, especially when you consider the hidden details in the minimalistic look.

Display

A dominant 6.6-inch PLS LCD with a refresh rate of 60Hz will catch your eye the first time you get hold of the Samsung Galaxy M13.  The PLS LCD with 1080 x 2408 pixels resolution (~ 400 ppi densities) will give you a rich experience as you consume your content, work, and socialize. A 60Hz refresh rate ensures peak performance with no lagging and stuttering as it takes the device through its paces. Corning Gorilla Glass Glass protection makes the screen tamper-proof.

Connectivity

The Samsung Galaxy M13 supports up to 4G Network Connectivity. It means faster data download, upload speeds, and connection when communicating on the network.

Camera

The device has a high-performing Samsung Galaxy M13 4G triple camera system. The main camera system at the rear of the device comprises a 50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), PDAF camera, supported by 5 MP, f/2.2, 123˚ (ultrawide) lens and 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth) lens.. The width, depth, and macro lens camera enable high-quality capture and images and videos, balancing light, brightness, ambiance, and softness while eliminating noise for more clarity. At the front, the Samsung Galaxy M13 parks a 8 MP, f/2.2, (wide) camera that captures 1080p videos up to 30fps.

Performance

Space: The device comes with 4GB RAM, which is significant for the smooth running of the numerous pre-installed applications, along with other basic downloads. The internal memory of 64 / 256GB complements the fairly large RAM, and additional external addition of memory (optional, up to 1 TB) .

Processing Power: A powerful Octa-Core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) Processor keeps the device going without lagging or stuttering, whether the user is multi-tasking, live streaming a video, or playing their favorite mobile video. Running on the latest Android platform, Android 12, the Samsung Galaxy integrated its One User Interface (UI) to enable users to customize and optimize their experience with the device. Exynos 850 (8nm) and Mali-G52 GPU validate that the Samsung Galaxy M53 is a powerful, high-performance smartphone. With processor speeds of 2GHz, the M13 is up to the task of whatever challenges you throw at it.

Battery

A 5,000 mAh non-removable battery powers the Samsung Galaxy M13. The battery adequately meets the demands of the highly demanding device, whose bright screen resolution could quickly otherwise drain a battery of lesser power and inconvenience the user. A fast charger of 25W enables fast charging of the battery, hence the assurance of charging on the go.

Other Unique Features of the Samsung Galaxy M13 4G

  • The Kids Mode protects children from harmful and indecent content exposure
  • The Knox security system protects the users’ data from malicious hardware and software threats and attacks
  • A side-mounted Fingerprint sensor that helps control unauthorized access to the device
  • The face-unlock security feature, which only unlocks through Face Recognition
  • Sensors: Fingerprint, Gyroscope, Accelerometer, Gyro, Proximity, Compass.

Design, Body Build and Display

Xiaomi Redmi K5oi is a big handset with nicely curved edges and a relatively flat surface. It weighs 200g and measures 163.6 x 74.3 x 8.9 mm. The front of the device is dominated by a large display, while the main camera deck dominates the back. The Redmi phone’s body frame is made of plastic, the same as the back.

Display

The hole-notch 6.6-inch display dominates the front of the Redmi K50i. The FFS LCD has a refresh rate of 144Hz and 650 nits (HBM) peak brightness. Its resolution. Enjoy incredible image views and videos on the 1080 x 2460 pixels (~407 ppi density) resolution. You are guaranteed a tamper-proof display, with the Corning Gorilla Glass 5 offering protection against dust and scratches.

Performance and Battery

Processing Power

The handset runs on the latest Android 12, MIUI 13 operating system. Enjoy a friendly interaction with applications on the handsets through the MIUI 13 interface provided by Xiaomi. A fast and efficient MediaTek Dimensity 8100 (5 nm) chipset is installed on the device, enabling smooth and seamless execution of commands issues. Complementing the chipset is a powerful Octa-core (4×2.85 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU and Mali-G610 MC6, which ensure you cannot not only multi-task, browse, and stream videos without much hustle, but also download and play your favorite games without hustle.

Space

There is enough internal storage you can wish for, with the Redmi device coming in 3 variants:  128GB 6GB RAM, 128GB 8GB RAM, and 256GB 8GB RAM. Take your pick based on your need, budget, and other technical preferences.

Battery

Powering the device is a powerful and massive 5,080mAh, Li-Po, non-removable battery. Considering the immense demands the big and powerful handset has on the battery, once you power it on and get immersed in either work or entertainment, you will find the 67W fast charger handy and necessary. It will fully charge 0-100% of the battery in 46 minutes and get you going like you never stopped.

Camera

One outstanding feature of the Redmi K50i is its camera set-up. It is fronted by a robust 16 MP, f/2.5, (wide) camera. Maximize on it for the best selfies and awesome [email protected] video takes. At the rear, capture precious life moments of places and moments with a triple 64 MP, f/1.9, (wide), 1/1.72″, 0.8µm, PDAF + 8 MP, f/2.2, 120˚, (ultrawide) + 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) lenses all which are integrated, and AI-enhanced. The main camera features LED flash, HDR, and panorama and capture [email protected], [email protected]/60fps videos.

Connectivity and Sensors

Network

Xiaomi Redmi K5oi is a 5G-enabled handset. Enjoy fast speed, whether you are browsing, uploading, or downloading content for consumption. Running on GSM / HSPA / LTE / 5G, Redmi K50i supports up to 5G Network, with 5G Bands (1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 20, 28, 38, 40, 41, 77, 78 SA/NSA) running up to speed specifications of HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A (CA), 5G.

Connectivity

It supports USB Type-C 2.0, USB On-The-Go, enabling access and transfer of data from your USB Stick or device with a USB port. It has an infrared port and supports the same, alongside WiFi connectivity and Bluetooth.

Sensors.

Xiaomi Redmi K5oi has a side-mounted fingerprint scanner. The scanner comes along with an accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass, color spectrum sensors. GPS is also installed on the handset (A-GPS. Up to dual-band: GLONASS (1), BDS (2), GALILEO (1), QZSS).

description:
Google Pixel 6a in Kenya

The Google Pixel 6a price in Kenya is Ksh 67,000. The Google Pixel 6a features a 6.2-inch AMOLED, 60Hz display, Android 12, and Google Tensor (5 nm) processor with Mali-G78 MP20 GPU. It also comes with a dual 12.2 MP + 12 MP rear camera and an 8 MP front camera for selfies. The Pixel 6a runs on an 6GB Ram with 128GB storage and all this is powered by a 4410 mAh battery. The phone arrives in the colors, Sorta Seafoam, and Stormy Black. You can buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace for the best price.

Google Pixel 6a specs & price in Kenya

Price in Kenya Ksh 67,000
Processor Google Tensor processor
RAM 6GB
OS Android 12
SIM Dual SIM (nano + eSIM)
Rear Cameras 12.2 MP + 12MP
Front Camera 8MP
Features In-display fingerprint scanner, USB Type-C audio, Stereo speakers, 3 microphones
Dimensions 152.2 x 71.8 x 8.7 mm

Storage 128GB
Battery/Charger 4410 battery with 18W

Design and build

The Google Pixel 6a, like the Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro, stands out from other phone models and its predecessors as well. This is because of its uniquely designed camera bump. It extends as a black bar across the whole back panel. This allows Google to go for a two-tone look with a different color above and below the camera strap. It is available in three color options Chalk, Charcoal and Sage. The camera bump sticks out quite a bit from the back. But at least since it’s all the way across, it doesn’t make the phone wobble.

Display

The Google Pixel 6a’s display is a flat 6.2-inch AMOLED with a 1080P resolution and a punch hole for this selfie shooter. Other people prefer this flat screen to the Pro model’s curved one. But unlike the Pro model, this one does not have a high refresh rate which might be considered a deal-breaker. It is capped at 60Hz. Albeit, the regular Pixel 6a display is quite decent. It’s sharp enough and smooth enough, even without those higher-end specs. Thanks to AMOLED technology you get those nice pictures and there’s HDR 10 Plus support. You also get an under-display fingerprint reader for your biometrics and a high 424 PPI density.

Camera’s performance

When it comes to the cameras of the Google Pixel 6a, this one is probably one of the main selling points for the Pixel 6a. Pixel phones have impressive performance that you can do a lot with. Google Pixel five-camera nets quite a few stunning photos. This one sports a 12.2 MP, f/1.7, 27mm (wide), 1/2.55″, 1.4µm, dual pixel PDAF, OIS main camera lens.

The ultra-wide camera of the Google Pixel 6a captures very good photos with lots of detail although the field of view isn’t as wide as on some competitors. Google Pixel 6a has an 8-megapixel selfie camera and it produces sharp and detailed images with minimal noise. The colors are pleasant and the dynamic range is excellent. Video can be captured with the main camera and up to 4k resolution at 60 FPS. 4k footage is very good with competitive sharpness and detail. The ultra-wide camera’s footage is also sharp and detailed matching the main camera.

Performance

On Google Pixel 6a, there is a choice of 128GB onboard. One of the major developments of this year’s Pixel phones is that they feature the new 5-nanometer Tensor chipset built in-house by Google. This is a move by the company to provide a more proprietary experience, and also to stand out from other manufacturers. Since this is the first generation software-wise, the Pixel 6a doesn’t feel so different from other high-end Android phones. Except for the fact that it runs the new Android 12, which provides things like color themes for your icons and menu.

Google Tensor (5 nm) however does provide neat features like Google’s automatic speech recognition is more advanced than ever before. And real-time translation is becoming even more of a reality. Both in actual conversations, as well as the captions for videos that you’re watching. Google Tensor’s (5 nm) performance is excellent compared to the high-end Snapdragon 888 chipset.

Battery

The Google Pixel 6a does a decent job with this 4410 mAh battery. This capacity is slightly larger than that of Google Pixel 6‘s which is Li-Ion 4614 mAh. It scores an endurance rating of 90 hours in proprietary tests. The phone doesn’t actually come with a charger in the box. Its fast charging 30W gives it a quick 50% in 30 minutes boost. There is however no mention of Fast wireless charging 21W, or Reverse wireless charging as we see on the model we have just compared it to.

Furthermore, for the build of the Nokia C21 Plus smartphone, you get a Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) smartphone with up to HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat4 150/50 Mbps of 4G speeds. Platform and performance

Android 11 (Go edition) is a lightning-speed OS built for smartphones with less than 2 GB of RAM. It is what powers the Nokia C21 Plus seeing that it comes with 2GB of RAM and 64GB of expandable internal storage. The microSDXC for storage expansion has a dedicated slot which means you won’t have to do away with one SIM card in order to utilize this feature. The phone is also available in 32GB 3GB RAM, 64GB 3GB RAM memory eMMC 5.1 opinions. Performance-wise this phone has an entry-level Unisoc SC9863A (28nm) chipset, an Octa-core (4×1.6 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×1.2 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU, and an IMG8322 GPU. Not so much to say here is there? Buy for a chipset that was announced on November 27, 2018, and is manufactured using a 28-nanometer process technology, this phone holds up just fine. It also has a 3000 mAh, removable battery that should last up to 2 days of usage given the level at which it performs.

Other features

The Nokia C21 Plus smartphone also features an 8 MP main camera, a 5 MP selfie camera, a Fingerprint (rear-mounted), and it can shoot videos up to [email protected] quality. As far as connectivity features are concerned, we are looking at Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, hotspot, Bluetooth 4.2, A2DP, GPS with A-GPS, FM Radio, and a micro USB 2.0 port which is a bummer.

The Infinix Note 12 Pro 5G is a sleek, curved, flat phone with a beautiful 6.7-inch AMOLED display that dominates the front of the device. A water-drop notch is pre-dominated on the upper end of the screen to accommodate the 16mp front camera. The device’s rear is dominated by a slightly bulging camera deck that protects the triple camera system alongside the quad-LED flash. The Note 12 Pro 5G weighs 188g and measures 164.7 x 76.9 x 8 mm, which is quite comfortable to hold and carry around. A massive  5,000mAh non-removable battery powers the device. A 33W fast charger enables fast charging.

In terms of memory, the device boasts 8GB RAM and 128GB internal memory, sufficient to run tasks and download necessary applications and preferred content for the user’s consumption. To run the Infinix Note 12 Pro 5G, an Octa-Core CPU and MediaTek MT6833P Dimensity 810 (6 nm) chipset enable smooth operations and quick response to the user’s commands. A Mali-G57 MC2 sufficiently handles low to middle-setting video games that do not demand too much of the device to avoid lagging and stuttering. Convenient locking and unlocking are abled by a fingerprint sensor placed on the side of the smartphone. The Infinix Note 12 Pro 5G is available at Phoneplace Kenya for Kes 33,500. It comes in 2 color variants: Black and White.

Design, Build and Display

The Infinix Note 12 Pro 5G boasts an impressive ergonomic design, like its predecessor Infinix Note 12, Note 12 5G. The rounded and curved corners and edges make it easy to handle and appealing aesthetics attractive to look at and own. The front is made of glass, while the back and body frame is made of plastic. Whereas the front has a symmetrically placed water drop notch that accommodates the selfie camera, the back is dominated by the main camera deck. The distinctive camera rings protect the lenses and give the device a mean but appealing look. Considering the camera deck houses a massive 108MP primary camera and support cameras, it makes sense that Infinix went the extra mile to make this point.

The 6.7 inches is impressive and massive for any smart device. Infinix made a statement with the mid-range Infinix Note 12 Pro 5G, especially when it goes to the screen. The 6.7-inches AMOLED display screen has 6.7 inches, 108.4 cm2 (~85.6% screen-to-body ratio) and boasts an incredible 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~393 PPI density). Such high resolution assures users of excellent experiences when consuming content and tasking the device for productivity. A touch sampling rate of 120Hz enables fast touch response and minimal lags. To protect the multi-touch sensitive screen from breaking, scratches, and dust, Infinix invested in installing a Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection on their Note 12 Pro 5G.

Camera

The front has a single, 16 MP, f/2.0, (wide) selfie camera, which features a dual LED flash with video capabilities of [email protected] It is impressive in terms of the capability and performance of a selfie front-facing camera. The main camera is a triple set at the rear of the device. The camera set consists of a massive 108 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), PDAF main camera, a 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) supporting camera, and a 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth) camera.

The triple-integrated set of cameras provides users with a superior camera and video performance. The camera system features panorama, HDR, and a Quad-LED flash. It captures [email protected] videos. In support of the multi-media, the device has dual speakers and a 3.5mm audio jack to enable hands-free listening to music or watching video content.

Performance and Battery

The device runs on Android 12. For an optimized user interface, the Note 12 Pro 5G comes with an XOS 10.6 cover to support the OS. Its operations run on the MediaTek MT6833P Dimensity 810 (6 nm) chipset. The Octa-Core Octa-core (2×2.4 GHz Cortex-A76 & 6×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) completes the chipset to enable superior performances when put to task.

The Mali-G57 MC2 GPU enables smooth operations when playing video games and working on graphic content. The Infinix Note 12 Pro 5G is equipped with 8GB RAM and 128GB internal memory to enable optimal performance. For users who wish to increase their memory capacity, a MicroSD slot is available with the option of up to 2TB of external storage support.

Battery and Connectivity

A non-removable 5,000mAh battery powers Infinix Note 12 Pro 5G. A 33W wired fast charger comes with the device in the box for convenient, fast charging on the go. The device supports 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Networks. Depending on the service provider’s signal strength, rest assured of fast upload and download speeds of data and fast and uncompromised connectivity.

It has a dedicated Type-C 2.0 port for charging and data transfer. The device supports Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, and one can share the internet through a hotspot. It uses Bluetooth 5.0, A2DP, LE for wireless connection to pair with other devices. It does not support NFC, and FM Radio availability is yet to be confirmed. OTG connectivity is supported on Note 12 5G, with the specific USB Type-C 2.0.

The phone is powered by the MediaTek Helio G35 SoC and runs ColorOS 12.1 out of the box. Fueling the entire package is a 5,000 mAh battery with 33W charging support, advertised to charge 53% in 30 minutes and 100% in 69 minutes. The A77 4G comes in Sunset Orange (leather), and Sky Blue colors. Buy the Oppo A77 4G at PhonePlace.

An Overview

The phone comprises a 6.56-inch IPS LCD Display with a refresh rate of 90Hz. Weighing 187g, the ergonomically designed and beautiful-looking Oppo A77 4G measures 163.8 x 75 x 8 mm. The front display features a prominent water-drop notch that accommodates the front-facing single, 8 MP, f/2.0, 26mm (wide) selfie camera. At the back, the device consists of a plastic cover enclosing a Li-Po 5000 mAh, non-removable battery. A dual, 50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), PDAF and 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth) main camera is located at the back, enabling you to capture moments with high-quality videos and snaps. The device has a powerful Octa-core (4×2.3 GHz Cortex-A53 & 4×1.8 GHz Cortex-A53), MediaTek MT6765G Helio G35 (12 nm) processor. A 4GB RAM 64GB internal memory is quite sufficient to enable the basic software to run the system and accommodate multi-media content for consumption. The device runs on Android 12, ColorOS 12.1, and has a dedicated MicroSD for additional memory.

Handset Design, Body Build, and Display

Design:   The device features straight and curved edges, is as light as a feather, and boasts excellent ergonomic styling. Not only is Oppo A77 4G re-assuring and classical but contemporary to the core for sophisticated, modern-day users.

Body Build: The phone is made of a glass front, plastic body frame, and a leather back cover. Available in Sunset Orange and Sky Blue, the device’s body build makes it feather light with a weight of 187g.

Display: You will enjoy maximum content consumption and get down to constructive work with a large, bright 720 x 1612 pixels (~ 269 PPI densities). At peak brightness, the screen has 600 nits of output. The IPS LCD has an 84.2% screen-to-body ratio and a refresh rate of 90Hz.

Performance and Battery

The oppo is a robust mid-range device built to perform. It boasts of either 4GB RAM or 64GB internal memory space, depending on your budget and preference.  Tecno Camon 19 Pro Review

The Tecno Camon 19 Pro has an impressive 6.8-inch IPS LCD screen whose resolution is 1080 x 2490 pixels. With a refresh rate of 120 GHz, your commands by the touch of your fingers are promptly reflected on the large, bright display screen. A center-aligned 32MP HDR camera is nicely cut out at the front of the LCD screen display. It is the first phone in the world with a 64MP RGBW Sensor. Hence, users can rest assured of superior image and video quality.

The Build, Display, and overall Design

The design of the Tecno Camon 19 Pro does not disappoint. The smartphone has a thickness of 8.6mm. The build material for the phone is glass on the front, plastic frame, and plastic back. The volume, power buttons, and fingerprint sensor are set on the right side of the smartphone. This enables ease to reach and use of the buttons and sensor. The speaker, USB Type-C port, and 3.5mm jack are positioned at the bottom. The front of the Camon 19 Pro is dominated by a 6.8-inch IPS LCD with high color Gamut.

The 1080 x 2460 pixels provide a bright, superior image clear on the large screen. Tecno put a single, center-aligned punch for the single selfie camera, which houses the 32MP lens. At the back, the first thing you will notice is the attractive back cover and two rings that houses the cameras. The back was creatively designed with a diamond coating that mimics 200 million diamond crystals. The two rings at the back house the main cameras. Although they are two rings, there are actually three lenses.

Camera

A camera is a key feature of any modern smartphone device. Most smartphones are judged based on the performance of the cameras they park, both at the front and back. The Tecno Camon 19 Pro certainly lives up to the Tecno Camon smartphone tradition as a camera smartphone. The front of the Tecno Camon 19 Pro is packed with a 32MP selfie camera, confined in a center-aligned punch-hole cutout. The front-facing HDR camera is 26mm wide. At the back, the triple cameras are parked in two circular black rings.

The cameras are 64MP (Laser AF, IOS, f/1.6, 26mm (wide)), 50MP portrait lens (50mm (telephoto), PDAF, 2x Zoom), and 2MP depth camera. A Quad Flash is also present on the Camon 19 Pro to complement photo taking in din light and at night. However, rest assured the triple main camera and selfie front camera operate optimally in these conditions, with or without the Quad Flash. The RGBW sensor is essential in balancing colors. The Laser AF on the main camera enables precise focus on the objects in the least time possible for the best shots. The IOS and a gyro EIS features help stabilize shots and videos.

Performance and Storage

Tecno Camon 19 Pro is installed with the MediaTek Helio G96 (12nm process node technology) for robust processing and superior performance. Operating on the latest android platform, Android 12, Tecno Camon 19 Pro, the maximum CPU frequency is 2.05 GHz. The Mali-G57 MC2 GPU enables seamless gaming and graphic work, with maximum download speeds of 1.5 Gbps. The MediaTek Helio G96 chipset is good, but not one of the best, especially when playing graphic-intensive games in advanced settings. With an 8GB RAM, Tecno Camon 19 Pro has added support for virtual memory extension. The internal storage of 128GB, with additional support for storage expansion using the MicroSD card slot.

Battery, Charging, and Connectivity

The Tecno Camon 19 Pro packs an equally impressive and massive 5,000 mAh Li-Po non-removable battery. As advertised, the 33W smart charger can charge the battery from 0 to full charge in about 65 minutes. When fully charged, the smartphone could last for up to 5-8 hours on heavy usage. For average light users, one is could get up to 24 hours of use before the need for a full charge. The smartphone supports and connects 2G, 3G, and 4G. The Tecno Camon 19 Pro 5G Pro connects and supports 5G connectivity. As expected, Tecno Camon 19 Pro supports Wi-Fi.

  4. Does Tecno Camon 19 Pro support OTG? Yes, it does.
  5. Does Tecno Camon 19 Pro support gaming, and is it good? Yes, the chipset and GPU make it a mid-range processor capable of handling most games fairly well. However, it is not one of the best smartphones when playing intensive games and high setting levels.
  6. How much does the Tecno Camon 19 Pro retail at? The recommended price is Kes 33,700.

Oppo officially launched the Oppo A57, it is available in either Glowing Black or Glowing Green Colours. The device runs on Android 12 operating System and has an internal storage of 64GB and RAM of 64GB. The smartphone supports Dual SIM (Nano) with 4G network connectivity. In terms of cameras, the smartphone has a front camera of 8MP and 13MP+2MP at the back. You can view your pictures or videos on the 6.56 inch HD+ display, which has a resolution of 1612 x 720 pixels. A refresh rate of 60 GHz for the Oppo A57 2022 ensures you enjoy playing your online games or watching your favourite video content. The Oppo A57 2022 is now available at Phoneplace Kenya.

Design and Build

Seeing it from afar, you will love the sleek appearance of the Oppo A57 2022. A closer look and experience will get you to love the beautiful device. The smartphone measures 163.74×75.05×7.99mm. It weighs 187g. It will fit well in your hand, and the weight is reasonably light, especially if you like them lightweight and portable. On the front, a 6.56 HD+ screen with a water drop notch at the top end is an indication of the sophistication and deliberate efforts to make the Oppo A57 2022 appealing and functional. The frame and back material used to make the Oppo smartphone are plastic.  The camera bay is black, with two prominent circular rings housing the 13MP and 2MP cameras. Also distinctively designed and placed is the Quad-flash. The camera bay slightly protrudes at the back, with the area protecting the two lenses.

The device has the power, lock button, and fingerprint sensor on the right side. The volume buttons are on the left. At the bottom, the Oppo A 57 2022 has the USB Type C port, 3.5mm audio jack, and stereo speakers strategically placed for the best user experience. The top side is plain with openings or ports.

Cameras

The Oppo A57 2022 has cameras installed both on the front and at the back. An 8MP camera sits prominently atop the v notch of the device’s display; great for your selfies, snaps with family and friends, and video chats. At the back, you will access a 13MP and additional 2MP pixel camera to snap moments and people and record videos for content consumption.

Display

With a 6.56-inch HD+ touch screen display, you will love using the Oppo A57 2022.  The display resolution is 1612 x 720 pixels (269 PPI), which is bright and excellent for viewing images and video content.  A 60GHz refresh rate will ensure the device is fully optimized and performs at optimal levels as you use it for productive work or fun.

Performance

Oppo A57 packs a MediaTek Helio G35 chipset, Octa-Core processor, and ARM Mali-G57 MC2 GPU for graphics and mobile video gaming. A 4GB RAM makes it possible for the device to store crucial applications and data it needs to enable the CPU, Chipset, and GPU to run optimally on the device. At a clocking speed of 2GHz, the Oppo A57 can handle most tasks, including multi-tasking and even playing mobile video games without lagging.

A 64GB internal memory is sufficient for storing the user’s multimedia content and personal information over time. It is recommended to add additional memory by installing a Micro SD to avoid inconveniences due to a lack of sufficient memory capacity to download applications and store content. With more content available than ever ready for consumption, large internal memory is necessary, alongside enough RAM, to ensure all applications run correctly. With 4 GB/64GB, Oppo A57 2022 meets these minimum requirements.

Battery and Connectivity

A non-removable lithium battery powers (5,000mAh powers the Oppo A57 2022. It is charged through a USB Type-C charger. The Oppo A57 2022 supports 2g, 3G, and up to 4G for network connectivity. The device seamlessly connects to Wi-Fi, Bluetooth v5.00, and GPS, which is essential when giving direction or mapping a specific location on Google Maps. An Overview

Galaxy Buds 2 Pro will provide the ultimate Hi-Fi sound in your ear. Enjoy seamless connectivity and comfortable with the wireless accessories that are now a must-have. They are the clear choice for quality sound.

Active Noise Cancellation

The 24-bit Hi-Fi Audio capability in the buds enables you to hear the sound as it was intended, wirelessly. Every note sounds like the real thing because, with the Buds2 Pro, the clear sound starts from the source with your favorite Samsung Galaxy Device. Enjoy your full playlist with the Active Noise Cancellation (ANC). The buds have 3 high Signal to Noise Ratio (SNR) to attract and eliminate outside sound).

It enables you to enjoy your playlist even more. You can easily to an in-person conversation with the Voice Detect on the Galaxy Buds2Pro. Start taking and the Voice Detect turns off the ANC and activates the ambient sound. This allows you to hear the conversation and engage the other party without removing your buds.

Dolby Audio

With the Intelligent 360 Audio, the sound on the Galaxy Audio feels more realistic than ever. The 360 Audio has Direct Multi-channel (5.1ch/7.1ch), Dolby Atmos, and enhanced head tracking which makes every movement stay in sync. This contributes to your ultimate, spatial, immersive experience.

Auto Switch

Using the Auto Switch, you can still answer your calls even when the Galaxy Buds2 Pro pair is connected to your Smart TV. They intelligently detect mobile activity and shift effortlessly their connection to your Samsung Galaxy smartphone, watch, or tablet. As such, you can answer incoming calls by simply tapping the Buds2Pro twice.

Related Products

  • Samsung Galaxy Buds Live
  • Apple Airpods Pro 2
  • Sony WF-1000XM4
  • Apple AirPods 3
  • Samsung Galaxy Buds2

FAQs

  • How long does the Galaxy Buds2 Pro stay with power? Up to 5 Hours of continuous playtime. 18 hours in the case.
  • Is Galaxy Buds2 Pro waterproof? Yes. Fully waterproof (IPX Water Resistance).
  • What is the weight of buds2? 5.5g
  • What makes the Buds2 Pro stand out? Better sound, better fit, and Active Noice Cancellation (ANC).
  • How many microphones are in each bud? 3
  • What Bluetooth connectivity is on Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro? Bluetooth 5.3
  • What colors are available for Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro? Bora Purple, Black, and Graphite.
  • Can Galaxy Bud2 Pro support multiple devices? They cannot connect to multiple devices simultaneously. However, they can quickly switch between devices using Auto Switch. With one of your Samsung devices paired, they will connect automatically the next time they are used.
  • Can I charge my Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro wirelessly? They support wireless charging. Place the charging case on any Qi-enabled wireless charging pad for wireless charging.
  • Can I use my buds2 with other smartphones? Yes. The devices need to run on Android 5.0 and later versions and have more than 1.5GB of RAM. For Apple devices, the handsets need to be models with iOS 10 or later for best compatibility.
  • How long does it take to charge the Galaxy Buds2 Pro? About an hour from 0-100%

It also has a triple rear camera setup where a 64MP primary camera with OIS along with 5MP ultra-wide camera, 2MP depth, and an 8MP front-facing camera. Buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Design, Build and Display

The device has a large and impressive screen measuring 6.6 inches. It comes with a matte finish design at the rear. It comes in two variant colors: Matte Aqua, and Matte Black. Samsung Galaxy F42 5G body is made from glass on the front and plastic at the back and on the body frame. It features textured lines which run diagonally at the rear. The fingerprint sensor is moved to the right of the device and is also used as the power button for more convenient access by users.

At the front, the device has a water-drop notch display, with thin bezels on the sides. The display is a large 6.6 inches of  TFT LCD, with 90Hz. the display resolution is 1080 x 2408 pixels (~400 PPI density), which is impressive for content consumption. It works pretty, adjusting to indoor and outdoor settings well and enabling maximum user experience At the bottom, the device has a USB Type C port, paired alongside a 3.5mm headphone jack and microphone.

Camera

The device packs an 8MP front selfie camera. The camera is able to capture quality selfie shots, though not the best compared to other devices that boast of selfie cameras with superior specifications and capabilities. Other than capturing photos, the front camera is able to take HD 1080p videos at 30fps.

At the back, the handset packs a triple main camera. The primary camera on the Samsung Galaxy F42 5G is 64 MP, f/1.8, (wide), PDAF. It is paired up with 5 MP, f/2.2, 115˚ (ultra-wide)  and 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth) sensors. With the LED flash, panorama, and HDR features, the main camera is able to capture high-quality images and videos in daylight and dim light.

Performance and Battery

Samsung Galaxy F42 5G is a 5G-network-enabled device. It supports 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 20, 28, 38, 41, 78, 79 SA/NSA/Sub6 5G bands.  The device supports GSM / HSPA / LTE / 5G technology and HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, and 5G speed.  As such, it has superfast upload and download speeds.

It is powered by an Octa-Core (2×2.2 GHz Cortex-A76 & 6×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 (7 nm) processer which is powerful and efficient for enabling impressive handset performances. It enables the handset to take care of daily needs, and multi-tasking and does not stutter when in use. The processor, alongside the Mali-G57 MC2 Graphical Processing Unit, enables the playing of light games such as Candy crush with ease. However, the device is not good for heavy-setting games.

A 6/8GB RAM is great for any mid-range smartphone. Such space enables optimal functioning of core operations, besides the 128GB internal memory which is expandable through a dedicated MicroSD. The device is powered by a 5,000mAh battery. It comes packed with a 15W wired first charging adapter.  The adapter takes about 2 hours to fully charge the device. Once fully charged,  the phone can stay with the charge for a day for an average user, and 4-5 hours for active online browsing, video streaming, and daily use.

description:
JBL Wind 2

The JBL Wind 2 mounts to your bike’s handlebar and lets you enjoy tunes from your phone, FM radio, or an SD card. You can wirelessly stream music from your smartphone via Bluetooth. The Wind 2 also has a built-in FM tuner, so you could listen to the big game as you pedal through the countryside. There’s also an SD card slot, for cards up to 64GB. Load your workout playlist and start pedaling!

JBL Wind 2 Technical

The JBL Wind 2 portable Bluetooth speaker was made for the road — specifically, when you hit the road with your bike. This speaker snaps into an included handlebar mount. And if you’re on foot, just latch the speaker to your backpack with the included carabiner clip. The Wind 2 is totally waterproof, so if you can stand the rain, so can the speaker.

Entertainment options
You can wirelessly stream music from your smartphone via Bluetooth. The Wind 2 also has a built-in FM tuner, so you could listen to the big game as you pedal through the countryside. There’s also an SD card slot, for cards up to 64GB. Load your workout playlist and start pedaling!

Easy to use
The Wind 2 has side-mounted control buttons. They’re indented, so you can easily find them without taking your eyes off the road. The speaker also has a stereo minijack, so when you get where you’re going, you can plug in some earbuds and kick back.
The Wind 2’s built-in rechargeable battery gives you up to 10 hours of operation. And the speaker’s LCD display lets you clearly see what’s playing.

description:
JBL Partybox Encore Essential Wireless Speaker

The JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speaker is an essential acquisition for quality music and party lovers. Whether a party in your backyard or full throttle, exclusive beach party, the JBL Party Encore Essential Wireless Speaker always delivers. It uncompromisingly supplies high-quality music and the party atmosphere to your party, as you get groovy and dance the night away. The Woofer pumps 100W of original JBL Pro Sound with deep bass through its 5.25-inch Woofer and 1.75-inch tweeters. You can playback your favorite playlist from a USB stick with recorded music, a shared Bluetooth device, or other wired components. You will certainly be dancing to the beat alongside the integrated ring of colored LED lights strobe in sync to the Woofer’s beats. Two JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speakers can be wirelessly paired using the True Wireless Stereo (TWS) for a sounder and bigger impact on the stage.

JBL Partybox Encore Essential Price, Features, and Specifications

Key Feature Details
Price Kes. 60,000
Total Sound Output 100W
Speaker Configurations 1*5.25 inches woofer

2*1.75 inches tweeters
Connection Bluetooth v5.1

USB Type-A (.mp3, .wav, .wma audio playback/5V charge out)
Software. JBL PartyBox App
Power Source Rechargeable Lithium-ion Battery

AC Adapter Charger (comes with the package)
Battery Life 6 hours before recharge
Waterproof IPX4 Splashproof
Colour Black

Product Description

One thing that makes the JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speaker stand out is the quality bass sound and synced lighting effect. Nothing beats the amazing and unique JBL PartBox Encore’s deep bass sound output. The 100W power output streaming through the 1*5.25 inches woofer and 2*1.75 inches tweeters is sweet and enthralling to beach party enthusiasts and wild, high-energy backyard parties.

The dynamic light show from the synced LED lights synced to the beat adds more to the enjoyment and spicing up the party. Considering the JBL PartyBox Encore is portable, with an easy Grab and handle, and splash-proof, it makes each moment worth it, whether by the beach or the swimming pool as you party. You can always keep the music pumping through the JBL Original Pro sound as you feel the distinctive deep bass.

Key Features

  • Up to 100W of JBL Original Pro Sound
  • 1*5.25 inches Woofer and 2*1.75 inches Tweeters
  • Integrated LED light flashes, synced to the beat
  • IPX4 Splashproof Certification in Construction
  • Guaranteed 6 Hours of Wireless Playback
  • Wireless Music Streaming via Bluetooth
  • Wired Microphone Input for Karaoke
  • Play Music via the USB stick
  • AC Power Cable enabling 24/7 Playback
  • Grab and Go Carry Handle (Built-in)
  • True Wireless Stereo (TWS) to pair two JBL speakers for bigger sound power output

At parties and gigs, the more the sound, the better for the revelers. You can use the True Wireless Stereo (TWS) technology to pair two JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speakers and rev the music up! With the PartyBox App, you can customize your music and use the light show colors to create the right mood and create the perfect vibe for entertainment.

The JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speaker’s battery allows up to 6 hours of play before recharge. A rechargeable lithium-ion battery allows parties even in remote areas before the need for a recharge. An AC Power Cable also allows 24/7 playback.

While at it, the PartyBox allows multiple music sources to be played. It has a USB port that allows one to play music via the USB stick. You can stream music via Bluetooth by pairing the JBL PartyBox Encore Essential wirelessly to another device, like your smartphone.

In a typical party setting, there are the wannabes who want to sing their hearts out to the beat. JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speaker has a Microphone that allows live Karaoke performances.

FAQs

  • Is the JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speaker available in Kenya? Yes. It is available at Phoneplace Kenya for Kes 60,000.
  • Is the JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speaker rechargeable? Yes. It uses a rechargeable lithium battery that allows 6 hours of use before recharge.
  • How can I know the battery level on the JBL PartyBox Encore Essential Wireless Speaker? It shows the battery level on the PartyBox. You can keep checking the battery level by pressing the speaker’s buttons.
  • Can I use the JBL PartyBox Speaker while charging? Yes. The AC Power Cable Adapter can sort you out and enable you to use the speaker as you charge it without any harm. However, to save power, unplug the speaker after it is fully charged. It can run an awesome 6 hours before the need to recharge.

An  Overview of the Oppo Find X5

The Oppo Find X5 is a high-end smartphone and is considered among the premium devices in Kenya. The Find X5 is powered by a top-of-the-line Qualcomm Snapdragon 888. It has a beautiful 6.55-inch LTPO AMOLED display with a 120 Hz refresh rate. At the rear, the Oppo Find X5 has an outstanding triple camera setup with a groundbreaking MariSilicon X chip consisting of a 50 MP primary camera, 13 MP telephoto sensor, and 50MP ultra-wide camera. A 32MP wide selfie camera sits petty on the front. The phone has a massive 4,800mAh battery with 80W SUPERVOOC Charge and 30W AIRVOOC Wireless Charge, Bluetooth 5.2, and dual 5G support. The Find X5 5G comes in Black and White colors.

Build, and Overall Design

Oppo Find X5 design is based on a futuristic design that captures lovers of high-performance, premium smartphones. The device is housed in a curved body with unique cosmetic tones, giving it a distinctive and streamlined appearance. The Oppo Find X5 has 6.55 inches, weighs 195g, and measures 160.3 x 72.6 x 8.7 mm in dimension. The outer body is made from glass and glass-like co-polymer PC (plastic). The available colors of the device are Black and White. At the right upper end of the screen, a punch-hole holds the front camera. A fingerprint sensor is located under the display. At the back of the device is the creatively designed camera deck that slightly protrudes from the otherwise flat surface. Two black rings dominate the camera deck, along with a smaller oblong-shaped smaller ring. The rings house the triple lenses, alongside the LED flashes which complement the cameras.

Display

Cushioned by an 8GB RAM AND 256GB internal memory, the phone is designed and created to handle the complex and heavy stuff. Its features and specifications make it ideal for the best video gaming experiences, productivity, and multitasking. To ensure the device does not let the user, it is powered by a 4,800mAh battery, which is charged by a wired 80W fast charger. The USB is a Type-C, with the Oppo Find X5 supporting OTG usage.

OnePlus 10R

The OnePlus 10R is a continuation of OnePlus line of value flagship devices, which are pretty consistent in the market. A 120Hz AMOLED screen, a primary 50MP triple camera that can record in 4K, 80W fast charging, a huge battery at 5000mAh and the new flagship nextgen Mediatek Dimensity 8100-Max 5G, chipset. This phone is spec’d out quite nice on top of being competitively priced.

Design

The OnePlus 10R comes with a 6.7-inch 120Hz Fluid AMOLED screen with a left aligned punch hole design for the selfie camera. it has even bezels and a very narrow chin, with a screen to body ratio of 90.0%. It an aspect ratio of 20:9 and supports HD10+ which makes it an absolute delight to consume media with. It has a plastic frame and back, and a glass Corning Gorilla 5 front panel. It is very bright and vivid, peaking at industry leading 1300 nits. It’s rated IP68 for dust and water protection, so it surely is splash proof. Unfortunately, it loses the headphone jack. It has a fast under display fingerprint sensor. It does support stereo speakers, offering great sound when playing media.

Performance

The OnePlus 10R brings in the heat with latest flagship Mediatek Dimensity 8100-Max, from the next generation range of Mediatek flagship 5G chips, making it very fast and excellent for gaming. It has a Octa-core 2.85Ghz CPU with storage options of 8/12 GB for RAM & 128/256 GB for ROM. It has no expandable memory option though. Paired with the smooth 120Hz AMOLED screen, running the latest Android 12 with OxygenOS 12.1 skin on top, the performance feels very fast and premium. OxygenOS has been industry leading for years, having been the next closest OS to stock android after the Pixel skin. Everything feels fast, fluid and rich in colour.

Cameras

The OnePlus 10R has a triple camera arrangement on the back. It comes with an excellent 50MP primary sensor, with 12.5MP picture binning for those excellent daylight photos. There is also an extra 8MP ultra wide with a 120˚ FOV, for group and landscape photos, and an 2MP macro for close up pictures. The video can support upto 4K video @30fps and [email protected]/60/120fps with auto-HDR supports & gyro-EIS plus OIS stability assistance. It has a selfie camera at a generous 16MP wide sensor, capable of 1080p video at 30fps with gyro-EIS. The selfies and videos are great and well exposed.

Other features

The OnePlus 10R has an excellent 80W fast charging, which can charge the phone to 100% in 32 mins. That in addition to the fact that it also comes with a huge Li-Po 5000mAh non-removable battery. Even with a high refresh rate screen power screen, this should be more than a days’ worth device. There is also wired reverse charging of unspecified wattage. It does support NFC for contactless paying.

Similarly, priced phones would include the Sony Xperia 1 III, Samsung Galaxy S22+ 5G, Google Pixel 6 Pro and Motorola Edge 30 Pro. The main talking points would be the high refresh rate screen, the flagship Dimensity 8100-Max chipset and the cameras. With the high refresh rate 120Hz AMOLED screen, its offers an experience that only the best devices in the market can only strive to achieve.

Even for the price, it’s an excellent, top of the range device. The best 5G flagship Mediatek chipset, huge immersive 120Hz AMOLED screen and impressive camera systems. The cameras go all the way to 4K video recording, a feature only the best phones can boast of. It comes in Sierra Black and Forest Green.

Common Q & A

  1. How much is OnePlus 10R in Kenya: the phone is currently starts retailing at Ksh 70500
  2. Where can I buy OnePlus 10R in Kenya: you can buy it at phoneplacekenya.com, both online and offline, with optional delivery on request.
  3. Does OnePlus 10R have wireless charging: Yes. In fact, it has industry leading 50W wireless charging, in addition to 80W fast charging, reverse wireless charging, in addition to the battery being huge at 5000mAh
  4. Does OnePlus 10R support 5G: yes, it does. this makes it future proof, in addition to its silk smooth 120Hz high refresh rate screen and top of the range flagship Dimensity 81100-Max chipset.
  5. Does the OnePlus 10R have an AMOLED screen: yes. It has the currently highest adopted refresh rate at 120Hz AMOLED, making it super-fast and very comfortable to use even when outside

Xiaomi Poco F4 GT in Kenya

The POCO F4 GT was announced on April 26th, 2022, and is available. It features an extensive and impressive 6.67-inch display, whose resolution is at ~395 PPI density. It packs a triple primary camera (64mp+8mp+2mp) at the rear at an impressive 20mmp selfie camera at the front. In terms of memory, the device comes loaded with an 8/12GB ram and 128/256 internal memory. It is sufficient for most users, considering the device does not have a slot for additional memory. POCO F5 GT comes packed with An Octa Core, Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 (4 nm) processor. It gets powered by a 4,700mAh non-removable battery, alongside a 120W wired fast charger. Weighing 210g and measuring  162.5 x 76.7 x 8.5 mm, the POCO smartphone comes big and heavy, in a good way. In addition, the device is available in retail in three distinctive colors: Stealth Black, Knight Silver, and Cyber Yellow. It is available at Phoneplace Kenya for Kes. 40,000.

Design, Build and Display

Design: POCO F4 GT features a premium look and feel metallic styled design with refined and subtle details. The futuristic design gets emphasized by the AG glass material, which provides a delicate feel in hand and a power boost at the same time. The unique camera design and décor at the rear are both exquisite and refreshing. As part of the design, POCO carefully and deliberately chose yellow, black, and silver as the main color variant one could pick for the device. The X-Factor RGB gaming, like on the camera deck at the phone’s rear, is also an outstanding feature, lighting up for incoming text messages, phone calls, and battery charging during gaming (turbo mode).

Build:  the device measures 162.5 x 76.7 x 8.5 mm ans weighs 210g. The front is Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus). The rear of the Xiaomi POCO F4 GT is glass. The edges are nicely curved, giving the device an excellent, sleek, ergonomic design. An aluminum frame protects the device around its edges. A punched notch accommodates the selfie camera.

Display: With a large 6.67-inch display, the POCO f4 GT does not disappoint regarding resolution, multi-touch, and overall screen performance. The resolution is an impressive 1080 x 2400 pixels (~395 ppi density). An AMOLED DisplayMate A+ Pro gives the best experience to users, especially pro gamers who seek superior screen viewing. With a refresh rate of 120Hz, DCI-P3 wide color gamut, 10 bit with over 1 billion colors, 5,000,000:1 contrast ratio, True Colour precision tuning, and MEMC (added frames for smoother viewing), the display on the PCO f4 GT is as good as they come. The display got optimized for use in low lighting, which helps reduce the discomfort most users feel when using their devices in the low light setting. The 1920Hz PWM dimming helps to protect your eyes without sacrificing image quality on the screen.

Camera Performance

The device has a triple camera mounted on its rear. The primary camera on the POCO F4GT consists of a 64MP with Sony IMX686See epic sights. The Sony IMX686 sensor enables the 64MP lens to produce high-quality image output in real-time. The ultra-high resolution makes it easier for post-processing and cropping. The primary camera gets supported by an 8 MP, f/2.2, 120˚ (ultrawide) camera and a 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) camera. It features a Dual-LED flash, HDR, and panorama and captures [email protected], 1080p cameras at 30fps, and [email protected]/60fps videos. The selfie camera has HDR features and captures [email protected]/60fps and [email protected] for videos. The flicker Sensor on the camera deck at the back of the device sensor can achieve precise and zero-ripple pictures when capturing screens and lights.

Performance and Battery

Processor: The POCOf4 GT is a gaming device created with the avid gamer in mind. It runs on a 4,700 mAh battery. It supports fast charging and comes in the box with a 120W wired fast charger. For gamers who love to get back on the game as soon as possible, the fast enables recharge back to 100% in a record time of 17 minutes or less, depending on the battery level. You can equally charge the battery as you play along and still have it complete in less than 25 minutes.

POCO takes issues of smartphone space seriously. They set up 8-12 RAM for their T4 GT device. The 8GB device comes with 128GB of internal memory and 256GB for the device with 12GB RAM. It does not have the option for additional storage space, with no MicroSD slot on the device. As mentioned earlier, the POCO F4 GT got developed with a gamer in mind. It possesses a powerful Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 (4 nm) chipset which is silently efficient and up to the task of whatever gets thrown at it. It is created for maximum performance and enables a 400% AI performance boost.

An Octa-core (1×3.00 GHz Cortex-X2 & 3×2.50 GHz Cortex-A710 & 4×1.80 GHz Cortex-A510) CPU and Adreno 730 Graphics Processing Unit (GPU) not only enable the user to multi-task but also work do heavy tasks as well as have a wonderful time playing mobile video games without the device lagging or stuttering. POCO’s Qualcomm’s first 4nm chip with next-generation CPU and GPU ensures optimized performance at minimal consumption. The Cortex-X2 prime core, up to 3.0 GHz, ensures up to a 20% CPU performance boost. The Adreno 730 enables faster graphics rendering and improved power efficiency.

Audio Quality and Speakers: The POCO device has symmetrical quad speakers installed, which have revolutionized sound quality in smartphones. A quad-speaker stereo is fitted with independent dual tweeters and dual woofers to provide unmatchable clarity and excellent stereo output. As a user, you with have an excellent experience whether you are playing your favorite game, streaming your much-anticipated video, or playing video games on the go. The POCO F4 GT is Triple sound quality certified, with a 3 MIC design for free game speech.

Battery: The POCO phone gets powered by a non-removable 4,700mAh battery. A 120W wired fast charger complements the large, Hypercharge battery. The Fast charge will get the battery complete with power at a rapid and incredible 17 minutes, thanks to the dual charge pump, dual-cell battery, and multi-tab winding technologies. The device smartly learns your charging routines at night to lengthen the battery life span. It will pause the charging at 80% as you rest and rapidly get fully charged before you start the new day.

Cooling System: While other devices heat up and log when put to task on gaming and multi-tasking, the POCO F4 GT got created for challenging moments. Installed on the device is the LiquidCool Technology. The sophisticated cooling system enables heat transfer from the device to the outside. The powerful temperature control mechanism enables the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset to perform to its true potential.

Connectivity and Networking

LTE / 5G technology has HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps speeds, LTE-A, and 5G. The Multi-Link 5.0 technology on the device always keeps the network fast and stable. Depending on the strength of the signal from the service provider, it can effortlessly switch to the optimal connection between a 5G cellular network and Wi-Fi network for a high-speed and stable online experience.

Infinix Note 12 VIP in Kenya

The Infinix Note 12 VIP price in Kenya is around Ksh 39,500. The phone has 8 GB RAM and 256 GB of internal storage which is expandable using microSDXC. The Note 12 VIP runs on Android 12 and all this is powered by a 4500 mAh battery. As for the cameras, it has a 108MP primary rear camera along with a 13MP ultrawide sensor and a 2MP depth sensor. The Infinix 12 VIP comes in Cayenne grey, and Force black
colors. Buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Infinix Note 12 VIP specs and price in Kenya

Price in Kenya Ksh. 39,500
Display 6.7 inches, 120Hz AMOLED
Processor Mediatek Helio G96
Sim Card Dual SIM
Connectivity GSM / HSPA / LTE
OS Android 12
RAM 8GB
Storage 256GB
Card Slot microSDXC
Main Camera 108MP+ 13MP +2MP
Selfie Camera 16MP
3.5mm jack Yes
USB Port USB Type-C 2.0
Fingerprint side-mounted
Battery Li-Po 4500 mAh
Charging Fast Charging 120W, 100% in 17 min
Colors Cayenne grey, Force black

Infinix Note 12 VIP Overview:

The Infinix Note 12 VIP flaunts a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with a Full HD+ resolution of 1080 x 2412 pixels. With every touch, all your commands are rapidly and instinctively in sync. This is made possible by an ultra refresh rate of 120Hz and a touch sampling rate as high as 360Hz. Also, This is a 10-bit panel with 100% DCI-P3 coverage. Similarly, upfront, there has a center-aligned punch-hole cutout that houses a selfie camera.

Design Wise, The device has a matte finish with a camera module at the back. It is made of an aerospace-grade ultra-thin glass fiber material which is very thin in itself and has great rigidity. The Note 12 VIP has a clean design and a minimal feel in the hand. The screen edges have a slight, 2.5D curve to them, but other than that, the phone is flat throughout. Flat sides, a flat rear panel, and a square camera island. The device measures 7.89mm in thickness and weighs around 189 grams. Moreover, The Infinix Note 12 VIP is available in two color options – Cayenne Grey and Force Black.

Camera

As for the optics, the back of the Note 12 VIP comes with a triple camera setup consisting of a 108MP primary camera. It is accompanied by a 13MP ultra-wide camera as well as the Laser AF system and a 2MP depth sensor.

On the front, there is a 16MP selfie camera, which is confined inside the center-aligned punch-hole cutout. The smartphone is capable of recording 1440p videos at 30fps from the rear camera and 1080p videos at 30fps on the front camera.

Performance & Storage

Under the hood, The Note 12 VIP is powered by the MediaTek Helio G96 that features two powerful Arm Cortex-A76 processor cores clocked up to a speedy 2.05GHz in its octa-core CPU, and Arm Mali-G57 provides great graphics performance. This is partnered with fast 2133MHz LPDDR4X memory and turbo-charged UFS 2.2 storage that yields super-fast data bandwidth.

As far as memory arrangement, the phone is available in 8GB of RAM and supports virtual RAM expansion up to 13GB. The phone has 256GB of internal storage configuration that is expandable up to 2TB via a dedicated microSD slot. Furthermore, the device boots on the latest Android 12-based XOS 10.6.

Battery & Connectivity

The Note 12 VIP packs a 4,500mAh battery that can charge from 0 to 100% in just 17 minutes using the 120W fast charger. The Company has added 103 different safety features, as well as 18 temperature sensors, which monitor the temperature of the device in real-time to ensure safe charging. Infinix promises to keep 85 percent of its battery capacity after 800 charge cycles.

As for connectivity options, there is 4G, Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Bluetooth 5.1, A2DP, LE, GPS, A-GPS, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, USB Type-C 2.0, Loudspeakers, and 3.5mm jack. For biometrics, it has a side-mounted fingerprint scanner and a Face Unlock. Similarly, It has dual speakers, which also support DTS.

FAQs

  • How much is the Infinix Note 12 VIP? It is currently retailing at Kes 39,500 at Phoneplace.
  • Is Note 12 VIP Camera any good? Yes. You will love the experience with the  Note 12 VIP front and back cameras. It comes packed with a 16MP front camera and 108MP+13MP+2MP at the back. Rest assured of high-quality photos and videos during the day, in low light, and at night.
  • Can I use the Infinix Note 12 VIP to play games? Yes. The phone gives excellent performance when you use it to play games. The smartphone’s specifications make it ideal for average gamers to enjoy gaming on the device. The MediaTek M6781 Helio G96, Octa-Core CPU, and Mali-G57 MC2 make the Infinix Note 12 VIP up to the task of gaming.
  • How good is the Infinix Note 12 VIP battery, and does the device support fast charging? The phone parks a Li-Po 4,500 mAh non-removable battery. It will keep the power on a typical day’s usage for 24 hours. The device supports fast charging and comes with a 120W fast charger when unboxed. The 12W Infinix Note 12 VIP fast charger will power your battery from 0% to 100% in about 17 minutes.
  • Is Infinix Note 12 VIP 5G enabled? No. The phone supports up to 4G, and It is an LTE 4G-enabled smartphone.
  • What material was used to make the Is Infinix Note 12 VIP outer body? The man’s body at the back and body frame are made of aerospace-grade glass fiber material. The ultra-thin glass gives the device a premium look and feel. The material has a smooth texture of glass and has the strength of carbon fiber. On the front, the Infinix Note 12 VIP is made of an AMOLED 6.7-inch glass.
  • What are the Infinix Note 12 VIP’s most outstanding features?
  • Infinix Note 12 VIP’s most outstanding features is a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, an excellent main camera of 108MP, a fast charger that charges the device from 0-100% in 17 minutes, 8GB RAM, and internal memory of 128GB, and dual stereo speakers.
  • What is the weight of the Infinix Note 12? It weighs 200g.
  • Is the Infinix Note 12 VIP waterproof? No. It is not waterproof.

description:
Xiaomi 12 Pro in Kenya

The Xiaomi 12 Pro price in Kenya is around KSh 90,000. The Xiaomi 12 packs a 6.73-inch 2K OLED screen with up to 1500 nit peak brightness, and a 120Hz refresh rate. The smartphone is powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 with up to 12GB of  RAM and 256GB of storage. It packs a 4,600mAh battery with first 120W single-cell fast charging that can charge up to 100% in 18 minutes, thanks to Xiaomi’s own Surge P1 charging IC that offers a solution to industry issues of having both high output and capacity, filling a need for single-cell batteries with charging over 100W. The phone also has 50W wireless charging for 100% charge in 42 minutes and 10W reverse wireless charging. The Xiaomi 12 Pro comes in Black, Blue, and Purple colors with a glass back and a Green vegan leather version. Buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Xiaomi 12 Pro Specs and price in Kenya

Price  in Kenya KSh 90,000
Display 6.73-inch, 2k+ AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR10+, 1100 nits
Processor Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8 Gen1 (4 nm)
Sim Card Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
Connectivity GSM / CDMA / HSPA / EVDO / LTE / 5G
OS Android 12, MIUI 13
RAM 12GB RAM
ROM 256GB
Card Slot N0
Camera 50MP +  50MP +  50MP
Selfie 32 MP
3.5mm jack Yes, with stereo speakers
USB Port USB Type-C 2.0, USB On-The-Go
Fingerprint Fingerprint (under display, optical)
Battery Li-Po 4600 mAh, non-removable
Charging  120W wired fast charging, 50W wireless second charge, 10W Wireless rechargeable
Colors Black, Green, Blue, Pink

Design and build

The Xiaomi 12 Pro’s design is quite nice. Rather than going for contrasting accents, you get a sleek uniform look. The glass back tapers into the phone’s aluminum frame, and the finish is silky smooth. You’ll see an interesting touch on the camera bump, which has lines separating the different camera modules. For some reason, this phone has no IP rating against water and dust which some might consider a deal-breaker. But really how many times do you put your phone in water? Although it is important to note that competitors and even Xiaomi’s mid-rangers do have an IP rating. You can wake up and unlock the Xiaomi 12 Pro with the optical under-display fingerprint reader which is fast and reliable.

Top-Notch Display

The display of the Xiaomi 12 Pro is a curved 6.73 inches AMOLED with Gorilla Glass Victus protection, a QHD resolution, and a high 120 Hertz refresh rate. The resolution is quite sharp coming out up to 521 PPI. And content looks crisp and clear. Blacks are super deep because of the AMOLED technology and you have support for HDR 10+ as well as Dolby vision. Profiles under color settings will help you achieve even more accurate colors on this flagship display. For the refresh rate, note that this phone can dial down the refresh rate based on your activity to save energy. Xiaomi claims you can go all the way down to 1 Herz.

There’s also a really fast 480 Hertz touch sampling rate here for better responsiveness. It’s a useful feature for gamers. Side by side with the display performance is the audio. And the Xiaomi 12 Pro has stereo speakers with one at the bottom and the other, which outputs sound through both the earpiece and a grill at the top. The speakers have Harman Kardon branding because they are tuned by the Samsung company.

Cameras

Onto the cameras of the Xiaomi 12 Pro. It has a 50-megapixel main camera with OIS, a 50 megapixel telephoto with 2x zoom, and a 50-megapixel ultrawide camera. Daylight photos from the main camera are really good. There’s an abundance of detail and processing is balanced. The colors are lively and the dynamic range is excellent. The telephoto maintains that expert-level performance with its shots has very good detail and dynamic range. And the 12 Pro’s portrait mode relies on the telephoto camera capture. The ultra-wide camera does a good job almost up to the same standard as the other two cameras. Its photos are perfectly acceptable.

And in lowlight situations, 12 Pro will automatically apply night mode processing by default. And all its three rear cameras can record video and up to [email protected]/60fps. And the main cam can go up to [email protected] (HDR). 4k videos from the main camera are good with a dynamic range nicely wide. Electronic stabilization is available for all three cameras and the smoothness is praiseworthy. And finally, in not so many words, the 32 MP, f/2.5, 26mm (wide), 0.7µm selfie of Xiaomi 12 Pro is an award-winning lens if you ask me. It would have sure carried the day if it could also shoot 4K videos. But now, only [email protected]/60fps. It is a decent front-facing camera nonetheless.

Performance 

The Xiaomi 12 Pro runs on the new Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 flagship chipset. It’s built on the 4-nanometer processor and provides blazing-fast performance. Gaming and multitasking are no problem here. And you even get 5G connectivity. With the Xiaomi 12 Pro, there are options for 128 or 256 GB of storage onboard. But it’s not expandable. The interface of the phone is MIUI 13 running on top of Android. 12. It is not the regular OS really but still, it is pretty straightforward and comparable to both the previous version which ran on Android 11. There are some subtle changes coming from Android 12 though. For example, there’s the green indicator that appears when an app is accessing the mic or one of the cameras. And you can set your location to be approximate rather than precise.

Battery

The Xiaomi 12 Pro has a 4600 mAh, a non-removable battery which isn’t the largest capacity if we are being honest. The phone is able to score just a 74-hour endurance rating in battery tests. Charging speed though is incredibly fast. Thanks to the huge 120-watt adapter that comes in the box with it. The speeds are as follows: 100% in 18 minutes and wireless charging 50W, 100% in 42 minutes.

Xiaomi 12 Series specs comparison

Our take

Xiaomi 12 Pro brings a smooth finish, a fast refreshing curved high-resolution AMOLED, stereo speakers, a top Android chipset, and very capable and versatile cameras. This 12 Pro may not be their highest-tier device of the year, but it still does pack plenty of premium features. An easy to recommend smartphone is based on the features above.

description:
Realme 9 4G

The Realme 9 price in Kenya starts at Ksh 28,351. It features 6.4 inches Super AMOLED display that refreshes at 90Hz and has a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels. The phone has a triple-camera setup that consists of 108 MP + 8 MP + 2 MP and a 16 MP, f/2.5, 26mm (wide) camera for selfies. It runs on the Qualcomm SM6225 Snapdragon 680 4G (6 nm) chipset with Adreno 610, up to 8GB of RAM, 128GB  storage, on Realme UI 3.0 based on Android 12. Buy the Realme 9 in Kenya for 19,500 shillings at Phoneplace. It is available in colors Meteor Black, Sunburst Gold, and Stargaze White.

Realme 9 price and specs in Kenya

Price in Kenya Ksh. 28,351
Display 6.4 inches, Super AMOLED, 90Hz
Processor Qualcomm SM6225 Snapdragon 680 4G (6 nm)
Sim Card Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
Connectivity GSM / HSPA / LTE
OS Android 11, Realme UI 3.0
RAM 8GB
ROM 128GB
Speaker Loudspeaker
3.5mm jack Yes – 24-bit/192kHz audio
Selfie 16 MP, f/2.5, 26mm (wide)
Camera 50 MP + 8 MP + 2 MP
USB Port USB Type-C 2.0, USB On-The-Go
Fingerprint under the display, optical
Battery Li-Po 5000 mAh
Charging 33W, 50% in 31 min, 100% in 75 min
Colors Meteor Black, Sunburst Gold, Stargaze White

Unboxing and design

So what do you get in that Realme 9 yellow box? You get yourself a 33W charging adapter, a Type C USB cable, and a clear case as well. That’s everything you’ll find in the box. No surprises. Let’s check out the design of the Realme 9, and I’ve gotta say you will really like the look and feel of this phone. It’s a 6.4 inches gadget certainly nice and comfortable to clutch. It feels quite compact, certainly compared with a lot of 6.7-inch phones recently. And it is not too hefty, at around 178 grams and just 8mm thick.

Flip it over. And that is where the real fun begins. You’ve got a few different color options Meteor Black, Sunburst Gold, and Stargaze White. This design features a holographic 3D ripple design which is really lovely. It is completely smooth and that matte finish is pretty good at hiding smudges from your fingers. SCS and greasy marks. While it is just plastic around the back and around the edges here Realme did still nail it with the design of this phone. You do have a pre-installed screen protector on there too. The phone can take a bit of a splash and no problem, just that there is no water resistance.

Cameras | 108MP

What Realme has done, basically is pull a Xiaomi stunt with that 108 MP, f/1.8, 26mm (wide), 1/1.67″, 0.64µm, Dual Pixel PDAF main camera. It doesn’t capture 108 mega images by default though it uses 9-in-1 pixel binning instead. So what you actually end up with is a 12-megapixel photo. It just helps to improve that low light performance. You’ve both got a basic 8 MP, f/2.2, 120˚ ultra-wide-angle shooter on board as well and the final lens slapped on the back of here is a basic macro lens 2MP. Last up around the front of the Realme 9, you’ve got a 16-megapixel selfie shooter using Sonny’s IMX 471 sensor which is pretty capable even if you’re shooting in stronger light and slightly lower light.

90Hz, AMOLED Display

Now the Realme 9 spot, a 6.4 inch Super AMOLED display, Full HD Plus resolution 1080 x 2400 pixels. The fact that it’s only a 6.4 ich means lots of fine detail packed in there. Images on nice and crisp. By default screen colors are set to vivid which is by far the best of the other options. Because this is an AMOLED screen, yes, you do have an always-on display option on the Realme 9. Another thing is that you can change up the fingerprint animation that plays when you use that in-display fingerprint sensor. In-display fingerprint sensors have come a long way in the past couple of years The selfie camera here is not massive so it doesn’t intrude on the action when you go full screen. And if you dive on into screen refresh rate you will see it’s set to AUTO by default. That will scale it from 60 to 90 Hertz dependent on what you’re up to.

Performance

The Realme 9 is powered by Qualcomm SM6225 Snapdragon 680 4G (6 nm) chipset. A fairly basic chipset overall, but absolutely fine for your everyday video streaming, messaging, all that kind of stuff. And as for storage the Realme 9 has 128GB, and the 256GB model might also be available in select regions. The good news is you can also expand that storage using a microSDXC (dedicated slot). You do have8GB of RAM to help things move along nicely. It scores pretty standardly benchmarking scores. And the battery life seems solid enough as well as a 5,000 mAh capacity cell in there. It should easily last you through a fairly intense day on a single charge. And where you do need to juice it back up again, Realme 9 supports 33W, 50% in 31 min, and 100% in 75 minutes (advertised).

Despite the fact that this phone was released at the end of the first quarter of 2022, a lot of budget smartphones still came with that still old Android 11. But thankfully the Realme 9 packs, the latest Android 12 with Realme UI 3.0. Now, Realme UI is very similar to the ColorOS launcher which you’ll find on Oppo smartphones. So you’ll find a lot of the same features packed in here like floating windows, and the smart sidebar just to mention a few.

Realme 9 FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  1. The official release date is 2022, April 07.
  2. Does Realme 9 support 5G? – No, it does not support 5G.
  3. Is Realme 9 waterproof? – No, it is not waterproof.
  4. Yes, it supports fast charging 33W, 50% in 31 min, 100% in 75 min.
  5. Yes, it supports the services of Google Play Store, Gmail, youtube, etc.

An Overview of the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G

Samsung has been on a successful streak in manufacturing and delivering awesome mid-range smartphones under the Samsung Galaxy series. It launched the Samsung Galaxy M53 officially launched in April 2022. Galaxy M53 features a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display and has a thickness of 7.4mm. Considering it weighs around 176g, the device’s ergonomic design makes it adorable, easy to carry around, and comfortable when used. It packs a 5,000 mAh non-removable battery with a fast-charging option of 25W. With the main camera having 108MP at the rear and fronted by a 32MP, you are assured of top quality, uncompromised, and efficient functionality. It is now available at Phoneplace Kenya for Kes 50,000.

Design and Build of the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G

The Samsung Galaxy M53 takes up a minimalist design and build. Its soft round edges and a thin frame characteristically define the smartphone, whose thickness is 7.4mm. The device comes in unique colors of Origin Blue, Aqua Sky, and Force Black. While a large 6.7-inch display dominates the front, the back has a protruding frame that houses the main cameras. Samsung Galaxy smartphones always achieve a luxury status, and the M53 seems to tick every box by its look and appearance.

Display

A dominant and excellent6.7-inch FHD+ display with a refresh rate of 120GHz will catch your eye the first time you get hold of the Galaxy M53. Yes! It is a Super AMOLED Plus display that will give you a rich experience as you consume your content, work, and socialize. A 120GHz refresh rate ensures peak performance with no lagging and stuttering as it takes the device through its paces.

Connectivity

The Samsung Galaxy M53 supports 5G Network Connectivity. It means faster data download, upload speeds, and connection when communicating on the network.

Camera

The device has a sophisticated Galaxy M53 5G multi-lens camera system. The main Quad camera system comprises a 108MP wide-angle camera, 8MP ultra-wide camera, 2MP depth camera, and 2MP Macro Camera. The width, depth, and macro lens camera enable high-quality capture and images and videos, balancing light, brightness, ambiance, and softness while eliminating noise for more clarity. At the front, the Samsung Galaxy M53 parks a 32MP wide camera that can record 1080p videos up to 30fps.

Performance

The device comes with 6/8GB RAM, which is significant for the smooth running of the numerous pre-installed applications on the Samsung M53, along with other useful downloads. The internal memory of 128GB/ 256GB complements the fairly massive RAM, and additional external addition of memory (optional, up to 1 TB) ensure the user is not limited, as far as memory space, downloaded and shared multi-media content consumption is concerned.

A powerful Octa-Core Processor keeps the device going without lagging or stuttering, whether the user is multi-tasking, live streaming a video, or playing their favorite mobile video. Running on the latest Android platform, Android 12, the Samsung Galaxy integrated its One User Interface (UI) to enable users to customize and optimize their experience with the device. A MediaTek MT6877 Dimensity 900 (66nm) and Mali-G68 GPU indicate that the Samsung Galaxy M53 is a powerful, high-performance smartphone. With processor speeds of 2GHz and 2.4GHz, the M53 5G is up to the task of whatever challenges you throw at it.

Battery

A 5,000 mAh non-removable battery powers the Samsung Galaxy M53. The battery adequately meets the demands of the highly demanding device, whose bright screen resolution could quickly drain a battery of lesser power and inconvenience the user. A fast charger of 25W enables fast charging of the battery, hence the assurance of charging on the go.

Speakers and Sounds of the Samsung Galaxy M53

Samsung does not compromise on sound. They installed a Dolby Atmos on the Samsung Galaxy M53. You will hear a characteristically loud, clear, and full sound from the device once you rev the volume up. Certainly, you will enjoy your favorite movies, short videos, and music as it streams from the stereo speakers, enhanced by Dolby Atmos. It is even better on your stereo headsets and BT speakers, considering the Dolby mode is available on these devices.

Other Unique Features of the Samsung Galaxy M53

  • The Kids Mode protects children from harmful and indecent content exposure
  • The Knox security system protects the users’ data from malicious hardware and software threats and attacks
  • A side-mounted Fingerprint sensor that helps control unauthorized access to the device
  • The face-unlock security feature, which only unlocks through Face Recognition
  • Link to Windows, which enables the user to access calls, messages, and notifications on your PC
  • Sensors: Fingerprint, Gyroscope, Accelerometer, Gyro, Proximity, Compass.

FAQs

  1. Does Samsung Galaxy M53 5G support a 5G Network? Yes.
  2. Is the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G a good phone? Yes. It delivers excellent performance, with a massive battery, fast charging support, a large RAM and internal space, and a super AMOLED display that guarantees the best user experience.
  3. Is the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G installed with Gorilla Glass? Yes. The tough Corning Gorilla Glass makes it scratch resistant.
  4. Is the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G dust and water-resistant? It is yet to be confirmed.
  5. Does the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G supports wireless charging? Yes. It supports reverse charging. 
  6. Does Samsung Galaxy M53 5G support NFC? Yes. 
  7. When was Samsung Galaxy M53 5G launched to the market? April 2022 and now available on retail.
  8. What are the cons of the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G? Low display brightness, the plastic material used for building it, it has no charger when unboxed, and no 3.5mm jack.
  9. Can the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G be used to play mobile video games? Yes. The chipset, processor, and GPU are efficient for playing video games.
  10. Does the Samsung Galaxy M53 5G camera system support Optical Image Stabilisation (OIS)? No. Its integrated camera system supports EIS (Electronic Image Stabilisation). EIS is better than OIS when it comes to still images. For videos, OIS performs better compared to EIS.
  11. How much is Samsung Galaxy M53 5G in Kenya? It costs Kes 50,000 at Phoneplace Kenya.

The smartwatch measures 45.8 x 45.8 x 10.8mm and weighs 32g. the body material alloys, strap material, is Silicon and is available in Thunder Balck & Moonlight Grey Colours. The strap’s width is 22mm and has Min-Max wrist dimensions of 155-218mm.
