description:
Huawei freebuds 3i in Kenya

The Huawei Freebuds 3i price in Kenya is Ksh 8,900. The all-new Freebuds 3i is a primary competitor to the Galaxy Buds and Apple AirPods. This is one of the best truly wireless earbuds for Android available in the Kenyan market right now.

Huawei Freebuds 3i Specs and price

Ksh 8,900
Bluetooth Bluetooth 5.0
True wireless Yes
App Ai Life app
Battery Up to 3.5 hours
Speaker diameter 10 mm
Charging time 1 hour

Design and Build Quality

The Huawei Freebuds 3i has a cone-shaped main body that is ergonomically crafted for style and fit, these in-ear earphones offer an immersive acoustic experience. Pair them with the flexible silicone tips that come in 4 different sizes for a comfortable and secure fit. Better shape, better seal, better sound. There are indicator LEDs inside the case to let you know the status of the battery or charging. There is a small indentation on the front to open the lid easily with a single hand.

Speakers and Sound Quality

The earphones adopt a 10 mm-diameter dynamic driver acoustic design and 3-mic noise reduction to ensure high audio quality during calls. When connected to a Bluetooth device such as a smartphone, the earphones play stereo sound on both channels during voice calls or when playing music. The Freebuds 3i is one of the best sounding earbuds in the market priced under Ks 11,000. Talking about the voice call quality, the microphones pick up voice and relays quite efficiently.

Miscellaneous

With built-in capacitive touch sensors on both earphones, you can double-tap or press and hold an earphone to operate your earphones/phones. The double-tap operation settings can be configured in the AI Life app, or on a phone running EMUI 10.0.1.150 or later. The Huawei AI Life app is very comprehensive and features many options to minutely tune the Freebuds 3i earbuds the way you like them to. Huawei has also added an ambient mode that will amplify the background sounds to listen to the surroundings better.

Battery Life

Battery Life is one of the major strongholds of the Freebuds 3i earbuds. It can last up to hours (ANC off) on a single charge and the charging case increases the total to 10 hours. The Freebuds 3i comes with wireless charging and can be changed effortlessly with reverse wireless charging supported smartphones or conventional wireless charging pads.

Verdict

The FreeBuds 3i offers a thorough noise-canceling experience for your immersive enjoyment. The Freebuds 3i is one of the robust choices in the market at present for a budget under Ksh.11,000.

description:
Huawei Band 6

The Huawei Band 6 price in Kenya is Ksh 7000. This is one of the feature-rich smart fitness trackers available in Kenya with one of the best sleep tracking algorithms. The Huawei Band 6 is a major update to its predecessor the popular Huawei Band 4.

Huawei Band 6 Specs and price

Design and Build Quality

The Huawei Band 6 looks and feels much more premium than the Mi band 4 honestly. The rectangle-shaped dial is very practical and the extra width of the same helps ineffective use of screen real estate. The textured silicone trap is thick enough to withstand rough usage without fail. The belt lock mechanism ensures a tight fit around the wrist as well.

Even though the charging is via the pogo pins, the special cradle charger doesn’t require you to remove the tracker module from the strap-like in the case of Mi band 4. The Band 6 is water-resistant up to 5atm, making it suitable for outdoor usage even in adverse weather conditions.

Display

The Honor Band 5 features a 1.47-inch OLED color touchscreen display with a pixel density of 282ppi. This display is bright enough for effortless outdoor usage. The colors look vivid and punchy and the contrast levels are excellent. Thanks to the sensitive touch screen panel, menu navigation is very intuitive. There is a capacitive button at the bottom of the display to go back to the main screen from within any menu item on a single tap. Huawei has included multiple watch faces which can be swapped according to your preference.

Sensors

The Huawei Band 6 comes with a dynamic heart rate sensor and SpO2 monitor onboard. This heart rate sensor can be turned on for real-time tracking if you wish to have that but at the expense of battery life. The data from these sensors are reasonably accurate for non-medical use cases. Sleep tracking is one area where the Huawei band excels. The Huawei Trusleep algorithm tracks sleep much better and accurately than almost all other fitness trackers in this price segment.

Miscellaneous

The Huawei Health app is thoughtfully designed to show you the summary of aggregated data from the tracker in a very intuitive manner. The Huawei Band 6 features smart music and media controls that will let you control your smartphone music player, right from the tracker itself. You can see incoming call and message notifications directly on this band, thanks to the smart notifications feature.

Battery Life

Huawei claims this smart band to last for up to 14 days on a single full charge. But in a realistic use case scenario, expect to get anywhere between 8-10 days of moderate usage. The Huawei Band 6 can be charged using the supplied charging dock in a jiffy.

Verdict

Huawei Band 6 is a budget smart fitness band with a decent build quality and good sensor accuracy. This fitness tracker is the best out there in terms of sleep tracking under a budget of Ksh 7000.

description:
Samsung Galaxy M22

The Samsung Galaxy M22 price in Kenya is Ksh 26,000 for the 128GB version . The Galaxy M22 is powered by the MediaTek Helio G80 processor with ARM Mali-G52 2EEMC2 GPU. The phone has 6GB RAM and 128 GB of internal storage which is expandable using microSDXC. The Galaxy M22 runs on Android 11 and all this is powered by a 5000 mAh battery. It also has a quad rear camera setup where a 48MP primary camera with OIS along with 8MP ultra-wide camera, 2MP depth, a 2MP macro sensor, and a 13MP front-facing camera. Buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Samsung Galaxy M22 specs and price in Kenya

Price in Kenya Ksh. 26,000
Display 6.4-inch HD+, Super AMOLED, 90Hz
Processor MediaTek Helio G80
Sim  Dual SIM
Connectivity GSM / HSPA / LTE
OS Android 11, One UI Core 3.1
RAM 4 GB, 6GB
Storage 64GB /128GB
Card Slot up to 256GB (dedicated slot)
Camera 48MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP
Selfie 13MP
3.5mm Jack Yes
USB Port USB Type-C 2.0
Fingerprint  Fingerprint (side-mounted)
Battery Li-Po 5000 mAh
Colors Black, White, Mint, Violet

Decent display

It basically is the same display as the one we see on Samsung Galaxy A22 which was released 2021, July 01. Here, you also get a 90Hz refresh rate but 600 nits (peak). Immerse yourself in the large 6.4-inch Infinity-U Display of Galaxy A22. It does have an Infinity-U super vivid 720 x 1600 pixels Super AMOLED. And that ~274 PPI density supports our claim. It is also a great display because Infinity Display is a near-bezel-less, full-frontal glass, edge-to-edge screen. It is also important to note that this phone has its fingerprint scanner side-mounted and not under its display. More display features are ~83.6% screen-to-body ratio and  600 nits (HDR).

Platform & performance

In Kenya, Samsung Galaxy M22 is available in one variant concerning internal storage and memory. This phone comes in three variants to list them: 64GB 4GB RAM, 128GB 4GB RAM, and 128GB 6GB RAM (eMMC 5.1). When you boot it up it will remind you that it is an Android 11 powered device then later on that it has One UI 3.0. Samsung’s latest One UI 3.1 over Android 11 has been included on Galaxy A32. It is also powered by a Mediatek Helio G80 (12 nm) chipset and an Octa-core (2×2.0 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.8 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU. By the way, there is a dedicated slot for the SD card here in the event the internal storage limits you one way or the other. Finally, under the hood is a Mali-G52 MC2 GPU.

Some of the new features include a dark mode for your menus and a new set of gestures for navigation. Here, you swipe from the sides to go back rather than swiping from the bottom like before. But the old options are still there if you want. You also have edge panels here, which can be pretty handy swiping on the edge of the screen will bring you to a customizable space for shortcuts. At the heart of the Galaxy M22, is a Mediatek Helio G80 (12 nm) chipset.

Cameras

Arguable the cameras on Samsung Galaxy M22 are some of the best this phone has to offer. That main 48 MP, f/2.0, (wide), AF surely is. Alongside it is an 8 MP, f/2.2, 123˚ (ultrawide), 1/4.0″, 1.12µm lens, a 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) and a 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth). If I am being honest, a 4K video recording would have been great here. Unfortunately video recording quality is only up to [email protected] on both the main and the 13 MP, f/2.2, (wide), 1/3.1″, 1.12µm front-facing cameras. Get also to play around with features such as LED flash, panorama, and HDR.

Battery

The Samsung Galaxy M22 comes with a massive 5,000 mAh battery. We best describe its performance as the power that keeps you going all day long. Seriously though, isn’t 5000mAh so generous? We find it is. And should you start running low, plugin, and power up with 25W Fast Charging? A 2.0, Type-C 1.0 reversible connector is present here. You also get NFC and 5.0, A2DP, LE with Samsung Galaxy A22.

Get the latest Samsung Smartphones in Kenya

description:
Realme C11 2021 in Kenya

The price of Realme C11 2021 in Kenya is 11,700 shillings. The C11 2021 features a 6.5 inches display of Android 11 and a Unisoc SC9863A (28nm) chipset. It also comes with a 13 MP camera and a 5000 mAh battery. The phone comes in the colors Gray and Blue. Buy Realme C11 2021 in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Realme C11 2021 specs and price in Kenya

Price  Ksh. 11,700
Camera  13 MP + 2 MP
Selfie  5 MP, f/2.4
Display  6.5 inches, IPS LCD
Storage  32GB + 2GB RAM
Chipset Unisoc SC9863A (28nm)
O.S  Android 10, realme UI 1.0
Battery  Li-Po 5000 mAh

Unboxing

Unboxing their signature bright yellow box. We are first greeted by the accessory packet, which holds your user manual, SIM ejector tool, and normally a free jelly case, which doesn’t seem to be the case here. Next, we have the unit itself, the 10-watt charging brick with Realme, signature accents, and a matching micro USB cable for charging. We have a large 6.52-inch display, a thickness of 8.9 millimeters, and comes in at a weight of 190 grams, which feels very comfortable to hold in the hand.

Design

Looking at the front, the Realme C11 2021 has a mini-drop notch design, which is beginning to look a little bit dated since all other entry-level phones are starting to adopt the Punchhole camera layout. It also has a very noticeable bezel by the chin, but with this screen size, we don’t think you’ll be having much of a problem. But the lack of a notification light might bother some people. Another thing that might bother you is the lack of gorilla glass protection. But you do get a pre-installed screen protector, which is a good thing, to say the least.

On the left sincere dual nano-SIM card tray, along with a dedicated micro SD card slot for expandable storage. On the right, we have your power button and volume rocker. The thought is nice and clean. What at the bottom, we have air either dated micro USB port for charging the primary mic. Loudspeaker and thankfully a 3.5-millimeter headphone jack.

Cameras

For cameras, Realme C11 2021 has a total of three. We get a dual rear setup consisting of a 13-megapixel primary sensor and a 2-megapixel depth sensor. In front. We get a 5-megapixel sensor for selfies. Unfortunately, there is no option to change the quality of photos in the settings. But video recording does let you change the resolution from either 720 P to 1080p. Shots taken with the rear camera aren’t bad, especially with HDR turned on. You get decent-looking images with a nice pop of color.

Portrait mode using the main shooter also works well but could use a little bit more work when it comes to subject background separation. With all beauty enhancements turned off, selfies are average. Switching to the front cameras, portrait mode works much better though with more sharpness. Better contrast. And of course, that nice bokeh effect that everybody loves. After taking a few shots, it looks like the Realme C11 2021 performance best from the close the midrange distances with an ample amount of lighting.

The Realme C11 2021 has a native image output of 4160 by 3120 pixels with no setting to change this in the default camera app. You have a choice of shooting at either 720 or 1080p at 30 FPS. When it comes to the video recording quality of it is enough for casual use since this doesn’t have any form of stabilization.

Battery

For power, it comes with a 5,000 mAh battery which supports 10watt charging. This huge capacity combined with the new resolution screen and power-efficient chipset provides an easy 2-day battery life. Charging however is slow given the limited 10-watt power delivery. Standard video loop tests see Realme C11 2021 give a total of 25 hours and 31 minutes of playback making this device a good companion for continuous multimedia consumption. Charging the device up from 0% takes two hours and 58 minutes to reach a full battery.

Buy the X10 in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Nokia X10 specs and price in Kenya

Price Ksh. 28,500
Display 6.67 inches, IPS LCD

Colors Dusk, Night

Introduction

HMD global has yet again dazzled us with six new budget-friendly Nokia-branded smartphones. The Nakia X10 is one of the most premia of HMD’s offerings with an emphasis on reliability, as well as durability. In this article review, we take a full in-depth tour of the hardware and the software. Now I can tell you that the Nakia X10 does not come with a charger or headphones bundled in the box. You should be able to use your old standard type C charging cable and adapter though with the X10. But if you do need a charger you can grab one directly from our website by following the highlighted link. You do at least get a 100%, same combustible protective case.

Display

Now the Nokia X10’s display is a 6.67-inch IPS whopper. Although at this price point you can get AMOLED screens if you prefer that sharp contrast and punchier, more vivid colors. I am talking about the likes of Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 and even Oppo Reno 5F surprisingly. Hello Nokia? But this is absolutely fine for your Netflix session, YouTube, and so on. It’s a Full-HD plus resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels. So even though it’s an IPS panel everything looks reasonably crisp. Maybe one final bummer is that there’s no way of changing the refresh rate because it’s a 60 Hertz panel. You don’t have a 90 Hertz or a 120 Hertz refresh option. And there’s no always-on-display feature because it’s an IPS panel. Did I mention there is Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection here?

Platform

So let’s move briefly on to the software and again Nokia fans won’t be surprised to learn that it is on board good stock Android experience here. It is, of course, the latest freshest Android 11. I think we can all agree that HMD Global has always been really good when it comes to guaranteeing security and OS updates. This being the case, the Nokia X10 is no different. You’ve got three guaranteed years of software upgrades on those security updates as well. Yes, this means you will be all the way covered up to Android 14 should you buy this phone.

Performance

As for storage get 64/128GB storage as standard on the Nakia X10. Of course, that is expandable up to half a terabyte via micro SD. Nokia X10 rocks the fresh new Qualcomm SM4350 Snapdragon 480 5G (8 nm) chipset just like the Nokia X20. So then you’re getting 5G future-proofing which on the occasional handsets at this sort of budget price point do deliver. The base version of the Nokia X10 comes with 4 gigs of RAM and there is a 6GB RAM version which will cost a few more of course.

On the left edge of the Nakia X10, you will find a dedicated Google Assistant button. We’re not entirely sure why we need that physical button when you can access the system with a quick swipe up from the corner. The worse news is that you can disable like Google assistant button but can’t map it with a different function. Anyway, Google Assistant is an artificial intelligence-powered virtual assistant developed by Google that is primarily available on mobile and smart home devices.

Battery

Stuffed inside of the Nokia X10 is a Li-Po 4,470 mAh, non-removable battery. Definitely not one of the biggest capacities out there even for budget smartphones. But because of that stock version of Android and the energy-efficient platform and everything, it will easily go a full day. If you’re fairly liberal with your usage be sure you will get two full days of use out of that on a single charge. By liberal, I mean a bit of messaging, a bit of web browsing, and stuff like that. The phone does support fast charging 18W.

Nokia X10 (5G) FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  1. When was Nokia X10 (5G) released? – The official release date is 2022, February 28.
  2. How big is the display of the Nokia X10 (5G)? – The screen size of the Nokia X10 (5G) is 6.67″ inches.
  3. Does the X10 (5G) support 5G? – Yes, it supports 5G because of Qualcomm SM4350 Snapdragon 480 5G (8 nm).
  4. Does the Nokia X10 (5G) have Google services? – Yes, it supports the services of Google Play Store, Gmail, youtube, etc.
  5. Does the X10 (5G) support fast charging? – No, it does not support fast charging.
  6. How many cameras does the X10 (5G) have? – There is a Quad main camera and a Single selfie camera?

description:
HTC U20 5G

The HTC U20 5G price in Kenya is Ksh 48,000. The HTC phone has a 6.52-in display, powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G 5G chip with Adreno 620 GPU. The phone has 8 GB of RAM, 256 GB of internal storage, and a 5000 mAh Battery. It has a quad-camera setup on the rear that consists of a 48MP +8MP + 2MP+ 2MP and a 32 MP front camera for selfies. Buy the HTC U20 5G in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

HTC U20 5G specs and price in Kenya

Price Ksh. 48,000
Display 6.8 inches, IPS LCD
Processor Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G 5G
Sim Card Dual SIM
Connectivity GSM / HSPA / LTE/5G
OS Android 10
RAM 6GB, 8GB
ROM 256 GB
Card Slot microSDXC
Camera 48MP +8MP + 2MP+ 2MP
Selfie 32MP
3.5mm jack Yes
USB Port Micro USB 2.0
Fingerprint Rear-mounted
Battery Li-Po 5000 mAh
Charging 18 W fast-charging
Colors Green, White

Design

Externally the HTC U20 5G is a pretty generic-looking 2020 smartphone. With its whole punch displaying quad cameras along with surprising throwback design elements like a capacitive rear fingerprint scanner, and a hefty chin down below. What makes this phone more modern is its specifications sheet. We are talking Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G, 8 gigabytes of RAM, 256 GB of storage, 5G connectivity, and a gigantic 5,000 mAh battery.

For a phone brand that was largely considered dead and buried that’s not a bad-looking device. If you look at it alongside perhaps the Google Pixel 5 smartphone, it sounds like a fairly competitive device. And speaking of the Pixel 5, it’s fun to remember that the people designing this thing would’ve been working in the very same building as Google’s pixel five engineering team.

Cameras

HTCs less-than dignified exit from the high-end phone segment a couple of years ago involved a phone with glitchy virtual buttons and stale software redeemed by some of the best cameras of its generation. There’s no mention of the HDR boost feature on HTC U20 5G, instead, HTC focuses on the video stabilization capabilities of its new camera, the 48-megapixel shooter. That’s likely a Sony IMX 586 or similar. Which are the same sensor used in the Oneplus 7 Pro and many other 2019 flagships. Decent but not outstanding.

The other cameras present on HTC u20 are an 8 MP, f/2.2, 118˚ (ultrawide), 1/4.0″, 1.12µm, a 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) and a 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth). With the main camera you will achieve [email protected], [email protected], gyro-EIS video recording. But with its 32 MP, f/2.0, (wide), 1/2.8″, 0.8µm selfie shooter, [email protected] videos. Some notable camera features here include Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama and HDR.

Platform

There’s also the question of the software. Even back in 2017, HTC Sence looked absolutely prehistoric compared to the software design of its contemporaries. Little can be said of the HTC U20 5G software besides it runs the Android 10 operating system. There is still no news on whether or not this will be the case seeing that it has been Android 10 for the longest time now. Qualcomm SM7250 Snapdragon 765G 5G (7 nm) is a highlight of this smartphone. Powering is also an Octa-core (1×2.4 GHz Kryo 475 Prime & 1×2.2 GHz Kryo 475 Gold & 6×1.8 GHz Kryo 475 Silver CPU with Adreno 620. Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G Mobile Platform, with 5G modem integrated, optimizes power efficiency.

Another highlight of this U20 5G smartphone would be, again, the fact that it is a 5G powered smartphone. It supports HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G 2.56/0.9 Gbps bands just to be sure. HTC markets the 5G this way, ” Massive bandwidth for 4K streaming as well as 4K output to your big-screen TV. With U20 5G in your hand, 4K quality home theater is always at the ready” – see the official U20 5G website. HTC U20 5G is only available in 256GB storage, with a an option of either 6GB or 8GB or RAM.

More features

In a general sense, we will tell you about other features of the HTC U20 5G. Like its display for example which is an IPS panel that measures 6.8 inches, 111.6 cm2. Besides that, it has a 1080 x 2400 pixels resolution with 387 PPI. An AMOLED panel would have made this phone even more desirable if you ask me. Just saying. Then there is its Li-Po 5000 mAh, a non-removable battery that will last a whole day of usage comfortably. It supports Fast charging 18W which is Quick Charge 4.0. Finally, this is a Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) smartphone that supports a microSDXC card. Battery life

The question mostly asked usually is, “How do I charge my JBL tune 115bt?” Well, it is advised to use the supplied micro-USB charging cable, which came with the headphones. You will also need a USB charger from your smartphone or a regular USB port of a computer. Carefully remove the dust cap on the remote control of the headphones. Under there is the micro-USB port to charge the battery.

JBL Pure Bass Sound

According to JBL’s official product website of JBL Tune 115bt Headphones, for over 70 years, JBL has engineered the precise, impressive sound found in big venues around the world. description:
JBL Tune 110 In-ear headphones

JBL Tune 110 In-ear headphones have a recommended retail price of 2,600 shillings in Kenya. They feature JBL’s pure sound bass, a 1-button remote, and a tangle-free flat cable. For the price that these sell for they should be a no-brainer.

Why Tune 110 Headphones?

What will you like about Tune 110 compared to other cheap options? The bass is very good while the mids and highs are good enough, they have good enough clarity while never being too raspy or too bright sounding.

You will never have a single Instrument or song cause these to distort or sound weird. Then there’s the comfort, the way the wire comes out of the earbud means they never rub against your ears, also the angled tips mean they fit snuggly in my ears without being annoying.

Are they good?

The sound quality of JBL Tune 110 Headphones is clear, accurate, has great bass extension and so far are completely unflappable even at higher volumes. I find them super comfortable and ended up wearing them for almost 5 continuous hours while doing paperwork. However, these T110 do not have a noise-canceling feature.

Official page

JBL’s official page for these earphones records that the JBL TUNE110 in-ear headphones are lightweight, comfortable, and compact. Under the durable earpiece housing, a pair of 9mm drivers punch out some serious bass, reproducing the JBL Pure Bass sound you’ve experienced in concert halls, arenas, and recording studios around the world.

description:
JBL Tune 110BT In-ear headphones

JBL Tune 110BT In-ear headphones have a recommended retail price of 4,200 shillings in Kenya. They feature up to 6-hour battery life and recharges in 2 hours. For the price that these sell for they should be a no-brainer.

Customer experience

These earbuds have amazing audio quality and call quality for the price. Honestly, you will be blown away by how good these will sound. The buttons are nice and large which means they’re easy to find and press. JBL Tune 110BT Headphones will also pair with your phone really fast and easily and with a range of all other JBL BT products too.

Safety

The JBL T110BT is a comfortable and stable fit, and they come with sleeves in three different sizes. We tried doing a head flailing test and they passed. They should work well for running, though I didn’t sweat, so I don’t know how perfect they are for major workouts. They’re not water-resistant, so heavy sweaters beware of that.

Charging

Micro USB charging built-in battery provides up to 6 hours of playing time, with quick recharge in just 2 hours. Imagine headphones that quickly charge in 2 hours, come in 6 distinctive colors, feature a flat tangle-free cable, and are lightweight enough to comfortably wear for hours on end. JBL Boombox 2 Epic sound. All-day long.

The JBL Boombox 2 price in Kenya is Ksh 56500. Own the party. From backyard barbecues to weekend road trips, Boombox 2 brings it with monstrous bass, bold design, and up to 24 hours of playtime. IPX7 waterproof and portable, this powerful speaker pumps out a massive sound all day and all night. Plus, you can connect other JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers to turn the party up. Boombox 2 keeps your friends dancing and its built-in power bank keeps your devices charged. So you can groove from dusk till dawn and keep going strong! Check out the latest JBL Boombox 3.

JBL Boombox 2 Features

  • The loudest JBL boombox ever: Turn it up. Way up. Get the loudest, most massive JBL Signature Pro Sound on our most powerful portable speaker, the JBL Boombox 2.
  • Monstrous bass you can feel: Dance parties thrive on bass, so let your friends feel it. JBL Boombox 2 pumps out powerful, deep bass just like your favorite JBL-powered club.
  • Keep the party going with 24 hours of playtime: The fun doesn’t have to stop. Packed with an incredible 24 hours of battery life, JBL Boombox 2 lets you party all day and all night.
  • Make a splash with IPX7 waterproof design: Bring your speakers anywhere. Pool party? Perfect. Sudden cloudburst? Covered. Bash on the beach? JBL Boombox 2 is IPX7 waterproof up to three-feet deep for fearless outdoor entertainment.
  • Strong, bold design: Sleek. Bold. Powerful. With its iconic grip handle and stylish side flares, JBL Boombox 2 will turn heads wherever you take it.
  • Crank up the fun with PartyBoost: PartyBoost allows you to link multiple JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers to pump up the party.
  • Power up with the built-in power bank: Don’t put the party on pause. A built-in power bank lets you charge your devices without taking a break from the tunes.

Powerful sound

description:
JBL PartyBox 100

The JBL PartyBox 100 price in Kenya is 41,000 shillings. PartyBox 100 is a powerful portable Bluetooth party speaker with a dynamic light show. It is also an award-winning speaker.

JBL PartyBox 100 specs and price in Kenya

Price in Kenya Ksh. 41,000
Dimensions 290 x 551 x 288 mm
Power Output 160 W
Frequency Response 45 Hz to 18 kHz
Soundbar weight 9.7 kg
Bluetooth version 4.2

Whats is in the box?

  • 1 x JBL Party Speaker
  • Quick-Start Guide (1 x)
  • 1 x Warranty Card
  • Safety Sheet (1 x)
  • 1 x AC Power Code (AC Plug varies by Region)

Durability

JBL has made the JBL PartyBox 100 out of top-grade consumer plastics with a metal mesh speaker cover for a solid look and feel. This speaker not only feels durable but I also feel this speaker could take quite a few tumbles before biting the dust. You may also want to see PartyBox 300 Bluetooth speaker.

Sound

The JBL PartyBox 100 wowed me with its impressive, clear sound that controlled the space. The deep bass was all-consuming. Especially after I hit the bass boost, it hit a completely different level. the highs and mids are crisp and clear. I have only had this loudspeaker 3/4 of the way up so far and that has been almost too loud for me.

The tech

The PartyBox 100 has all the bells and whistles that a smaller Bluetooth speaker would contain however, JBL had a few tricks up their sleeve on this one. The LED Light show firstly is a show stopper. You have 3 different light shows to choose from and all flow with the beat of the music. The Bluetooth connectivity is also great. I am able to take my phone anywhere in my home and still have a connection.

Recommendation

JBL has again knocked it out of the park with this one! A truly standalone product from its competitors. The JBL PartyBox 100 packs a huge punch in sound without and huge punch out of your pocketbook. Visit JBL’s official page for this speaker.

description:
Samsung Galaxy Buds2 in Kenya

The Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 price in Kenya is Ksh 11500. The Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 are stylishly designed wireless earbuds that produce crystal clear sound. Thanks to the Dynamic 2-way speakers, the Buds2 produces a beautiful sound, and in combination with Active Noise Cancelling you can enjoy your favorite music or movie to the fullest.

The ANC filters 98% of the noise from the outside, don’t you want to be completely cut off from the outside world? Then turn on ‘Ambient Sound’, this setting has three levels of noise-canceling, ideal if you listen to music on the bike, for example. Another useful feature is the ‘Noise Reduction Solution’, which ensures that you can be heard in any situation, through the three built-in microphones. The Galaxy Buds 2 is available at PhonePlace Kenya.

Samsung Galaxy Buds2 price in Kenya

Price in Kenya Ksh. 11500
Driver unit 2-way (Woofer + Tweeter)
Microphones 3 mics (2 outers + 1 inner)
Supported Codecs AAC, SBC, Scalable (Samsung proprietary)
Connectivity Bluetooth 5.2
Sensors Accelerometer, Gyro, Proximity, Hall, Touch, Voice Pickup Unit
Battery Earbuds – 61mAh; Charging Case – 472mAh
Dimensions Earbuds: 17.0x 20.9x 21.1mm; Weight: 5g
Charging case: 50x 27.8x 50.2mm; Weight: 41.2g
Play Time ANC ON: 5 hours (buds) / 20hours (case)
ANC OFF: 7.5 hours (buds) / 29 hours
Colors Graphite, White, Olive, and Lavender
Resistant IPX2 Splash

The case is always white, but the Galaxy Buds2 actually come in four colors – Graphite, White, Oliver Green, and Lavender. The Galaxy Buds 2 are designed in such a way that they sit extremely comfortably. This is partly because they are so light, but also because of the silicone wing tips included in three sizes and the ‘Earbud fit test’ app, which ensures that your earbuds fit perfectly and the ANC works optimally. The Buds2 are very easy to operate, with your phone, smartwatch, tablet, or just through the Bud itself.

Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 Key Features

  • 2-Way Dynamic Speakers
  • Active Noise Cancellation
  • Up to 5 Hours of Power with ANC On
  • Charging Case with 15 Additional Hours
  • 3 x Ambient Sound Modes
  • 3 Mics & VPU for Clear Hands-Free Calls
  • Curved Shape Helps Reduce Wind Noise
  • Seamless Auto Switch Between 3 Devices
  • Secure Fit with Intuitive Touch Controls

Description

In addition, connecting to multiple devices also goes almost by itself, for example, you are watching a movie on your tablet, but you get a call, then the Buds automatically switch to your phone as soon as you answer. The ideal thing about the Buds2 is that they are waterproof, so you can cycle through the rain with peace of mind. The battery of the earbuds lasts for 5 hours, and even 7.5 hours if you do not use ANC. If they are empty, quickly charge them in the supplied case.

In the box: Galaxy Buds 2, Charging Box, Eartips (S, M, L), Quick Start Guide, USB Cable.

description:
Xiaomi Redmi 9A in Kenya

The price of Xiaomi Redmi 9A in Kenya is around Ksh 11300. The Redmi 9A features a 6.53 inches display, Android 10, and MediaTek Helio G25 chipset. It also comes with a 13 MP camera and a 5000 mAh battery. The phone comes in colors Granite Gray, Peacock Green, and Sky Blue. Buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace.

Xiaomi Redmi 9A specs and price in Kenya

Price in Kenya Ksh. 11300
Camera 13 MP
Selfie 5 MP
Display 6.53 inches
Storage 32GB / 2GB RAM
Chipset MediaTek Helio G25
O.S Android 10, MIUI 12
Battery Li-Po 5,000 mAh

History

The Redmi 8A which Xiaomi released in 2019, September 30 is now looked upon as the predecessor of the Redmi 9A. The 8A was, and still is a great budget option costing around 11,500 shillings in Kenya. Like its successor, it has a 5000 mAh battery, 2GB RAM, 32GB storage, and is a 4G powered smartphone. The main difference between Redmi 8A and 9A lies in the cameras and display sizes.

Performance

We always talk about the performance of a phone with respect to the phone’s hardware and software features. With Xiaomi Redmi 9A comes Android 10 with the all-new MIUI 12. MIUI is an Android-based operating system for smartphones and tablet computers developed by Xiaomi. The phone is also powered by an Octa-core 2.0 GHz Cortex-A53, MediaTek Helio G25 (12 nm) chipset. Helio G25 brings the benefits of HyperEngine technology, providing smooth performance, enhanced power efficiency, and reliable, low-latency connections. Onboard is also a PowerVR GE8320 (650 MHz) GPU.

Cameras

Like the Galaxy J2 Core 2020, Xiaomi Redmi 9A also comes with two cameras. One on the back is the main shooter and one front-facing lens, alias, selfie camera. The main camera here is a 13 MP lens which for the price is a decent offering. Glad to see Xiaomi not involve itself in the poor practice of adding unnecessary lenses.

Another option of the 9A would be Redmi 9C which has a triple camera (13 + 5 + 2 MP) module, check it out. And then there was that 5 MP selfie shooter which is at best, fine. Video recording is [email protected] with either camera.

Connectivity

If you are on a slim budget but are looking for a phone with a Type-C 1.0 USB, Bluetooth 5.0, and 4G network, then Xiaomi Redmi 9A would be a great option, to begin with. The phone also has Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, a hotspot, GPS with A-GPS, and yes, an Infrared port. An infrared port. a.k.a. IrDA port is a port that enables devices to exchange data without using cables. That 3.5mm jack is also present wherein you can plug the headphone and listen to your favorite content. Be sure to also check out Redmi 9

Xiaomi Redmi 9A battery

One major advantage of many budget smartphones in Kenya is that they come with large battery capacities. Take Huawei Y5p for example which comes with what seems to be a small 3020 mAh battery. Yet the same is able to last up to two days of usage. This is because of the minimal requirements and optimized performance the phone has.

This also is the case here, and better. Xiaomi Redmi 9A comes with a large 5000 mAh battery. Note 7 Lite likewise. At 5000 mAh you get the most out of any phone before the next charge is required.

description:
Mi True Wireless Earbuds Basic 2

The Mi True Wireless Earbuds Basic 2 price in Kenya is 3,500 shillings. These True Wireless Earbuds Basic 2 are equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.0 chip.

How to pair

1: Remove the headphones from the case.

2: Put your thumbs on both (at the same time) and hold them down until you see a red light indicating they have turned off.

3: Then press both earbuds at the same time and leave your fingers on while the LED lights flash more white and red; Once that happens, keep pressing without removing your fingers until a second heartbeat of the same type occurs. In total, this process takes between 15 and 30 seconds and during the procedure, you will see them turn off and on several times.

4: Put them back in the case. Visit the official product website of the Mi True Wireless Earbuds Basic 2 to learn more.

How to reset

1: Remove the headphones from the case.

2: Put your thumbs on both (you have to put them on the top of the outer surface of the earphone, where there is no LED light) and leave them pressed until the two LED lights flash several times between red and white. It will take a few seconds.

3 ： They have already been restored. Put them back in the case.

description:
Google Pixel 5

The Google Pixel 5 price in Kenya is Ksh 94,500. The Google Pixel 5 features a 6.0 inches display, Android 11, and Snapdragon 765G processor with Adreno 620 GPU. It also comes with a dual 12.2MP + 16MP rear camera and an 8 MP front camera for selfies. The Pixel 5 runs on an 8GB Ram with 128GB storage and all this is powered by a 4080 mAh battery. The phone arrives in the colors, Just Black and Sorta sage. You can buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace for the best price.

Google Pixel 5 specs & price in Kenya

Price in Kenya  Ksh. 94,500
Camera 12.2MP + 16MP
Selfie 8 MP
Display 6.0 inches
Storage 128GB
Chipset Snapdragon 765G
O.S Android 10
Battery Li-Po 4,080 mAh

Design

With the design of Google Pixel 5, Google went with aluminum. The phone is much lighter than other phones out there and weighing 150 grams. It is easy to use on one hand for long periods of time. The rounded edges and the matte back material on this phone result in a phone that’s easy to grip. It’s not slippery and it’s water-resistant with IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 mins). Is it not remarkable to see wireless charging on a phone which hasn’t got a glass back?

Google Pixel 5 phone hits all of the marks for anyone looking to buy a decent smartphone. It has a good resolution OLED screen, 90 Hertz screen, an all-screen display this time, hole punch for the selfie camera, and no large bezels. The top speaker and it’s under the display of the Google Pixel 5. They also put a pixel imprint sensor on the back foregoing, the great face unlock feature from 2019.

Platform

The pixel version of Android that runs on Google Pixel 5 makes this phone a joy to use. It’s simple! There’s no crap here or ads loaded onto it as you get with other phones. Google also adds some really nice tie-ins like smart home controls to the power button menu or the on-device Google assistant. Moving on. If you’re a fan of haptics, pixel five sports, a haptic experience, that’s very similar to pixel 4. You will absolutely love that haptics are on the keyboard by default. The performance of the phone is fine. It’s snappy and everything feels fluid.

Camera’s performance

The google pixel 5 just takes a second to process a photo compared to the almost instantaneous processing that we see with the Pixel 4. Speaking of photos, this camera is probably one of the main selling points for the Google Pixel 5. Pixel phone cameras have been impressive cameras that you can do a lot with. Google Pixel five-camera nets quite a few stunning photos.

As for the videos, Google has adjusted the colors and contrast in the video to make things look less washed out. Newly added stabilization modes also make things work really well. Google also added 4k at 60 frames per second.

Wide-angle camera

Also, the Google Pixel 5 camera UI layout is easy to use. The inclusion of a wide-angle camera instead of a telephoto camera makes it much more comparable to the experience of other smartphones out there. This wide camera produces some great results that are comparable to the iPhones thanks to Google’s outstanding HDR. Google Pixel five supports raw photos and the selfie camera on the Pixel 5 is quite good. It can shoot in 1X and can also do 1.4X as well.

Display

It is an OLED, HDR10+ display at 6.0 inches. It does have 85.9% screens to the body. You do have a punch-hole camera up there on display. Google also includes some pretty neat wallpapers that do go with the camera. You’ll have something that kind of blends in with the camera hole. In addition, you could throw this thing in a dark mode as well, and you could schedule it here. It is a pretty decently high PPI at 432, and it’s always at that resolution of 90 Hertz. This one also boasts Corning Gorilla Glass 6 protection to ensure durability and longevity.

Battery

The battery life is amazingly great. Google was able to include wireless charging on this phone, which is great and something I definitely missed while using the similar-looking pixel Google Pixel 4a. Pick any region by following this link to learn more about this phone. We are looking at a Li-Po 4080 mAh, the non-removable battery here with USB Power Delivery 2.0, Fast charging 18W, Wireless charging 12W, and Reverse charging 5W. Again, is it not remarkable to see wireless charging on a phone which hasn’t got a glass back? Yeah, because this one has an aluminum back, and an aluminum frame.

description:
Samsung Galaxy M12 in Kenya

The Samsung Galaxy M12 price in Kenya is expected to be around Ksh 24,500. The Galaxy M12 has a 6.53-in display, powered by an Exynos 850 chip, up to 6 GB of RAM, 128 GB of internal storage, and a 6,000 mAh Battery. Coming to cameras, it has a quad-camera system that consists of a 48MP + 5MP + 2MP + 2MP and an 8 MP front camera for selfies. Buy Galaxy M12 in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Samsung Galaxy M12 specs and price in Kenya

Price in Kenya Ksh 24,500
Display 6.5 inch, TFT
Storage  32GB/64GB/128GB
CPU Exynos 850
Back Camera 48MP + 5MP + 2MP + 2MP
Front Cameras 8 MP
Ram 3GB/4GB/6GB
Battery Li-Ion 6,000 mAh

Connectivity

If you are on a slim budget but are looking for a phone with a USB Type-C 2.0, Bluetooth 5.0, and 4G network, then Samsung Galaxy M12 would be a great option, to begin with. The phone also has Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, a hotspot, GPS with A-GPS. NFC (market/region dependent). That 3.5mm jack is also present wherein you can plug the headphone and listen to your favorite content.

Display

Focusing on the display of the Samsung Galaxy M12, the same comes with a big and bright 6.5 inches TFT display panel. TFT is a type of LCD flat panel display screen in which each pixel is controlled by one to four transistors. The TFT technology provides the best resolution of all the flat-panel techniques, but it is also the most expensive.

Yeah so now Super AMOLED display on the Galaxy M12 dear reader, maybe have a look at other phones in case this is a dealbreaker? Although it really shouldn’t be. We see a rather low 720 x 1560 pixels resolution with 270 PPI density. We’re thinking a compromise had to be made. The other thing that might appear unusual is that dewdrop instead of a hole punch which has now become accustomed to Samsung phones.

Cameras

Arguable the cameras on Samsung Galaxy M12 are some of the best this phone has to offer. That main 48 MP, f/2.0, (wide), PDAF surely is. Alongside it is a 5 MP, f/2.2, 123˚ (ultrawide), 1/5.0″, 1.12µm lens, a 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro) and a 2 MP, f/2.4, (depth). If I am being honest, 4K video recording would have been great here. Unfortunately video recording quality is only up to [email protected] on both the main and the 8 MP, f/2.2 (wide) front-facing cameras. Get also to play around with features such as LED flash, panorama, and HDR.

Performance

Samsung Galaxy M12 has an Exynos 850 (8nm) chipset. This one is different from Galaxy A12‘s Mediatek MT6765 Helio P35 chipset. You’ll be greeted by a software update on the first boot. The phone comes running Android 11, One UI 3.0, and has a Mali-G52 GPU. As for the storage options, you will need to choose among 32GB 3GB RAM, 64GB 4GB RAM, or 128GB 6GB RAM. All these storage options are of eMMC 5.1 infrastructure and can be expanded using microSDXC (dedicated slot). As for the CPU, that Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) will have you sorted. 

Battery

description:
Google Pixel 5a 5G

The Google Pixel 5a 5G price in Kenya is 59,500 shillings. It is powered by the Qualcomm SM7250 Snapdragon 765G 5G (7 nm) processor with Adreno 620. The phone has 6GB RAM and 128 GB of internal storage which is not expandable using microSDXC. The 5a 5G runs on Android 11, upgradable to Android 12, and all this is powered by a Li-Po 4680 mAh battery. The phone comes in colors Mostly Black. Buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Google Pixel 5a specs & price in Kenya

Price in Kenya  Ksh. 59,500
Camera 12.2MP + 16MP
Selfie 8 MP
Display 6.34 inches, OLED
Storage 128GB
Chipset Snapdragon 765G 5G
O.S Android 12
Battery Li-Po 4680 mAh

Design

When it comes to the body, this phone is actually bigger than the Pixel 5a 5G and it’s slightly bigger than the Pixel 5. This is a bigger phone if you want the 6.34-inch body. It has a plastic back (The plastic does keep the weight down a bit). At the bottom is the Google (G) logo and further down of the phone, you can find a microphone and a speaker USB-C. Google did include a fast charger in the box. The camera bump is not that big. At the top, you will find the headphone Jack on the left side, you will find the SIM card tray. Around the edges, there’s a shiny kind of plastic frame around the edges of this phone. It’s just a clean, simple, Mostly Black phone.

Display

It is an OLED, HDR display at 6.34 inches. It does have 85.0% screens to the body. You do have a punch-hole camera up there on display. Google also includes some pretty neat wallpapers that do go with the camera. You’ll have something that kind of blends in with the camera hole. In addition, you could throw this thing in a dark mode as well, and you could schedule it here. It is a pretty decently high PPI at 415, and it’s always at that resolution of 60 Hertz. So we don’t have 90 Hertz smoothness. But still, the Google Pixel 5a 5G device is one of the smoother 60 Hertz Android phones. Its resolution is 1080 x 2400 pixels upon a 20:9 aspect ratio.

Brilliant cameras

When it comes to the cameras of Google Pixel 5a 5G, this one is probably one of the main selling points for the Pixel 5a 5G. Pixel phones have impressive performance that you can do a lot with. Google Pixel five-camera nets quite a few stunning photos. As for the videos, Google has adjusted the colors and contrast in the video to make things look less washed out. Newly added stabilization modes also make things work really well. Google also added 4k at 60 frames per second. These features are literally the same as what we see on Google Pixel 5 from 2020, October 15. One might even be tempted to say, apart from batter capacity and the display sizes, the two are but the same phones.

Also, the Google Pixel 5a 5G camera UI layout is easy to use. The inclusion of a wide-angle (16 MP, f/2.2, 119˚) camera instead of a telephoto camera makes it much more comparable to the experience of other smartphones out there. This wide camera produces some great results that are comparable to the iPhones thanks to Google’s outstanding HDR. The Pixel 5a 5G supports raw photos and the 8 MP, f/2.0, 24mm (wide) selfie camera on the Pixel 5a 5G is quite good. It can shoot in 1X and can also do 1.4X as well.

Platform

The pixel version of Android that runs on Google Pixel 5a 5G makes this phone a joy to use. It’s simple! There’s no crap here or ads loaded onto it as you get with other phones. Google also adds some really nice tie-ins like smart home controls to the power button menu or the on-device Google assistant. If you’re a fan of haptics, pixel 5a 5G sports, a haptic experience, that’s very similar to Pixel 5. You will absolutely love that haptics are on the keyboard by default. The performance of the phone is fine. It’s snappy and everything feels fluid. The Pixel 5a 5G phone comes with 128GB of non-expandable internal storage with 6GB RAM.

Battery

The battery life of the Google Pixel 5a 5G is amazingly great. We are looking at a Li-Po 4680 mAh, the non-removable battery here with USB Power Delivery 2.0, Fast charging 18W.

description:
Galaxy Buds Live

The Galaxy Buds Live price in Kenya is Ksh 11,300. They come in three color options, mystic white, black, and bronze.  This price is lower higher than that of the standard Apple AirPods. The Buds Live are like the AirPods with an open design which makes them comfortable to wear. They’re also really discrete and sit flush with your ear without a little white pipe sticking out from them.

Galaxy Buds Live specs and price in Kenya

Price Ksh. 11,300
Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0
Resistance Water-resistant
Battery 60 mAh
Case battery 472 mAH
Comm Wireless
Ear tips Large, Medium, Small
Colors White, Bronze, Black

How to wear Galaxy Buds Live

Now, Samsung says you should stick these in your ears in a very particular way. It’s kind of with the speaker facing down into your ear at a 45-degree angle. However, it is a little bit more horizontal. So I think you have to go with what works for you depending on how securely they will fit. Keeping the standard AirPods in one’s ears isn’t as easy as it is here. With these, you will have no trouble. They fit well. You can run and even bike with them. And while they only have IPX 2 water-resistant, that means they are splash resistant from certain angles, they are sweat-resistant and you can work out in them.

We liked the Galaxy buds plus, which has a noise-isolating design. They fit well too. And we think they sound really good for the money. Figured that when Samsung did noise-canceling earbuds, it would make something very similar to the Buds Plus and add noise canceling and call them the buds pro or something like that. But instead, it’s these Samsung Buds Live earbuds that have noise canceling.

Samsung calls it ANC for open type. I can’t say it’s all that effective. There have been a few earbuds that have an open or semi-open design that has noise canceling. But I’ve always found that you need a tight seal to have noise-canceling work. These are supposed to reduce some noise in the lower frequencies. And Samsung talks about them blocking sound while you’re riding on a train or a bus.

Compatibility

Sound-wise, the Galaxy Buds Live just is quite there with the best sounding true wireless earbuds. They’re as refined as those headphones. They’re really solid and pleasant to listen to. And you can make some sound tweaks in the galaxy Bud’s companion app for iOS & Android. You might notice that the bass rolls off a little bit at higher volumes when you push the volume up. But that tends to be par for the course for Bluetooth earbuds. Still, because these are open. I’d tend to push the volume.

Listening experience

They do seem to help slightly when you’re listening to music or making voice calls and noisy environments. But the AirPods Pro and Sony WF 1000 XR3 have much better noise canceling. So don’t buy these for the noise canceling, or you may be disappointed. On the flip side, if you’re sensitive to active noise canceling, these shouldn’t bother you. Like the Galaxy Buds Plus, I did like how these sounded no surprise.

Galaxy Buds Live does sound open. That’s where the live name comes from. Their open airy sound doesn’t feel like it’s stuck in your head. They’ve got 12-millimeter drivers and a big base port. The base is plump yet punchy, which is how most people like it. And there’s a nice detail in the mids and highs. There’s certainly lively sounding, the dynamic is the word to use. Visit this product’s official website here

Multiple devices

It’s a little unclear whether these have true multipoint Bluetooth pairing. It does seem to work with galaxy devices. You can pair them with multiple galaxy devices and they automatically switch between those devices. It’s pretty seamless! With iOS and Android users. That’s regular Android users. It’s a little bit more complicated. You’d have to manually switch between them. They don’t seem to be paired simultaneously to two devices at once. You can also pair these two windows computers using Microsoft Swift pair.

Background noise & calls

The Galaxy Buds Plus did a good job of reducing background noise when you’re making voice calls. Galaxy Buds Live do too. There are two microphones on the outside of each bud and one on the inside. And while they don’t completely muffle sound around you, they do a good job of tamping down ambient noise and also picking up your voice. People I spoke with said they could hear me well, even when I had speak noise, playing pretty loudly in the background.

Extra features

As for extra features. Galaxy device owners do get a few options, not available to Apple and regular Android users. That’s not surprising since AirPods partially exists to help sell more iPhones. So it shouldn’t shock anyone that Samsung would have some special features for its users. First, there’s a low latency gaming mode in the lab section of the app. It’s designed to reduce latency issues while gaming. That was also available for the buds plus, but what’s new is a hands-free Bixby voice assistant option.

Similar to the hands-free option for Siri, for AirPods that allows you to activate Bixby without using the earbuds touch controls. It does work well and is responsive. If you use a hands-free big speed, you do lose a little bit of battery life. Is aerated for up to 8 hours with noise canceling off in 6 hours with it on it drops to 5.5 with noise canceling on. And Bixby, always there waiting for you to wake it up. The compact charging case has wireless charging, or it also charges via USBC. It gives you about two and a half extra charges.

Recommendation

A lot of time talking points are about the sound and the features of Galaxy Buds Live. But it’s their design that is the standout feature. We get a lot of these types of your buds in for review. This is the first one in a while that we think is innovative and different. They’re pretty unique looking, discreet, and not only do they fit securely, but they’re comfortable to wear for long periods. Alas! The noise canceling. Isn’t what I hoped it would be, but it is a challenge to do with open earbuds like these even so they’re easily among the best of earbuds of 2020.

More Samsung devices here

description:
Huawei Y9a in Kenya

The Huawei Y9a price in Kenya is around 30,200 Kenya shillings. The Y9a features a 6.63 inches display Android 10 with no Google Play Services and a Mediatek Helio G80 (12 nm) chipset. It also comes with a 64 MP camera and either a 4200 mAh or 4300 mAh battery. The phone comes in colors Space Silver, Sakura Pink, and Midnight Black. Buy it in Kenya today at Phoneplace Kenya.

Huawei Y9a specs and price in Kenya

Price in Kenya   Ksh. 30,200
Camera  64MP + 8 MP + 2 MP + 2 MP
Selfie Motorized pop-up 16 MP
Display 6.63 inches, IPS LCD
Storage 128GB + 6GB RAM
Chipset Mediatek Helio G80 (12 nm)
O.S Android 10, EMUI 10.1
Battery Li-Po 4200 mAh

AI quad Camera

Let us consider for a moment the primary camera setup of Huawei Y9a. In so doing we must first take note that the phone has five cameras. Four on the back and one on the front. The tree camera lenses on the back are what we refer to as the main camera. They are made up of a main 64 MP shooter, an 8MP ultra-wide camera, and a third 2MP depth-sensing lens.

Now, these AI cameras each perform their functions as their names suggest. But together they assist you in exploring the mysterious nature or recording your daily life through a simple snap. You will be particularly impressed with the high resolution 64 MP, f/1.8, 26mm main lens which further enhances photos to be sharper and clearer. The y9a also comes with a 2 MP, f/2.4, depth-sensing camera lens. Present also is a 2MP depth-sensing lens.

There is no much information provided on the official product website on the motorized pop-up 16 MP, f/2.2, (wide), 1/3.1″, 1.0µm selfie camera of Huawei Y9a. But this you can count on for sure. 16 MP front-facing cameras on Huawei smartphones rarely (if at all they ever) disappoint. Video recording with it is [email protected] which is great for a front-facing camera. But this surely is not the case when it comes to the main camera. [email protected] video recording is the deal here unlike the [email protected] (bummer) we saw on the Huawei y8p

Huawei Y9a’s performance

In Kenya, Huawei Y9a is available in two variants concerning internal storage and memory. These variants are 128GB with 6GB RAM and 128GB with 8GB RAM (UFS 2.1).  The phone is also powered by a Mediatek Helio G80 (12 nm) chipset and an Octa-core (2×2.0 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.8 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU. By the way, there is a dedicated slot for the SD-card here in the event the internal storage limits you one way or the other. Finally, under the hood is a Mali-G52 MC2 GPU.

When you boot it up it will remind you that it is an Android 10 powered device then later on that it has EMUI 10.1. However, Huawei Y9a has no Google Play Services. What you do get is Huawei’s official app distribution platform to search, download, manage, and share mobile apps – HUAWEI AppGallery. 

Also, on that storage infrastructure, the y9a boasts, most premium android devices run with UFS 2.1, it is still superb storage for mobile devices, the speed is fantastic; it is just suitable for mobile devices. Any device running with UFS 2.1 will offer better read/copy performance than another running on any eMMC storage version. Also, check out the Mate 20 Pro

AppGallery

One question everyone buying a Huawei smartphone wants to be answered is whether the model they are buying has Android. I think it is important we all know that as a platform, Android is very much present on Huawei smartphones even Huawei y9a. What this phone does not have is G-APPS which the likes of Play-store have been replaced with Huawei AppGallery. You can use this App Gallery to search, download, install manage, and share your favorite user applications and games.

Check out the latest Huawei phones in Kenya.

description:
OnePlus Buds

The OnePlus Buds come in three color options, White, Gray, and Nord Blue. They cost around 13,500 shillings in Kenya. This price is way affordable than that of the Galaxy Buds Live. The OnePlus Buds are like the AirPods Pro with a stem design which makes them handy for call quality. You can buy OnePlus Buds in Kenya today at Phone Place Kenya. Let’s get into that.

OnePlus Buds specs and price in Kenya

Price Ksh. 13,500
Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0
Resistance
 Water-resistant
Battery 35mAh
Case battery
 430mAh
Comm Wireless
Colors
 White, Gray, Nord Blue

Design

OnePlus made an AirPod alternative that looks like every other AirPod alternative on the market. This STEM design has proven to be functional. The mic is close to your mouth, the fit fits most people and the amount of ambient sound being let through is enough to still feel a part of the world around you, but also be able to hear your music. So the question for the OnePlus Buds is not about fit and form. But instead, it’s did OnePlus make an AirPod Pro alternative for half of the price that is as reliable and as functional as AirPods? Find out in this review.

So OnePlus Buds come in a pretty plastic oval case that is a bit wider than the case of the Google pixel buds and thicker than the AirPods case. On the bottom, there’s a USB-C port on the back, a pairing button, on the inside magnets hold the buds in the case. They come in black, white and this teal color that is a little bit much of a pop of color. On a full charge.You may also want to see Galaxy Buds

Sound Quality

OnePlus claims that OnePlus Buds have a “Unique noise reduction algorithm, and 3 microphones on each bud to improve clarity.” That sounds like a heck of a claim. But I must mention that the AirPods blow OnePlus Buds out when it comes to noise reduction so be sure to check them out. Let’s also talk about audio quality. OnePlus Buds sound pretty good. The difference in sound quality says side to side with AirPods pro is so minimal if at all there is any. There are 13.4-millimeter drivers in here that can kick.

Playtime

The OnePlus Buds get you around 7 hours of continuous music playback. And the case holds 30 hours of music playback, which is around four full charges. It takes her 80 minutes to charge the case from 0 – 100%. Guaranteed you will have zero issues with battery life while using these. But as a side note, note there’s no wireless charging in these. See also Galaxy Buds Plus

Water and sweat-resistant

The OnePlus Buds are IPX for water and sweat resistance. These buds will be good in the rain and protected from sweat. A big downfall to these buds though, is that you cannot use one bud independently. And as soon as you take one out your music will pause. and when you put it back in your musical will resume. There’s also no app for these buds And the tap controls out of the box are limited.

OnePlus Buds controls

Double-tap a bud to skip to the next song, or hold down on a bud for 3 seconds to switch between sync devices. And that’s it. OnePlus claims that in late July one, OnePlus phones will be pushed a software update, allowing them to choose their preferred action for double-tapping. Including pausing music, jumping to the track, or activating the Google assistant. But that’s only for OnePlus devices.

Recommendation

Let’s wrap this up. Are the OnePlus Buds a half-priced AirPods alternative that is reliable and functional? Yes! Yes, they are. And if you are an OnePlus user, you’re going to have full control over these. But for everybody else, there is a massive market of buds. Be sure to check them out. Some may have a little bit more functionality than these do. Visit the official product website by following the highlighted link.

Check out more OnePlus devices available in Kenya

description:
Realme Buds Air

The Realme Buds Air comes in three color options, White, Gray, and Nord Blue. They cost around 4,500 shillings in Kenya. This price is way affordable than that of the AirPods which they resemble. The Realme Buds Air is like the AirPods Pro with a stem design which makes them handy for call quality. You can buy Realme Buds Air in Kenya today at Phone Place Kenya.

Realme Buds Air specs and price in Kenya

Price Ksh. 4,500
Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0
Chip
 R1 Headphone Chip
Built-In Mic Dual Mic
Headphone fit
  In-Ear
Comm Wireless
Colors
 White, Black, Yellow

The resemblance with Apple’s

So let’s start by talking about the most unique thing in the Realme Buds Air. The design! And we can start by talking about the AirPods’ resemblance. Make no mistake Realme Buds Air look strikingly similar. Scratch that. Exactly the same as the Apple Airpods. It’s got a similar-looking stem design and the overall look, the same charging case that says, “designed by Realme”. Even the sensors are aligned exactly the same as in the airports.

Yeah, there are some differences like the fact that the grooming, if that’s even grooming is a little different looking. The build quality is obviously nowhere close to as good as the Airpods. But concentrating on the huge price difference it would be unfair to complain. Overall, these look like Airpod twins, no doubts about that. I mean, I’m pretty sure that anyone who sees these new white Realme Buds Air will think they are the Airpods. There are the black and yellow versions if you ever wanted yellow or black buds.

Realme Buds Air features

Anyway, resemblance aside, what features do Realme Buds Air bring? Quite a lot of them. First of all, they come with the R1 chipset with Bluetooth 5.0, similar to the W1 chip in AirPods (cannot get over it). This R1 chip is said to bring low latency and the most stable connection. In fact, there’s even a gaming mode that said to reduce latency by more than 50%. We think the latency was pretty low, however, nothing extraordinary here.

Fitting

Moving onto the comfort and fit. These aren’t the most well-fitting earbuds since they are made out of plastic. See if they fit comfortably on your ears you will be pretty happy with these. So what I suggest you do is just try out Realme Buds Air before you go ahead and buy them. Here’s what you need to do. Just get Apple Airpods and if they fit well go ahead and buy them.

Connection

As for the stable connection, pairing the Realme Buds Air is this wise. You first have to open the case, press this button for a few seconds, wait for the air buds to play with each other, and then open Bluetooth settings on your phone to finally pair them. So it’s a little bit of work, but I think for the price, we can let that slide. You may also like Galaxy Buds Live

Touch control

Anyway, ones you have paired the earphones, the connection remains pretty stable. And they even connect quickly, when you just open up the case. Going back to the features that also touch controls which do take some time getting used. You can double-tap to play or pause, answer calls, long press launch the assistant, and long-press both sides to activate the gaming mode, which I talked about. By the way, there is no, Hey Google support so you’ll have to use these touch controls.

Apart from the touch controls, Realme Buds Air has ear detection. So the music pauses when you take the earphones out of your ear and automatically plays when you put them back in. Yeah, it’s nice. They dual my ex and ANC for calls. The voice from these earphones was always a little muffled. You might annoy the other person on the call. See official website

Sound quality

Now coming to the sound quality of the Realme Buds Air. This is one area where the Realme Buds Air is actually really good there’s ANC support, which is great. And there’s a dynamic bass boost driver and the BASS on these things is pretty good. Realme Buds Air gets pretty loud and there’s no distortion at max volumes. The highs are great. And the base, like I said is pretty good. In fact, if you ask me, I think the sound quality of these buds comes very close to what to get with the Airpods with the bass, definitely being better. And that is great.

Battery life and charging

Lastly, there’s the battery. The Realme Buds Air is set to last 3 hours or a single charge, and they can go up to 17 hours with the included case. Now, in my usage, these buds, easily last three hours and sometimes they even lasted longer, which is great. Plus the case here is a wireless charging case, which I think is pretty amazing at this price.

You can charge it with the new 10watt wireless charger from Realme or any other Qi wireless charger. Now, if you don’t use wireless chargers, you can charge this case or USB-C. So yeah, there’s that, but that’s pretty much everything about the new Realme Buds Air.

More Realme products here

  • Available in color Silver or Space Gray

Below are my thoughts about the Apple iPad Pro 12.9 (2018).

Design and build

On a different article I did talk about Apple iPad 11 Pro, which I did mention is the sister phone of the Pro 12.9 (2018). Check it out on www.phoneplacekenya.com, it and many other smartphones at affordable prices. I bring this up because these two tablets are similar in both design and build. There is that complimentary stylus pen (Bluetooth integrated) that you can use to interact with the large 12.9 inches display it boasts.

And be informed that by separately acquiring the keyboard it supports you can turn your tablet into a Mac book laptop. Of course it does miss a few functions here and there but the very basic computer tasks it will efficiently manage. The back of the iPad Pro 12.9 (2018) has been kept very clean and classy with that Apple logo and primary camera on the top right corner. The front has reduced bezels that stand out and add to the looks it has. The top bezel houses the selfie camera which also serves the Face ID feature that improves security by scanning your face to unlock your phone.

It is a very slim device at 5.9 mm thickness. This slim design makes it look and feel very sleek and attractive. It is beautiful thing to look at and interact with the iPad Pro 12.9 (2018).

Display

Boy this one you will love. Its LED-backlit IPS LCD capacitive touch screen may sound like a disappointment on paper until you interact with it. You will be super impressed how much work Apple put on this one. It has 2048 x 2732 pixel resolution with a 4:3 ratio (~265 ppi density). There is a Scratch-resistant glass dabbed oleophobic coating that ensures your display’s durability, a tough skin if I may.

Other features this display ensures include Wide color gamut display, true-tone display and 120 Hz. Of course viewing angles here are as great as one would expect and outdoor visibility should go without say. These are things Apple always put in the bag when it comes to the display department.  

Camera

Primary camera

The main camera here is a 12 MP, f/1.8, 29mm standard lens with 1/3″, 1.22µm, PDAF, Quad-LED dual-tone flash and HDR feature. Video recording with it is up to 4K that is [email protected]/60fps, [email protected]/60/120fps, [email protected]

Selfie camera

This is the other lens and it is a 7 MP, f/2.2, 32mm also standard lens with Face detection, HDR and panorama. Its video recording unlike the main’s is only up to [email protected]

Apple has never let us down when it comes to camera performance of its devices, and this will not be the first time it does. Expect the best of images from either of the two, and video recording is also high end here especially with that 12MP lens. The only thing we would have wished for is wide lens feature that allows you to fit a larger angle in one image, but thankfully there is panorama mode here.  

Performance and memory

Platform

This one runs on iOS 12 of course, which is upgradable to iOS 12.1 as will be directed once the upgrade is downloaded via a Wi-Fi network.

Then it comes powered by an Apple A12X Bionic (7 nm) chipset, an Octa-core (4×2.5 GHz Vortex + 4×1.6 GHz Tempest) CPU and an Apple GPU (7-core graphics) for those very impressive graphics. Let me say this, the graphics you will really enjoy especially when watching videos of playing games, a seamless experience as you will learn. There will be absolutely no sign of glitch, stutter or stammer.

Memory

1 TB, 6 GB RAM or 64/256/512 GB, 4 GB RAM. It is no secret that Apple do not leave room for SD card memory expansion so as usual, do not expect one here. I would really recommend the 256 GB version minimum because 64 can be easily used up these days. Although you will get the  64GB version at the best bargain.

Battery

The most interesting thing about the Non-removable Li-Po 7812 mAh battery of the Apple iPad Pro 12.9 (2018) is that it can hold enough charge to charge another smartphone. Now that is something you do not see every day. This is a tablet that serves as a power bank as well. Oh and that battery capacity should last up to a whole day of usage, or more.

Pros Cons
  • Great design and build
  • Impressive cameras
  • High end platform performance
  • Large battery with power bank feature
  • Can be used as a computer when keyboard is attached
  • Large internal memory 1TB
  • Improved security with Face ID
  • Expensive

It is a high end product this and although I think it comes at a high cost, I also am convinced you will feel the value for your money once you acquire this very impressive tablet device. It comes in either space gray or silver. Be sure to buy yours today.

JBL GO 2 Portable Bluetooth speaker

The JBL GO 2 price in Kenya is 5,000 shillings. It is a full-featured waterproof Bluetooth speaker to take with you everywhere. Wirelessly stream music via Bluetooth for up to 5 hours of continuous JBL quality sound. Making a splash with its new IPX7 waterproof design, GO 2 gives music lovers the opportunity to bring their speaker poolside, or to the beach. GO 2 also offers a crystal clear phone call experience with its built-in noise-canceling speakerphone. Crafted in a compact design with 12 eye-catching colors to choose from, GO 2 instantly raises your style profile to all-new levels.

JBL GO 2 Key Features

  • Wireless Bluetooth Technology
  • Stream Audio from up to 33′ Away
  • Can Double as a Speakerphone
  • Water Resistant in up to 3.3′ of Water
  • IPX7 Rated
  • Built-In Noise-Cancelling Technology
  • 3.5mm Input for Wired Device Connection

Description

Wirelessly stream high-quality sound from your smartphone or tablet. Built-in, rechargeable Li-ion battery supports up to 5 hours of playtime. The IPX7 waterproof housing makes GO 2 perfect for worry-free listening by the beach or poolside, or even in it.

The JBL GO 2 features a 3.5mm audio input, so if your audio source doesn’t have Bluetooth capabilities, you can plug in an audio cable (not included) and still enjoy your music through the speaker.

description:
Stay active. Stay healthy. Stay connected. Monitor your health. Track your workouts. Get the motivation you need to achieve your fitness goals with the Apple Watch Series 3 38mm. And stay connected to the people and information you care about. With Apple Watch Series 3, you can do it all — right from your wrist.

Three rings. One goal. Stand, Move, and Exercise rings visualize the ways you move each day. See if you’re sitting too much. Measure calories burned. And track how many minutes of exercise you’ve done. You can even share your rings with friends. Try new Activity competitions, and let smart coaching give you a nudge when you need it.

Take your workouts further. Track popular workouts like yoga, cycling, swimming, and high-intensity interval training. Track your runs with advanced features for runners like cadence and pace alerts. Pair wirelessly with compatible gym equipment.2 And sync your favorite playlist from Apple Music to stay motivated.

Keep your health top of mind. Monitor your heart rate, and get warnings when an unusually high or low heart rate is detected. Emergency SOS lets you initiate an immediate call for help. The Breathe app can help you better manage everyday stress. And you can choose from a host of health apps to support your specific routines and goals.

Stay close to what you care about. Never miss an important call or notification. Check in with a buddy over Walkie-Talkie. Listen to your favorite playlist or podcast. With Apple Watch Series 3 38mm, it’s easy to stay connected to the information and people you love the most.
